毯子是一个{@creature rug of smothering}，而剑是一个{@creature flying sword}。如果一个角色靠近其中一个5英尺以内，它们都会攻击。

entries.name: Hidden Room
entries: A secret door in the north wall (where the flying sword hangs when it isn't attacking) leads to a hidden room. A character who examines the north wall and succeeds on a DC 10 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check finds the secret door, which pushes inward easily enough.
隐蔽的房间一端有一对蜘蛛网般的椅子，另一端有一张布满灰尘的桌子。桌子下面藏着一个带把手的小木箱。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 木箱已经解锁，里面有三个{@item Spell Scroll||spell scrolls}({@spell arms of Hadar}、{@spell bane}和{@spell dimension door})和一个装有六件珠宝的袋子，每件价值100金币。

entries.name: D8a: Tower Ground Floor

entries: 寒冷的风从这个塔楼的楼梯上吹下来。
这里的楼梯爬升20英尺到D8b区。

entries.name: D8b: Tower Stairs
entries: 这里的楼梯下降20英尺到D8a区，爬升20英尺到D8c区。

entries.name: D8c: Stargazer's Roost

entries: 碎石散落在地板上，屋顶的一部分已经坍塌，露出了天空。栖息在瓦砾之上的是一个裹在斗篷里的驼背身影。它凝视着天空，对你毫无察觉。

entries.title: {@creature Zala Morphus|KftGV}

entries: The cloaked figure is {@creature Zala Morphus|KftGV}, a human mage who has been transformed into a {@creature nothic}. Zala helped Markos contact Krokulmar and blames this Far Realm entity for her transformation. Now she anxiously turns to the stars, hoping to find a way to return to her human form. Zala has no interest in Markos's current activities and little knowledge about them.
扎拉会说普通话、深层语言和精灵语。如果角色攻击她，扎拉会做出回应。如果他们声称在寻找{@i The Celestial Codex}，扎拉建议他们去搜查马科斯的办公室({@area area D11b|111|x})或他的卧室({@adventure area {@dice D15}|KftGV|3|D15: 马科斯的卧室})。
扎拉想从星图室({@adventure area {@dice D21}|KftGV|3|D21: 星图室})得到一张大蛇星座的地图。如果人物为她找回了地图，扎拉就会告诉人物酒窖里上锁的秘密门（{@adventure area {@dice D23}|KftGV|3|D23: Wine Cellar}）以及密码（"farrl'v hrak"）。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 扎拉带着两个{@item Spell Scroll||spell scrolls}({@spell crown of madness}和{@spell sleep})和一个{@item spellbook|PHB}，其中包含以下法术：{@spell arcane lock}、{@spell detect magic}、{@spell detect thoughts}、{@spell knock}、{@spell mage armor}、{@spell magic missile}、{@spell phantasmal force}、{@spell shield}、和{@spell suggestion}。

entries.name: D9: Guest Bedrooms
entries: 这两个相邻的房间的家具都是一样的。
这个布满灰尘的房间里有一张床、一个衣柜和一张写字台。
The first character to enter the westernmost bedroom triggers a roll on the {@area Eldritch Surges table|0f2|x}.
The easternmost bedroom contains a {@creature gibbering mouther}. It attacks any character who opens the door and fights to the death.

entries.name: D10: Balcony
entries: 这个阳台可以俯瞰门厅({@adventure area {@dice D1}|KftGV|3|D1: 门厅}），它的地板在20英尺以下。

entries.name: D11a: Empty Office
entries: 这个房间里的所有家具都已被移走，只剩下灰尘和蜘蛛网。

entries.name: D11b: Markos's Office

entries: 这个房间里有一张黑色的木制办公桌，桌子后面有一把带垫子的高背椅。两张较小的椅子面对书桌，背对着门。东北角的一个壁龛里有一个木质文件柜。
The first character to enter the office triggers a roll on the {@area Eldritch Surges table|0f2|x}.

entries.name: Correspondence
entries: 东北部壁龛里的文件柜没有上锁，里面有马科斯和其他贵族之间的信件。你可以决定这些信件是否是写给对人物有意义的人，或者是由他们写的。
{@b Desk}. The desk contains a complete set of {@item calligrapher's supplies|PHB}.

entries.name: D12: Gallery

entries: 德尔菲家族成员的框架画像和雪花石膏半身像装饰着房间的墙壁和角落，面部表情从骄傲到彻头彻尾的傲慢。四张软垫椅围绕着房间中央的一张桌子，上面摆放着一套象牙龙棋。
{@b Treasure}. 两件半身像和五件装裱的画作制作精良，状况良好，每件都能从收藏家那里得到50戈比的价格。每个半身像重30磅，每幅有框画重15磅。象牙{@item dragonchess set|PHB}价值150戈比。

entries.name: D13: Alchemy Lab

entries: 这个房间里充满了化学品的气味。一张放有各种小瓶和化合物的长桌占据了房间的中心。在桌子旁，两个披着斗篷的人在监督各种炼金术的实验。

One of the cloaked figures is Markos's head researcher, Xander (lawful evil, human {@creature cult fanatic}). The other figure is an apprentice named Kura (lawful evil, human {@creature cultist}). Both have embraced the Far Realm entity and the power it offers. Xander and Kura are indifferent toward intruders and don't attack unless the intruders aim to harm them or hinder their research.
桑德和库拉没有跟踪马科斯的行动，但他们知道他一直在地下室下面的洞穴里呆了很久({@adventure area {@dice D27}|KftGV|3|D27: 仪式室})。他们认为(1%)和马科斯在一起或在他的卧室里((2%)|KftGV|3|D15: 马科斯的卧室})。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Characters can assemble two sets of {@item alchemist's supplies|PHB} (50 gp each) from the contents of this lab. Among the various concoctions found throughout the room are four {@item Potion of Healing||potions of healing}, a {@item potion of gaseous form}, a vial containing {@item oil of slipperiness}, and a vial with one dose of {@item assassin's blood} poison (see the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG|8|Poisons}).

entries.name: D14: Meditation Room

entries: 这个房间里弥漫着一股腥臭味，除了靠西墙的两张光秃秃的小桌子和窗前的一张华丽的地毯外，房间里空无一人。地毯旁边放着一个木制烛台，上面放着一根融化了的红蜡烛的残枝。天花板上的一个木制活板门上挂着一根长长的拉绳。
There's no obvious source for the horrible smell that lingers here. The first character who enters the room triggers a roll on the {@area Eldritch Surges table|0f2|x}.
马科斯曾经坐在地毯上，一边思考多元宇宙的力量一边冥想，但他已经有一段时间没有使用这个房间了。

entries.name: Trapdoor
entries: 天花板上的活板门通向主浴室({@adventure area {@dice D17}|KftGV|3|D17: Bathroom})。一个展开的木梯可以方便地进入。

entries.name: D15: Markos's Bedroom

entries: 这个房间里有一张带有华丽雕刻框架的床，一个衣柜，一张写字台和一张皮椅。东墙边上有一个壁炉。
在床头板后面有一扇秘密的门，通往一个隐藏的步入式衣柜。检查墙壁并成功通过DC15智力({@skill Investigation})检查的人物不仅发现了暗门，而且还发现了床头板上的一个秘密按钮。按下这个按钮，床就会向东滑动，从而可以轻松地进入隐藏的壁橱。
{@b Hidden Closet}. 这个衣柜里有挂钩和架子上的衣服，还有各种各样的鞋类。靠东墙的一张小桌子上放着一个铁锁箱。一个使用盗贼工具的角色可以尝试撬开锁，这需要1分钟和成功的DC14灵巧检查。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: The lockbox contains an amethyst cloak pin shaped like an eye (125 gp) and a {@item ring of jumping}.

entries.name: D16: Student Quarters
entries: These rooms were set aside for Markos's pupils, who shared his drive for knowledge but didn't share in their master's reward for contacting Krokulmar. The pupils fled the mansion after Markos made his pact. Each room now contains two {@creature Gray Ooze||psychic gray oozes} (see the "Variant: Psychic Gray Ooze" sidebar in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}) that mill about. They attack intruders on sight.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 搜索最北边的房间的角色会发现一个{@item spellbook|PHB}，其中包含以下法术：{@spell comprehend languages}、{@spell detect magic}、{@spell detect thoughts}、{@spell identify}、{@spell mage armor}、{@spell misty step}、{@spell Tasha's hideous laughter}和{@spell unseen servant}。

entries.name: D17: Bathroom

entries: 一个凸起的大理石浴缸占据了这个房间。它附近有两个大理石水槽，上面安装有椭圆形镜子，还有一个壁炉和一张靠东墙的小桌子，上面摆放着五颜六色的瓶子。
浴缸和水槽的管道从屋顶的蓄水池中抽取雨水。此外，每个盆子都配备了一个塞住的排水管和两个水龙头：一个能神奇地加热水，一个能神奇地冷却水。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 小桌子上放着四瓶香水和香薰油（每瓶25戈比）。

entries.title: Alchemy is afoot in Delphi Mansion

entries.name: D18: Third-Floor Hall
entries: This hallway has become a lair for {@creature Stirge||stirges}—two per character. The stirges entered the mansion through the hole in the roof above {@area area D8c|10a|x}. They attack anyone who tries to cross the hall.

entries.name: D19: Eldritch Observation Room

entries: 这个房间是空的，除了地板上有一圈卑鄙的符号。站在圈内的是一个八英尺高的双足生物，有两条长臂，每条长臂的末端都有一个尖锐的钩子。这个生物穿着破烂不堪的管家制服的残余物。
The first character who enters the room triggers a roll on the {@area Eldritch Surges table|0f2|x}.

entries.name: Circle of Symbols
entries: A {@spell detect magic} spell reveals an aura of divination magic around the circle on the floor. A creature standing fully inside the circle feels the unsettling presence of a Far Realm entity and can choose to receive an omen from that entity, as if the creature had cast an {@spell augury} spell. After receiving such an omen, the creature can't receive another one for 24 hours but still feels the otherworldly presence while inside the circle.

entries.name: Esquire
entries: The hook-handed figure is Markos's former butler, Esquire (use the {@creature hook horror} stat block). Esquire isn't bound inside the circle and attacks intruders on sight. He doesn't know the cause of his transformation. If the characters explain that an evil entity is responsible for Esquire's transformation or that Markos might be in danger from this entity, Esquire lets them live if they vow to save Markos.

埃斯奎尔的破烂管家服有一个口袋，里面装着一个小盒和一张纸条。吊坠受到一个{@spell magic mouth}咒语的影响；打开后，它会说出神庙的密码({@adventure area {@dice D24}|KftGV|3|D24: Temple})，"farrl'v hrak"，这是深层语言中 "永远改变 "的意思。纸条上有一个酒瓶的草图和一排四个圆圈。左起第二个圆圈被划掉了。(这些圆圈代表了{@adventure area {@dice D23}|KftGV|3|D23: 酒窖}中的酒桶，被划掉的那个圆圈代表了挡住秘密之门的酒桶）。

entries.title: A bubbling green potion contains a Far Realm surprise

entries.name: D20: Component Storage
entries: 这个步入式衣柜包含四个柜子，每个柜子都装满了精心组织的材料组件。（ret door)。
{@b Treasure}. 搜索柜子的角色可以为任何一级或二级法术找到一个材料组件，只要该组件的价值低于1戈比。角色还能找到一种药水，其冒泡的绿色液体被一滴深色物质（章鱼墨汁）所染。

The alchemists in {@adventure area {@dice D13}|KftGV|3|D13: Alchemy Lab} concocted the potion, which functions as a {@item potion of poison} but has an additional property. When the poison effect ends, the imbiber sprouts a tentacle made of inky shadow. This shadowy tentacle lasts for 1 hour. As a bonus action, the potion's imbiber can use the tentacle to make a melee weapon attack ({@hit 4} to hit) against a creature the imbiber can see within 5 feet of itself. On a hit, the target takes 4 ({@dice 1d8}) necrotic damage.

entries.name: D21: Star-Map Room
entries: 这个房间的墙壁和地板上都贴满了星图。一个名叫法伦希尔的精灵研究员的{@creature ghost}在房间里徘徊，翻看这些地图，寻找一个幽灵永远也找不到的答案。这个鬼魂是无害的，只有在自卫或角色试图偷取星图时才会攻击。一旦偷来的地图被归还，幽灵就会停止攻击。
Characters who examine the maps closely find one that depicts a constellation called the Great Snake. This is the map sought by the nothic {@creature Zala Morphus|KftGV} (see {@area area D8c|10a|x}).

entries.name: D22: Storage Rooms
entries: Each of these unfurnished rooms contains two {@creature Ghoul||ghouls} that were attracted to the mansion by Far Realm energies. The ghouls are hostile.

entries.name: D23: Wine Cellar

entries: 在这个酒窖里，淡淡的葡萄香气充满了空气。四个大酒桶靠西墙而立，每个酒桶上都覆盖着一层细密的灰尘。南边的三个酒架是空的。
其中有三个酒桶含有不同数量的葡萄酒。第四个酒桶是空的，放在西墙的一个秘密门前。检查空酒桶的人物看到上面有手印，表明它曾被移动过多次。角色们还感觉到冷空气从墙上传来，表明有一扇暗门存在。必须把酒桶移到一边才能进入暗门。
{@b Secret Door}. 有一个{@spell arcane lock}的法术被施加在密门上。绕过咒语的密码是 "farrl'v hrak"，这是深层语言中 "永远改变 "的意思。艾斯奎尔的吊坠（见{@adventure area {@dice D19}|KftGV|3|D19: Eldritch Observation Room}）打开后会说出这个密码。
Alternatively, a character can use an action to try to force open the locked secret door, doing so with a successful DC 20 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check.

entries.name: D24: Temple

entries: 四个木制长椅面对着这个火炬室中间的一个石雕。这座雕像有一个大致的双足形状，被雕刻成看起来像正在解开的样子，就像一条磨损的绳子。它的外形布满了嘴巴和伸出来的舌头。
站在雕像前的是四个紫袍人，他们的脸被罩子遮住。他们在纸上写字，互相嘀咕，对你的存在视而不见。

The arcane energies in this room are particularly volatile. The first character who enters the room triggers a roll on the {@area Eldritch Surges table|0f2|x}. After the surge begins, on initiative count 20 (losing initiative ties), roll again on the Eldritch Surges table.

entries.name: Cloaked Figures
entries: The cloaked figures are four neutral, human {@creature Cultist||cultists} who are taking notes on the eldritch surges that occur in this area. These cultists defend themselves if attacked but otherwise pose no threat. They know Markos is performing a ritual in {@adventure area {@dice D27}|KftGV|3|D27: Ritual Room} but won't share this information until the statue is destroyed.

{@b Statue}. The statue depicts Krokulmar and was created with the aid of a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell stone shape}. Any creature that touches the statue for the first time on a turn must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or take 3 ({@dice 1d6}) psychic damage.

The statue amplifies the eldritch surges, which a character can ascertain by examining the statue and then succeeding on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check. If the statue is destroyed, the eldritch surges stop occurring throughout the mansion. The statue is a Medium object with AC 17, 36 hit points, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.

entries.name: D25: Storage

entries: 这个房间的地板上躺着四颗断头和三具无头尸体，房间的最角落里还有四个小箱子。
被砍下的头颅和被斩首的尸体属于艾拉-狮心和她的三个人类冒险同伴。艾拉的一个同伴的尸体不见了（可以在{@adventure area {@dice D27}|KftGV|3|D27: 仪式室}找到）。
如果艾尔拉和人物在一起（见本冒险前面的"{@area Meeting Elra|0eb|x}"），她会哀悼她死去的同伴，并希望有办法让她和她的朋友们起死回生。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Four small crates rest in the northwest corner. One contains a set of gold-plated cups and plates worth 200 gp total. Another contains a {@item wand of magic missiles} hidden in a pile of straw. The third contains 20 days' worth of edible {@item Rations (1 day)|PHB|rations}. The final crate contains a dozen {@item Torch|PHB|torches} and three flasks of {@item Alchemist's Fire (flask)|PHB|alchemist's fire}.

entries.name: D26a: Vestry
entries: 这个布满灰尘的密室里有四个未上锁的木箱，每个箱子里有四件深紫色的丝绸长袍。

entries.name: D26b: Ceremony Room

entries: 栓在墙上的铁架子上放着四个溅射的火把，使这个原本空荡荡的房间充满了昏暗的光线。在房间的远处，一个螺旋形的楼梯下降到黑暗中。从下面，你听到一个人的声音在用亵渎神明的语言吟唱。
The spiral staircase descends 20 feet to area {@dice D27}. The voice rising up the stairs is chanting in Deep Speech, calling to an entity named Krokulmar.

entries.name: D27: Ritual Room
entries: 这个地方由两个大致呈圆形的洞穴组成，由一个开口连接。D26b区的楼梯通向南部的洞穴，那里是空的。从楼梯上可以看到北部洞穴的活动。
楼梯通向一个大致呈圆形的山洞，里面空无一人，没有灯光。在楼梯对面，通过一个12英尺宽的拱门，你看到一个类似的洞穴，由四个从地板上凸出的大水晶发出的紫色光照亮。所有的水晶都随着回荡在洞穴中的吟唱声而闪烁。

The chants come from a sallow, dark-robed figure who stands near the edge of a circle of arcane runes inscribed on the floor. The figure recites an eldritch passage from a book, then carefully sets the book atop a wooden crate near the back wall. The figure turns toward the circle, wherein kneels a {@creature headless body|KftGV} in plate armor. A sluglike creature has attached itself to the body's neck, almost like a makeshift head. The slug's form is covered with mouths and eyes that open and close in and out of existence.

{@creature Markos Delphi|KftGV} is performing a ritual that will allow a {@creature fragment of Krokulmar|KftGV} (see their {@area stat blocks|140|x} at the end of the adventure) to attach to the {@creature headless body|KftGV} of one of Elra's adventuring companions, thus enabling a piece of Krokulmar to exist outside the Far Realm. The {@creature headless body|KftGV} is {@condition stunned} and remains so until the ritual is complete. It is possible to attack the fragment without harming the {@creature headless body|KftGV}.

entries.title: The Celestial Codex

entries: On each of his turns in combat, Markos defends himself while taking a bonus action to continue the ritual. If he's able to take this bonus action three more times, the {@creature fragment of Krokulmar|KftGV} takes control of the {@creature headless body|KftGV}, at which point the body is no longer {@condition stunned}.

The {@creature fragment of Krokulmar|KftGV} and the body to which it is attached are considered two creatures occupying the same space. Neither can be separated from the other until one or both of them drop to 0 hit points, at which point the {@creature fragment of Krokulmar|KftGV} returns to the Far Realm. While under the fragment's control, the body uses the {@creature knight} stat block, has {@sense blindsight} within a range of 30 feet, is blind beyond this radius, and acts immediately after the fragment in the initiative order. The fragment determines what the body does on the body's turn.
碎片利用身体来保护自己不受伤害，并在身体的轮回中破坏人物。

entries.name: Helping Markos
entries: As an action, a character can make a DC 14 Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check to try to convince Markos he's being controlled. If the check fails, nothing happens and the action is wasted. If the check succeeds, Markos has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks until the end of his next turn as he wrestles with the possibility that he's not in control of his actions.

{@b Crystals}. As a bonus action, a character can make a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) to ascertain the purpose of the large crystals sprouting from the floor. These crystals focus the ritual's extraplanar energy, allowing the {@creature fragment of Krokulmar|KftGV} to remain on the Material Plane long enough for it to bond with the {@creature headless body|KftGV}. A character who succeeds on the check also knows that destroying all four crystals stops the ritual. Each crystal is a Large object with AC 13, 10 hit points, vulnerability to bludgeoning and thunder damage, and immunity to poison and psychic damage.
每次水晶被毁，马科斯在攻击卷和能力检查上都有劣势，直到他下一回合结束，因为他要面对他可能无法控制自己的行动的可能性。

{@b Ending the Threat}. If all four crystals are destroyed, if Krokulmar or the body it's attached to drops to 0 hit points, or if Markos drops to 0 hit points before the ritual is completed, the {@creature fragment of Krokulmar|KftGV} returns to the Far Realm. Sending the fragment back to the Far Realm ends the eldritch surges in Delphi Mansion, frees Markos from Krokulmar's influence (see "Conclusion" below), restores {@creature Zala Morphus|KftGV} and Esquire to their former human selves, and causes the cultists in area {@dice D24} to flee.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 放在箱子上的书是《天体法典》。一个{@spell mage hand}的法术可以轻易地举起这本书。一个{@condition invisible}的角色可以偷偷穿过房间，试图在Markos没有注意到的情况下偷走这本书，只要成功地进行DC14灵巧({@skill Stealth})检查就可以了。如果检查失败，Markos会发现偷窃行为。虽然他不再需要这本书来完成仪式，但在克罗库马尔的影响下，马科斯不会贸然放弃它。一旦摆脱了这种影响，马科斯就会对自己的行为感到恐惧，并欣然交出这本书（见"{@area Markos Lives|13d|x}"）。

{@i The Celestial Codex}充满了关于星星和存在平面的神秘传说。书中良性的描述中夹杂着用Celestial语写成的邪恶咒语，书页之间夹着两个{@item Spell Scroll||spell scrolls}({@spell armor of Agathys}和{@spell arms of Hadar}).es了这本书（见"{@spell arms of Hadar}"）。

entries.name: Conclusion
entries: 如果人物获得了{@i The Celestial Codex}，他们就可以把书还给它的合法主人，并领取他们的奖励。

entries.name: Markos Dies
entries: 如果马科斯死了，人物可以把他的尸体还给他的家人。德尔菲家族给每个角色150戈比，用于将马科斯带回家，并支付马科斯起死回生的费用。

entries.name: Markos Lives
entries: Defeating the {@creature fragment of Krokulmar|KftGV} frees Markos from the evil entity's influence, at which point Markos is eager to make amends for the trouble he has caused. He allows the characters to keep whatever treasure they found in the mansion.
如果马科斯与家人团聚，家人会给每个角色150戈比作为奖励。

entries.name: Dead Adventurers
entries: 如果角色们向马科斯的家人讲述了德尔菲大厦的恐怖，那么家人就会做出安排，将任何剩余的怪物赶出大厦。在豪宅中被杀的冒险者（包括艾拉和她的同伴）的尸体被带到一个寺庙，在那里他们被抚养或复活，费用由德尔斐家族承担。如果艾拉的生命恢复时人物在场，她会祝贺他们的英雄主义，并期待着有一天能报答他们的恩情。

entries.name: For the Golden Vault
entries: 如果人物是为金库工作，那么在他们在德尔菲大厦的痛苦经历之后，该组织的代表会找他们。对于将{@i The Celestial Codex}归还给它的合法主人，角色们被许诺了一件他们选择的不常见的魔法物品（须经你批准）作为报酬。该物品将在第二天交付给这些人物。

items: {@creature Markos Delphi|KftGV}
{@creature Fragment of Krokulmar|KftGV}

data.name: Prisoner 13
entries: {@i An Adventure for 4th-Level Characters}

在托里尔世界，在剑海岸以北的冰雪地带，有一座坚不可摧的堡垒，是为关押该地区最危险的罪犯而建造的。这座监狱最早的囚犯之一，一个被称为{@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}的矮人，在看似安静和孤独的日子里，暗中操纵着一个横跨整个大陆的间谍网络。她掌握着从一个矮人氏族那里偷来的宝物的钥匙。在这次抢劫中，角色们必须潜入监狱，从（1%）那里取回钥匙（在她手上的纹身中找到），并将钥匙还给雇佣他们的矮人瓦林-阿克塞布瑞尔。

entries.title: Perched on a windswept bluff is the prison of Revel's End, wherein waits {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}

entries.name: Adventure Background
entries: {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}是一个名叫科尔达-格林特斯通的矮人。在多年前被监禁之前，科达是斧头帮的盟友和代理人，斧头帮是一个中等影响力的矮人氏族，位于一个叫Gauntlgrym的据点。科达建立了一个由线人和特工组成的网络，表面上看都是为了Axebreaker氏族的利益。每一次成功，她都付钱给纹身师，让他们在她的皮肤上刻下她胜利的纪念。科尔达利用古老的仪式，将这些艺术性的刻痕中的许多都注入了冈特格雷姆锻造厂的魔法，赋予她奇妙的天赋。
科达的野心越来越大，不适合担任特工的角色，所以她设计了一个计划，为自己夺取权力。在五年的时间里，她仔细盘点了Axebreaker家族的财富，并利用她的副手网络一举盗走了该家族的大部分黄金，只留下一小部分。
斧头帮的矮人几乎立即发现了她。他们围捕了她的代理人，这些人要么拼死抵抗，要么被处决。他们抓住了科尔达并审问了她，但她从未透露被盗财富的位置，即使是在魔法的强迫下。Axebreaker矮人利用他们的影响力，让她被判处在Revel's End的监狱中生活。在那里，Axebreaker家族希望科尔达最终会崩溃并说出被盗财富的位置。这正中科达下怀，因为她树敌甚多，在她被监禁期间无法对她采取行动。

Korda, now known as {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}, prepared for her imprisonment by laying the groundwork for a new spy and criminal network, which cost her much of her stolen fortune. She now runs her operations from the prison. Using her magical tattoos, she telepathically coordinates agents throughout Faerûn and beyond, none of whom know the identity of their employer. As for what remains of the stolen Axebreaker wealth, it rests in an unmarked vault in the depths of Gauntlgrym, sealed by a magical lock that only the runic sequence tattooed on Korda's right hand can open.

entries.name: Adventure Hooks
entries: 经过多年因财富被盗而导致的经济困难，Axebreaker氏族的山地矮人找到了失落的宝藏，但一直无法获得它。该部族的代表瓦林-阿克斯布雷克希望雇佣这些人物来学习如何获取宝藏。如果你不使用金库作为赞助人（见下面的 "使用金库"），以下是瓦林了解这些人物的一些可能的方式：K，只有纹在科达右手上的符文序列才能打开。这正中科达下怀，因为她树敌众多，在她被囚禁期间无法对付她。

items.name: By Reputation
items.entry: 瓦林是在以前的一次冒险之后得知这些人物的，特别是涉及到从危险地点找回一个人或财宝的冒险。笔者认为这正中科尔达的下怀，因为她已经结下了大量的敌人，在她被监禁期间无法对她采取行动。

items.name: Mutual Acquaintance
items.entry: 其中一个人物的主顾是瓦林的老熟人，安排了这次会面。如果人物与金库有关，请使用此选项。

items.name: Trial Run
items.entry: 瓦林负责之前人物成功完成的一次冒险。这是一个测试，看看他们是否配得上这个任务。

entries.name: Using the Golden Vault
entries: 如果你作为赞助人使用金库，那么就会以你认为合适的方式将一把金钥匙送到人物手中。当人物用这把钥匙打开他们的音乐盒时，盖子会弹开，一个舒缓的声音说："在孕期，丹奈尔博士几乎没有选择。"丹奈尔博士说，用水晶包裹它们可以中和它们。Rkenbluff教员和野外科学家，陪同大学的考古人员在该地区进行挖掘。
"你好，特工们。我们已经发现了一个伟大的矮人宝藏的位置，但只有一个被关在 "启示录 "监狱里的囚犯知道如何进入金库。这个任务，如果你选择承担，需要你前往监狱，潜入其中，并从囚犯那里了解如何进入宝藏。把这些信息交给被称为瓦林-破斧者的侏儒，他将向你介绍任务的细节。祝你好运，特工们。"
关上音乐盒，金钥匙就会消失。没有时间可以浪费；蛋随时都可能孵化。首先与丹内尔博士会面。祝你们好运，特工们。"他们是Rkenbluff的教员和野外科学家，陪同大学的考古人员在该地区进行挖掘。"博物馆，偷出蛋，在它释放出超自然的恐怖之前，把它还给Cassee Dannell博士，让它中和。

entries.name: Varrin's Proposition
entries: Varrin Axebreaker (lawful good, dwarf {@creature noble}) contacts the characters to enlist their aid in retrieving the key. Varrin's braided hair and beard are black with streaks of gray. He wears a loose, comfortable robe over a steel breastplate. Whether Varrin approaches the characters or invites them to a meeting, read the following text:
"谢谢你听我说完。我的名字是Varrin Axebreaker，我有一个建议给你。我的部族找到了多年前从我们这里偷走的财富，但它被封在一个用魔法锁住的金库里。如果你能找回钥匙--不管它是什么--你将获得Axebreaker家族不朽的感激。当然，我也会从找回的财宝中抽出一部分给你。
"这里的问题是，知道如何打开金库的人正在雷弗之末的监狱里腐烂。她过去一直不与我的人合作，但我最近发现她把从我们这里偷来的东西藏在金库里。我需要你去询问她，并学习如何打开金库。如何做到这一点取决于你；如果你需要把她从监狱里救出来以换取这些信息，请这么做。我可以为你提供进去的方法，以及雷弗尔尽头的布局和一些有用的窍门。"
给玩家一份{@adventure map 4.1|KftGV|4|Map 4.1: Players' Map}(见下面的 "破坏者地图")，并阅读下面的文字："好的技巧。"
瓦林取回一颗小橙子大小的刻面蓝宝石，放在桌子上。他在宝石上挥了挥手，上面的空气中出现了一个发光的蓝色建筑平面图图像。他轻拍宝石，图像就消失了。蓝宝石分裂成几个部分，他把一个碎片传给你们每个人。碎片在你手中变热，融化，然后消失，留下一种温暖、刺痛的感觉。"想一想雷夫岛的地图，你就能看到它了。"
宝石的魔力持续到人物到达启示录的终点后的五天。

entries.name: The Breaker's Map
entries: Each character can now cause a magical image of map 4.1 to appear in the air before them while they aren't {@condition incapacitated} (no action required). A breaker's map isn't visible to others while a character is viewing it. Varrin explains each of the features the characters can see on their maps:

items.name: Cells
items.entry: 红色突出显示的细胞，被永久的反魔法所覆盖。{@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}的细胞被清楚地标记出来。

items.name: Doors and Hatches
items.entry: 门和舱口都用{@spell arcane lock}法术密封，只有监狱工作人员才能绕过。然而，当人物在 "启示录的尽头 "的100英尺范围内时，地图允许他们使用一个动作来触摸门或舱口的图像，并抑制该门户的锁。当锁被压制时，其图像会变成绿色。该锁会在1分钟内保持被压制，或者直到另一个锁被压制。

items.name: Patrol Route
items.entry: 地图上标出的黄色路径是警卫们的常规巡逻路线。通常的巡逻轮换是每20分钟一次，但如果守卫很可疑，巡逻很可能会变得更加频繁。

entries.title: Map 4.1: Players' Map

entries.name: The Devil in the Details
entries: 在人物可能想要更多信息的情况下，瓦林简洁而诚实地回答他们的问题。他已经花光了他最后的个人财富，收集关于监狱的信息，并安排一个团队去对抗科尔达。这些都是他能提供的细节。

items.name: Entering the Prison
items.entry: The prison staff rotate out periodically. Varrin knows the schedule of the next rotation, and his agents are standing by to capture a number of guards and cooks so the characters can take their place (see "{@area Approaching the Prison|150|x}").

items.name: Prisoner 13
items.entry: {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}是Axebreaker家族值得信赖的代理人，直到她背叛了家族并偷走了家族的财富。如果有人追问，瓦林会勉强告诉人物她的名字（Korda Glintstone），但他强调，他们不应该透露自己知道这个名字。除了典狱长，监狱里没有人知道她的真名，所以使用真名只会引起怀疑。她的牢房在地图上有标记。

items.name: Key
items.entry: {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}一定有金库钥匙或知道它在哪里，但Axebreaker家族试图找到钥匙的所有魔法方法都失败了。瓦林推测（1%）会放弃钥匙以换取自由，但如果角色们能找到钥匙或说服她以其他方式放弃，他也会很高兴。Axebreaker家族试图安排释放她，但雷弗尔尽头的赦免委员会拒绝了这个请求。

items.name: Meeting Prisoner 13
items.entry: 探访者可以要求与囚犯会面，但这些会面总是由监狱长监督（要了解监狱长的情况，见"{@area R21: Warden's Quarters|180|x}"）。如果人物想和(%%1)谈话，他们最好是在她不在牢房里的时候尝试，希望能在狱警看不到的地方。囚犯们做一些杂事，如倒掉厕所的水桶和饭后打扫卫生，他们每天在院子里锻炼。当囚犯受伤或生病时，他们会被送往监狱医院。

items.name: Revel's End Details
items.entry: 瓦林可以给大家介绍一下雷夫岛的总体情况，门和舱口的安全特征，以及监狱的高度警戒程序（见下文）。瓦林还知道军械库有一个危险的守护者，但他不知道细节。

items.name: Treasure
items.entry: 宝藏被锁在矮人据点Gauntlgrym地下深处的一个金库里。瓦林承诺，如果他们能让他打开金库，就从他们找到的财宝中拿出2%。如果人物要求更多，瓦林会很生气，但如果人物在DC20的魅力（{@skill Persuasion}）检查中成功，他就同意分出3%。瓦林指出，典狱长可能有一些资金藏在她的办公室或宿舍里，如果角色们愿意去寻找这些资金。

items.name: Escape Route
items.entry: 瓦林将在监狱的视线范围内安排一艘小船，但要保持安全距离。当人物准备带着他们的目标离开监狱时，他们可以在天黑后从码头上照出一束光，船会来接他们。

entries: 当人物准备离开与瓦林的会面时，他为他们每个人提供了选择，让他们冒充警卫或厨师。卫兵必须穿着夹板甲，而厨房工作人员必须穿着简单的制服。厨师可以在他们的制服下隐藏轻型盔甲。小人物还可以选择在一个装着物资的箱子里偷渡。

entries.name: Trek to the Prison
entries: Varrin has sent word to his agents, and Bethra (chaotic good, dwarf {@creature spy}) meets the characters when they arrive in Luskan. She provides the uniforms for their chosen cover and directs them to report to a ship called the Jolly Pelican the following dawn. The ship regularly delivers a fresh rotation of prison staff to Revel's End and returns the relieved shift to the Sword Coast. The journey to Revel's End by sea is 350 miles, which a sailing ship can cover in three days under normal conditions.
25名警卫和6名厨师将被送往监狱，包括取代他们位置的任何人物。如果这些人物对他们所取代的工作人员的命运表示担忧，贝瑟拉向他们保证，没有一个人被杀，工作结束后他们会被安全释放。
球员们可以为他们的封面编造任何他们喜欢的名字。这些都是他们所取代的警卫或厨师的名字。

entries.name: Revel's End
entries: 雷弗的尽头是一个全景监狱，这个监狱的配置方式是可以从一个中心位置密切监视囚犯的活动。监狱位于移动冰海的寒冷、迷雾的海岸上，是一个单层结构，顶部有城墙。监狱的核心是一座塔楼，里面有监狱的行政办公室和警卫营房。监狱和塔楼都是由高大的刀形岩石雕刻而成，高高耸立在海崖之上。这块岩石被称为 "防风墙"，为塔楼挡住了从雷盖德冰川上掠过的残酷的风。
人们可以从陆地、海洋或空中接近雷夫岛。一个码头可以将囚犯从船上通过电梯运到监狱，而塔顶的停泊码头可以将囚犯用飞艇运送。
雷弗尔尽头由领主联盟控制，这是一个松散的定居点联盟，其目前的成员包括博德之门、米拉巴尔、永夜、银月、水底和亚尔塔等城市；安菲勒、达格福德和长鞍等城镇；以及矮人的据点米特拉尔厅。要被囚禁在启示录的尽头，必须对一个或多个成员城市犯下严重罪行，并被判处长期监禁（通常是一年或更长时间）。
领主联盟的每个成员都会指派一名代表到雷夫岛，这些代表共同组成一个假释委员会，称为赦免委员会。委员会的十名成员很少全部出席，因为雷夫岛没有提供什么舒适和便利的条件。如果委员会需要打破僵局来决定是否对囚犯进行减刑，监狱长--一个与任何领主联盟成员没有关系的中立仲裁者--会投下决定性的一票。）

entries.name: Prison Features
entries: 这座由石头凿成的监狱有20英尺高的外墙和整个平坦的20英尺高的天花板。有关该监狱的其他信息总结如下。

items.name: Doors and Hatches
items.entry: 每扇门和屋顶上的舱门都是由加固的铁制成的，由一个{@spell arcane lock}的法术保持关闭。监狱工作人员可以正常打开这些门和舱门。被锁住的门或舱口太坚固了，不能用肩膀或脚踢开，但如果受到足够的伤害，可以将其摧毁。门或舱门的AC值为19，伤害阈值为10，命中率为30，对毒药和精神伤害有免疫力。

items.name: Heating
items.entry: Interior spaces are magically heated. The temperature in these areas is a constant 68 degrees Fahrenheit (20 degrees Celsius). The exterior of the prison, including the guard towers, is 0 degrees Fahrenheit (−18 degrees Celsius) or colder. Creatures outside the prison are exposed to {@area extreme cold|152|x} (see below).

items.name: Lighting
items.entry: Unless a location states otherwise, the courtyard, corridors, rooms, and staircases are brightly lit with {@spell continual flame} spells cast on wall sconces. (The unlit cells in {@area area R17|176|x} are exceptions.) In some locations, the magical lights can be dimmed or suppressed, as noted in the text.

items.name: Prison Guards
items.entry: 监狱里有75名守卫（使用{@creature veteran}状态块），他们八小时轮流工作。三分之二的守卫在任何时候都不值班，在{@area area R19|17c|x}休息。执勤时，每个守卫都穿着印有领主联盟徽章的外衣：红场上的金冠。

items.name: Prisoners
items.entry: 启示录》中的所有囚犯都有一个编号。这个简单的协议使囚犯处于平等的地位。监狱工作人员将这些数字记在记忆中，所有囚犯的记录--过去和现在--都储存在{@area area R22|184|x}中。每个囚犯都穿着制服，包括一件没有口袋的无帽长袍、没有鞋带的皮拖鞋和布制内衣。在牢房外时，囚犯的手腕和脚踝都戴着手铐。在戴着手铐时，囚犯的行走速度不能超过10英尺。

entries.name: Approaching the Prison
entries: 当人物接近监狱时，阅读以下文字：d不能超过10英尺。
在俯瞰移动冰海的高崖上，有一座由巨大的刀形岩石雕刻而成的荒凉的石头堡垒。一座中央塔楼耸立在堡垒的其余部分之上，光线从其箭缝中漏出。四座较小的塔楼从堡垒的最外角升起，在它们上面可以看到守卫。
Characters might approach the prison via the Jolly Pelican, or they might choose to approach on their own (see "{@area Getting Inside|154|x}" below).
从北边走过来的人物还可以看到监狱的北面入口在一个160英尺高的悬崖顶部，底部有一个突出的码头。一个巨大的木制起重机矗立在附近，一个木制脚手架紧贴在崖壁上。
从南边走过来的角色可以看到监狱的南边入口和通往南边的小路。

entries.name: Extreme Cold
entries: The temperature outside is at or below 0 degrees Fahrenheit (−18 degrees Celsius) while the characters are at the prison. A creature exposed to the cold must succeed on a DC 10 Constitution saving throw at the end of each hour or gain 1 level of {@condition exhaustion}. Creatures with resistance or immunity to cold damage automatically succeed on the saving throw, as do creatures wearing cold-weather gear (thick coats, gloves, and the like) and creatures naturally adapted to cold climates.

entries.name: Guards on Watch
entries: 监狱有四座守卫塔（见{@area area R9|16a|x}），每座塔顶都有三名穿着防寒服的守卫驻守。如果你需要对守卫进行智慧（{@skill Perception}）检查，以确定他们是否注意到了什么，只需进行一次有利的滚动。
如果塔楼上的守卫看到或听到一些非同寻常的事情--比如一艘驶来的船、一群来访者或一只从头顶飞过的怪物--一名守卫就会下到塔楼，提醒监狱里的其他人，而其他人则留在他们的岗位上。

entries.name: Getting Inside
entries: 如果人物使用瓦林提供的掩护，他们的船在离开卢斯坎三天后，在黎明前到达雷弗尔尽头。人物被引导下船，乘坐电梯到达悬崖顶，并从前门进入。冒充守卫的角色被带到军营（{@area area R19|17c|x}），在那里他们见到了守卫长尤拉-达格利亚，一个对监狱规则不苟言笑的顽固分子。冒充厨师的角色被送到厨房（{@area area R8|169|x}），在那里他们向大厨Tiny Toulaine报告，他是一个笨重的、爱开玩笑的人，带着一个巨大的锅而不是沉重的弩箭。用补给箱偷渡的小人物会被带到储藏室（{@area area R13|171|x}）、厨房的冷藏室（R8区外的中间房间）或储藏室（R8区外最北边的房间）。如果有一个以上的小人物偷渡，请选择一个地点将他们全部送走。

Characters who bang on the prison's north or south door are admitted into a 30-foot-long corridor, where they are greeted by the three guards from a nearby guard room ({@area area R3|161|x}). These guards insist on confiscating the characters' weapons and storing them in a nearby lockbox. In addition, one guard searches each character for concealed weapons. A character can conceal a dagger or similarly sized weapon from a guard's notice with a successful DC 13 Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check.

If the characters have sled dogs or pack animals, a guard grants the party access to the stables ({@area area R5|165|x}), where the animals can be kept safe. Animals aren't allowed in the prison otherwise.

在交出武器和保护好动物后，人物会被其中一个守卫护送到会议室（{@area area R12|16f|x}），他们必须在那里等待一个小时，等待监狱长来迎接他们。在这段时间内，人物无人看管，可以尝试潜入监狱。在不惊动守卫的情况下这样做需要成功地进行DC13灵巧（{@skill Stealth}）检查。从锁箱中取回人物的武器需要成功地进行DC 16灵巧检查，并使用盗贼的工具。如果人物在尝试这两项任务时被抓到，守卫会把他们送回会议室，并和他们一起等待监狱长，除非他们提供令人满意的访问和潜规则的理由，否则监狱长会把他们扔出去。小人物偷渡，选择一个地点，他们都会被送到。

The warden only accepts the characters' presence if they are seeking shelter. In that case, she grants them temporary accommodations (in {@area area R7|167|x}) for up to two days and two nights, and the characters receive three meals a day during their stay. If the characters fail to provide a satisfactory reason for their visit, the warden has their weapons and animals returned to them before throwing them out.

entries.name: Suspicion
entries: 在监狱日常工作之外的活动引起了看守和其他少数工作人员的注意。怀疑是以1到6级来衡量的。当人物到达监狱时，怀疑程度为1.守卫将他们送回会议室，和他们一起等待监狱长，监狱长将他们赶出去，除非他们提供一个令人满意的理由来说明他们的访问和潜规则。
当监狱工作人员目睹或发现非正常行为的证据时，怀疑会增加。增加怀疑程度的情况包括以下几点。

items: 伪装成监狱工作人员时使用囚犯的真名
Getting caught by a patrol (see {@area Patrol Routes|15d|x})
在警卫的视线范围内施展有可感知成分或效果的法术
与囚犯谈论监狱事务以外的任何事情（例如给他们下达任务指示）。

entries: 为了增加怀疑，监狱工作人员必须目睹这些人物进行不寻常的活动，而且任何证人必须报告他们的观察结果。如果这些人物能够说服证人他们所看到的是合理的，那么怀疑程度就不会增加。

entries.name: Distractions
entries: A character can create a distraction, giving themself or an ally time to undertake a suspicious activity without being witnessed. If the distracting character succeeds on a Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check against a DC set by the current suspicion level (see the Suspicion table), the suspicious activity goes unnoticed. Use your discretion to decide if any given activity is subtle enough to be covered by a distraction. For example, a glib conversation can't cover up an explosion.

entries.name: Effects of Suspicion
entries: 随着怀疑程度的增加，巡逻变得更加频繁，监狱工作人员也变得越来越警觉。在可疑等级为6级时，典狱长将监狱置于高度警戒状态。

entries.name: Level
entries: 如果监狱工作人员在这段时间内没有发现可疑的活动，那么当前的怀疑等级每8小时降低1级（最低为1级）。

entries.name: Patrol Die
entries: Roll a die based on the current suspicion level when characters enter the patrol route to see if they encounter a guard patrol (see "{@area Patrol Routes|15d|x}").

entries.name: DC
entries: 对监狱工作人员进行的魅力检查和为避免巡逻而进行的能力检查的直流电是由当前的怀疑程度决定的。

entries.name: High Alert
entries: When a matter of concern is brought to her attention, the warden (see {@area area R21|180|x}) decides whether to place the prison on high alert. Circumstances that warrant taking such action include a prisoner revolt, an escape, the approach of an unfamiliar ship, a dragon sighting, an attack, discovering a dead body, or suspicious activity (see "Suspicion" above).
通过说出命令词 "maristo"，典狱长--只有典狱长--可以将监狱置于高度警戒状态（或再次说出命令词以结束高度警戒状态），其效果如下。

items.name: High-Alert Signals
items.entry: 在1分钟内，整个监狱都会响起警告的喇叭，监狱里所有由{@spell continual flame}法术产生的光线都会呈现出红色的色调。

items.name: Prison Deployment
items.entry: 在{@area area R19|17c|x}的守卫穿上他们的盔甲，武装自己，并移动到{@area area R18|179|x}。典狱长也这样做，并在那里指挥驻军。赦免委员会的成员撤退到{@area area R20|17e|x}。

items.name: See Invisibility
items.entry: 典狱长和所有监狱看守获得一个{@spell see invisibility}法术的好处。

entries.name: Patrol Routes
entries: 警卫们定期从警卫室（{@area area R3|161|x}，每次巡逻交替使用哪个房间）围绕六角形（{@area area R15|173|x}）进行巡逻，并在院子（{@area area R11|16e|x}）和军械库（{@area area R10|16b|x}）进行短暂检查。路线在玩家的Revel's End地图上用黄色标记。巡逻队通常需要4分钟来完成巡逻并返回其岗位。

When one or more characters enter an area marked on the patrol route, roll a die. The size of the die rolled is determined by the current suspicion level of the prison, as indicated on the {@area Suspicion table|158|x}. On a 1, the characters encounter a patrol. Ask the players how their characters react, and give them 1 round of actions. The characters can try to slip away if there is a nearby exit or corner to duck around by making a group Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) check or try to blend in by making a group Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check. Each check is made against a DC set by the current suspicion level. On a failure, the patrol notices the characters, who must account for their presence.

如果角色们试图通过谈话来躲避巡逻，让其中一个角色用{@skill Deception}、{@skill Intimidation}或{@skill Persuasion}进行魅力检查，具体取决于他们的故事，检查标准由怀疑程度决定。如果其他角色支持这个故事，那么这个检查是有优势的。如果成功，巡逻队会放他们走。如果失败，巡逻队会把这些人物护送到一个警卫室（R3区），在那里，警卫会审问这些人物在禁止区域的情况。如果人物在监狱里有一个掩饰的故事，守卫会护送他们到他们应该去的地方：厨房工作人员的宿舍（{@area area R8|169|x}外最大的侧室），如果是不当班的守卫，则是兵营（{@area area R19|17c|x}）。然后怀疑程度增加1.heck。每个检查都是针对当前怀疑程度所设定的DC进行的。如果失败，巡逻队就会注意到这些人物，他们必须说明自己的存在。
一旦角色遇到巡逻队，在角色进入路线时，不要检查是否有另一支巡逻队，直到20分钟后，才可以检查怀疑程度。如果失败，巡逻队就会注意到这些人物，他们必须说明自己的存在。

entries.name: Revel's End Locations
entries: 以下地点是以雷夫岛为关键，如地图4.2所示。

entries.name: R1: Dock
entries: 船只在这里停靠，卸下囚犯和物资。

entries.name: R2: Elevator
entries: 一个坚固的木制脚手架紧贴在将监狱和码头分开的160英尺高的悬崖上。脚手架上方有一台木制起重机，由R3区控制。起重机提升和降低一个电梯轿厢，电梯轿厢在起重机对面的一侧有一个可伸缩的木门。电梯轿厢是一个空心的木制立方体，每边长10英尺。轿厢在脚手架上行驶或下降需要1分钟。

entries.name: R3: Guard Rooms

entries: 这个房间里有一张带四把椅子的桌子，以及一个放着磨刀石和其他修理盔甲和武器的简单用品的柜子。
Three guards ({@creature Veteran||veterans}) are stationed in each of these two rooms. The guards pass the time by playing cards, sharpening their weapons, and complaining about the weather.
在北面警卫室的北墙上嵌有一个铁制的杠杆，用于升降R2区的电梯。在巡逻过程中，两名守卫会离开房间进行4分钟的巡视。

entries.name: R4: Hospital

entries: 这个房间里有一打简单的床。沿着北墙的柜子放着医疗用品。
柜子里的物资足以组装20个{@item Healer's Kit|PHB|healer's kits}，5瓶{@item Antitoxin (vial)|PHB|antitoxin}，以及其他各种药品和酊剂。

Some of these substances are poisonous if ingested in the wrong proportion. A character proficient with alchemist's supplies, a poisoner's kit, an herbalist's kit, or the {@skill Medicine} skill can identify the tinctures and combine them into an ingested poison. A creature that ingests the poison must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. On a failed saving throw, it takes 10 ({@dice 3d6}) poison damage and becomes {@condition poisoned} for 1 hour. On a successful saving throw, it takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. In either case, the creature has painful stomach cramps until it finishes a short rest, drinks a vial of antitoxin, or is targeted by an effect that ends the {@condition poisoned} condition. If a prisoner suffers these cramps, the guards bring the prisoner to the hospital to be examined and treated. Characters disguised as guards can volunteer for or be assigned that duty.

entries.name: R5: Stables
entries: Visitors who bring mounts, sled dogs, pack animals, or pets to Revel's End can keep their animals here. The prison doesn't supply food for animals, however.

entries.name: R6: Mess Hall
entries: 监狱工作人员在这里就餐。桌子和长凳摆满了整个房间，餐具和暗淡的餐具存放在沿南墙的柜子里。食堂提供早餐、午餐和晚餐。角色们可以在这里见面而不引起任何怀疑。

entries.name: R7: Councilors' Quarters
entries: 这十个房间的家具都是一样的。每个房间都有一张床，一张带配套椅子的书桌，一个爪足柜，以及墙上挂衣服的挂钩。照亮每个房间的{@spell continual flame}法术，可以通过说出命令词 "灯光 "来抑制或恢复到正常的光亮水平。
这些房间是为赦免委员会的十个成员预留的，尽管目前只有三个房间在使用。理事会的其他七名成员不在，所以典狱长让来访者使用备用房间。

entries.name: Council Members
entries: 赦免委员会的这三位成员在雷夫的尽头。

items.name: Councilor Voss Anderton
items.entry: 沃斯代表永无止境的城市。他是一个合法中立的人类非战斗人员，说话方式严谨，有律师风范。他从不缺席议会会议或假释听证会。他用他的头脑投票，而不是用他的心，他总是权衡为囚犯减刑的后果。

items.name: Councilor Jil Torbo
items.entry: 吉尔代表博德之门的城市。她是一个中立的半身人非战斗人员，厌恶她的工作。她没有幽默感，当她的耐心受到考验时，她会深深叹息。然而，她喜欢给别人以怀疑的好处--也许是作为一种反对的行为--并经常对减刑投赞成票。

items.name: Councilor Kriv Norixius
items.entry: 克里夫代表达格福特镇。他是一个合法的好人，拥有银龙血统的龙裔非战斗人员。他希望通过做好工作来打动达格福德的公爵夫人。他对不知悔改的罪犯毫不宽容，经常对减刑投反对票。

entries.name: R8: Kitchen and Side Rooms
entries: Six cooks (neutral, human {@creature Commoner||commoners}) take shifts here, working in pairs to produce meals for the prisoners and staff. The kitchen contains everything one would expect to see, as well as an iron stove and a pump that draws water from a magically heated cistern on the roof.
不当班的厨师睡在厨房西边三个房间中最大的一间。这个侧室由{@spell continual flame}法术照明，可以通过说出指令词 "灯光 "来抑制或激活。
中间的侧室--没有暖气，与监狱的其他地方不同--用于冷藏。
最小的侧室是一个库存充足的储藏室。

entries.name: R9: Guard Towers
entries: Each of these four triangular towers is two stories tall. A tower's interior chamber is empty except for a wooden ladder that climbs to an iron hatch held shut by an {@spell arcane lock} spell (see the "{@area Prison Features|14f|x}" section for more details). This hatch leads to the tower's flat rooftop, which is lined with battlements. Three Lords' Alliance guards ({@creature Veteran||veterans}) in cold-weather clothing are stationed on the roof of each tower.

entries.name: R10: Armory

entries: 这个房间里有木架和箱子，里面装满了武器装备。漂浮在房间中央的是一个球形生物，中央有一只大眼睛和四根蠕动的眼线。

The inventory is nonmagical and includes twenty {@item Halberd|PHB|halberds}, fifteen {@item Longsword|PHB|longswords}, fifteen {@item Shortsword|PHB|shortswords}, ten {@item Pike|PHB|pikes}, ten {@item Heavy Crossbow|PHB|heavy crossbows}, five {@item Light Crossbow|PHB|light crossbows}, and hundreds of {@item Crossbow Bolts (20)|PHB|crossbow bolts}.
军械库由一个{@creature spectator}看守，把武器当作宝物。它对监狱里的每个工作人员都了如指掌。它不会离开这个房间，并攻击任何它不认识的人。

entries.name: Hatch
entries: 一个木梯子通向天花板上的一个铁舱门。一个{@spell arcane lock}的咒语封住了舱门（详情见"{@area Prison Features|14f|x} "部分），舱门通向屋顶。

entries.name: R11: Courtyard
entries: 这个院子是用旗杆石铺成的，上面覆盖着漂浮的雪。
在天气允许的情况下，囚犯被单独或分批带到这里，呼吸新鲜空气和锻炼身体。地面上的看守和角楼上的看守都密切关注着他们。角色可以在塔上与囚犯安静地交谈而不被注意。

entries.name: R12: Meeting Room
entries: 这个房间里放着一张长方形的大桌子，桌子的一条长边上有一把单人椅，对面有三把类似的椅子。该房间用于与囚犯或典狱长会面。

entries.name: Hatch
entries: 一个木梯子通向天花板上的一个铁舱门，该舱门可通向屋顶。一个{@spell arcane lock}的咒语封住了舱门（详情见"{@area Prison Features|14f|x} "部分）。

entries.name: R13: Storeroom
entries: 补给品被存放在这里的板条箱和其他容器中。目前，监狱已经储备了足够的必需品，可以继续运作6个月。

entries.name: R14: Privy
entries: 这个房间里有一打木制的废物桶。每天一次，通常是在早上，带着手铐的囚犯把桶抬到监狱外，在看守的监视下处理垃圾。

entries.name: R15: Hexagon
entries: 这条走廊允许守卫和访客进入监狱的最外层房间，同时避开全景图（R16区）和其囚室（R17区）。由于这个走廊的形状，看守们把它称为 "六边形"。

entries.name: R16: Panopticon

entries: 这个六边形的房间是监狱中心的一个大型开放空间。牢房在室壁上排列，一个较小的六边形房间占据了空间的中心。
照亮这个区域的{@spell continual flame}法术可以从监控中心({@area area R18|179|x})调暗。大厅在夜间的光线很暗。

entries.name: R17: Cells

entries: 每间牢房都被可怕的钢筋围住。栓在后墙上的是铁制双层床，每张床都有一张薄薄的床垫。床边放着一个废物桶。

The prisoners are kept in these unlit cells (effectively illuminated by the lights in R16) behind barred gates that can be opened only from {@area area R18|179|x}. The gates are too secure to be forced open using brute strength or weapons, and magical attempts to open or bypass them are thwarted by permanent antimagic fields. Each field encompasses one cell and its gate. Spells and other magical effects, except those created by an artifact or a deity, are suppressed in an antimagic field and can't protrude into it. While an effect is suppressed, it doesn't function, but the time it spends suppressed counts against its duration.
每间牢房的后墙上都栓着一张铁制双层床，上面有薄薄的床垫，旁边还有一个废物桶。囚犯们在牢房里吃饭。当一个效果被压制时，它不会发挥作用，但它被压制的时间会被计入其持续时间。

entries.name: Prisoners
entries: 二十四个牢房中的每一个都可以容纳一个或两个囚犯。掷出{@dice 4d10}来确定目前被关押在Revel's End的囚犯人数，给每个人一个识别号码，并按你认为合适的方式将他们分配到牢房中。号码是按照囚犯到达的顺序分配的，而且从不重复使用。目前关押在启示录尽头的时间最长的囚犯是6号囚犯，而最新的囚犯是299号囚犯。{@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}（详见本冒险后面的"{@area Roleplaying Prisoner 13|187|x} "部分）没有狱友。她的牢房被标记在{@adventure map 4.1|KftGV|4|Map 4.1: Players' Map}上。

To add detail to other inmates, roll on the Prisoners table or choose entries you like. If a prisoner's game statistics become necessary, choose an appropriate stat block from the {@book Monster Manual|MM}, and remove armor, weapons, and other gear.

entries.caption: Prisoners
rows: Gallia Strand (neutral evil human), convicted of smuggling contraband luxuries, has served {@dice 1d6} years of a 10-year sentence.
Barlo Rageblade (chaotic good human), a famous adventurer convicted of reckless endangerment, has served {@dice 1d4} years of a 5-year sentence.
Quillion Sardo (lawful neutral halfling), convicted of using magic to influence others, has served {@dice 1d4} years of a 5-year sentence.
Pirouette (chaotic evil tiefling), a thieves' guild leader convicted of multiple crimes, has served {@dice 1d20} years of a life sentence.
Ishar (chaotic evil elf), convicted of conspiracy to murder members of a noble family, has served {@dice 1d20} years of a life sentence.
Grix (neutral goblin), convicted of espionage, has served {@dice 1d6} years of a 10-year sentence.

entries.title: An adventurer makes contact with the enigmatic {@creature prisoner 13|KftGV}

entries.name: R18: Surveillance Hub

entries: 这个六边形的房间是监狱中央塔楼的底座。一个螺旋形的楼梯通向塔的上层。几名看守通过箭头缝隙观察牢房，而一名看守则坐在一张金属桌子和控制台前，上面有无数的开关和表盘，还有一个带漏斗状照明灯的铜管。

The stairs lead to areas {@area R19|17c|x} through {@area R23|186|x}. Seven guards ({@creature Veteran||veterans}) are stationed in this surveillance hub. One sits at a console south of the staircase. The other guards watch the prisoners through 4-foot-tall, 1-foot-wide arrow slits in the walls. Hanging on the walls between the arrow slits are fifty sets of iron manacles guards use to bind prisoners' wrists and ankles.

entries.name: Console
entries: 控制台是一个神奇的装置，类似于一张有斜顶的桌子，用螺栓固定在地板上。它是一个大型物体，AC值为15，命中率为18，对中毒和精神伤害免疫。控制台有以下魔法属性，如果它的命中率降到0，这些属性就会失效。

items.name: Gate Control
items.entry: 控制台上的24个开关可以打开和关闭通往牢房的大门。一个主开关可以同时打开或关闭所有的门。翻开控制台上的一个或多个开关需要一个动作。

items.name: Light Control
items.entry: A brass dial on the console controls the light level in {@area area R16|174|x}. Turning the dial requires an action or a bonus action.

items.name: Loudspeaker
items.entry: 作为一个动作，一个生物可以使用这个类似于小号的铃铛的装置，在整个监狱里广播它的声音。

entries.name: R19: Barracks

entries: 旋转楼梯上的一扇门通向一个大房间，里面摆满了木制双层床。在北面、西面和南面的墙上都有箭头的缝隙。每张床旁都有鞋柜和盔甲架。过了这道门，螺旋楼梯继续向上。
爬上螺旋形楼梯的人物来到监狱屋顶上方100英尺的门前。过了这道门，楼梯继续向塔的更高楼层延伸。
门打开后是一个摆满木质双层床的房间。通过4英尺高、1英尺宽的箭头缝隙，可以看到北边、西边和南边的区域。照亮房间的{@spell continual flame}法术可以通过说出指令词 "灯光 "来调暗或调亮。

When the prison isn't on high alert, fifty guards ({@creature Veteran||veterans} without armor or weapons) sleep in the bunks. The guards keep their armor and weapons within easy reach. They keep other belongings in unlocked footlockers tucked under their bunk beds.
警卫们需要10分钟来穿戴盔甲。如果监狱处于高度警戒状态，警卫们会花时间穿上盔甲，然后再去R18区。

entries.name: R20: Hall of Absolution
entries: The floor of this room is 120 feet above the prison roof. A spiral staircase connects the room to the other levels of the tower ({@area area R18|179|x} is 140 feet down, area R19 is 20 feet down, and {@area area R23|186|x} is 20 feet up). Narrow windows line the outer walls.
一张略带弧度的长桌和11把椅子占据了房间的大部分。中间的椅子没有特别的装饰，而其他椅子的高背上挂着横幅，每张横幅上都印有一个领主联盟成员的徽章。挂在墙上的横幅显示了联盟的徽章：红场上的金冠。

entries.name: Absolution Council Meetings
entries: 赦免委员会的成员聚集在这里，权衡释放一名或多名委员会成员推荐的假释囚犯的好处。任何囚犯每年接受这种考虑的次数都不能超过一次。准备假释的囚犯被戴着手铐带到这个房间，在投票前有机会动摇理事会成员的想法。典狱长（见R21区）总是参加这样的会议，他坐在中间的椅子上，必要时投下打破僵局的一票。

entries.name: R21: Warden's Quarters
entries: The {@spell arcane lock} on this door can be opened only by the warden. Beyond the door is a comfortable bedchamber lit by a {@spell continual flame} spell that can be dimmed or brightened by uttering the command word, "vaudra."

entries.name: Prison Warden
entries: 玛塔-玛珊妮斯是雷弗尔尽头镇的镇长，她是一个合法的好人，会说普通话、德拉贡语、矮人语和兽人语。她穿着一件带金边的红色长袍，在一个口袋里放着一个挂着七把小钥匙的戒指。一把钥匙可以打开典狱长的箱子（见下面的 "宝藏"）；其他的钥匙可以打开典狱长办公室的桌子抽屉和柜子（{@area area R22|184|x}）。
典狱长玛珊妮斯是哈珀斯的秘密成员，这个派别在幕后工作，不让权力落入恶人之手。在她目前的职位上，她的工作是将剑海岸一些最坏的恶棍关进监狱。到目前为止，典狱长设法向监狱里的其他人隐瞒了她与哈珀人的关系。

entries.name: Marthannis's Possession
entries: 与她在哈珀斯的成员身份不同，玛珊妮丝没有隐瞒她定期被附身的事实。她体内寄居着一位已故冒险伙伴的灵魂：一位名叫弗拉克斯-布劳南维尔的合法善良的盾牌矮人战士。弗拉克斯的灵魂每天控制典狱长玛珊妮丝一到两次，每次一到两个小时--尽管她从不在履行重要职责时，比如监督囚犯与访客的会面。
在弗拉克斯的控制下，典狱长不能施展她准备好的法术，也不能使用高度警戒的命令词（见"{@area High Alert|15c|x} "部分），只能说矮人语，并且偶尔会放纵弗拉克斯对啤酒和烈酒的恶习。

典狱长Marthannis知道，要摆脱Vlax的灵魂，她必须去Gauntlgrym的Brawnanvil墓穴，那是Hotenow山下的一个矮人堡垒（靠近Neverwinter），Vlax的亲属的灵魂可以劝说Vlax加入他们的来世。然而，典狱长拒绝前往，因为她不忍心与弗拉克斯失去所有联系。典狱长已经把她的状态告诉了狱警和赦免委员会的成员，他们已经习惯了她的性格变化和狂欢的场面。附身并没有影响监狱长履行职责的能力，到目前为止，没有人质疑她是否适合她的工作。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 在密室的陈设中，有一个上锁的木箱，典狱长携带着唯一的钥匙。一个使用盗贼工具的角色可以使用一个动作来尝试撬开锁，只要成功地进行DC20的灵巧检查就可以了。附身并没有影响监狱长履行职责的能力，到目前为止，没有人质疑她是否适合她的工作。
箱子里有一套{@item calligrapher's supplies|PHB}，一个{@item sack|PHB}装有750金币(主要用于支付放下囚犯和货物的船长的钱)，以及一个印有哈珀斯人标志的银质斗篷胸针(25金币)：一个小小的竖琴依偎在新月的犄角间。
任何在箱子里寻找秘密隔间的角色都会在盖子上找到一个。里面有一个{@item wand of binding}，是典狱长为应对紧急情况而保留的。

entries.name: R22: Office

entries: 一张厚重的书桌矗立在房间中央，羊皮纸、羽毛笔和墨水都已准备就绪。东边的墙上有五个厚重的木柜。
监狱记录存放在这里的上锁柜子里。柜子里还有船舶货物清单和过去的交货记录，以及囚犯转移单和记录每一个曾被关押在雷夫岛的囚犯的姓名、罪行、刑期和减刑的分类账。这些记录包括在监禁期间死亡的囚犯的死亡证明。死因总是被写成 "自然"、"意外 "或 "非自然"，没有细节。
房间中间的一张桌子上有十本财务账簿，装在侧面一个上了锁的抽屉里。桌子和柜子的钥匙都在典狱长手里。一个拥有盗贼工具的角色可以使用一个行动来尝试撬开桌子抽屉或其中一个柜子的锁，只要成功地进行DC12灵巧检查就可以了。

entries.name: R23: Tower Roof
entries: 这个平坦的屋顶比监狱屋顶高140英尺，比海平面高300英尺。北部、西南部和东南部的三面6英尺高的墙提供了有限的掩护，但屋顶的大部分都暴露在空气中。
一座木制吊桥可以在一侧放下，形成一个飞艇码头。提升或降低吊桥需要一个行动。
这里没有驻扎警卫。如果监狱瞭望台上的守卫({@area area R9|16a|x})看到有飞艇或空中威胁接近雷夫岛，他们会向监狱的其他地方发出警报。典狱长就会穿上防寒服，前往屋顶迎接飞艇人员或亲自处理空中的威胁。

entries.name: Roleplaying Prisoner 13
entries: 人物第一次遇到{@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}时，请阅读以下内容。
这位肌肉紧实的矮人妇女将她的红发剪得很短。她古铜色的皮肤上布满了纹身，从锁骨延伸到脚踝。她用不屑一顾的眼神打量着你。
{@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}是一个狡猾的阴谋家，无情而有耐心。她倾听和观察，吸收每一个细节，并尽可能少地分享她能摆脱的东西。
{@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}对她的生活命运很满意，像冬夜里的一条温暖的毯子一样，享受着雷夫岛的匿名性和讽刺性保护。当她被关在反魔法牢房时，她很谨慎，因为她不能依靠她的魔法纹身来保护自己。在牢房外，她变得过于自信，如果她能在不被守卫抓到的情况下，甚至会与人闲聊。在战斗中，她构成了强大的威胁，在近战和远程战斗中都能制造火焰爆炸并以魔法力量进行打击。
她把时间花在思考她通过监狱外的特工的眼睛、耳朵和手了解到的阴谋网。当她每天在院子里锻炼时或在做家务时在牢房外，她与她的特工联系，了解最新情况，并作出安排，以保持她的网络运行。

entries.name: Prisoner 13's Tattoos
entries: {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}的大部分墨迹都被她的制服所覆盖。她的刺青包括以下内容。

items.name: Dwarven Poetry
items.entry: 在她的脖子上和肩胛骨上有一首矮人文字的诗歌节选，上面写着："无尽的梦想被埋在石头里。"

items.name: Flames
items.entry: 绚烂的火焰风暴覆盖了她的背部和肋骨。

items.name: Shroud
items.entry: 黑色和灰色的烟和影子沿着她的左臂盘旋而下，在她左手的手指上以符文结束。

items.name: Knotwork
items.entry: Purple and blue knotwork and runes run down her right arm, across the back of her right hand, and down the length of each finger. The runes on her fingers, known as the keystone tattoo, form the key to the vault in Gauntlgrym. The characters must acquire this key to complete their mission (see "{@area Acquiring the Key|18b|x}" below).

items.name: Mountain
items.entry: 银色和棕色的山峰覆盖着她的胸部，山峰的尖端顺着她锁骨的棱角。

items.name: River
items.entry: 旋转的绿色和蓝色的水在她的肚子上形成了一条层层叠叠的河流，有鳞片的生物从水中露出来。

items.name: Power and Plunder
items.entry: 她臀部上的矮人文字写着 "权力 "和 "掠夺"。

entries: Traced among {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}'s tattoos are tiny magical sigils, each one matching a twin tattooed on one of her agents. A character who examines any visible tattoos and succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check notices some of the hidden marks. A character who succeeds on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check determines that the sigils have something to do with minds or telepathy.

entries.name: Acquiring the Key
entries: If she's approached with the possibility of freedom, {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV} looks genuinely surprised but quickly assumes her usual neutral mask. Here's how she responds to some likely questions:
{@b What do you know about the vault and key?}她装作腼腆。"我不知道你是什么意思。" 如果进一步追问，她耸耸肩。"以前有人问过我这个金库和钥匙的事。假设我确实知道钥匙可能在哪里，那我有什么东西可以告诉你？"
{@b Do you want to be set free?} "虽然我对你的关心感到受宠若惊，但恐怕我必须拒绝。我在这里很好，谢谢。"
{@b What do you want for the key?} 她在回答之前思考了一会儿。"典狱长有一个账本，可能在她的办公室。它包含了所有曾经被关押在雷夫岛的人的名字、罪行和囚犯编号。把那份名单给我，我保证你能得到你的钥匙。"
作为对口头威胁的回应，{@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}摇摇头说："我可以大闹一场，让警卫们来对付你。甚至可能是典狱长本人。你真的没有什么可以威胁到我的。"

entries.name: Finding the Key
entries: When {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV} talks about the key, each character present can make a DC 19 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check. If the check is successful, the character notices {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV} flexing her right hand and tracing a fingertip across the tattoo there when she mentions the key. The character deduces that the tattoo is the key.

entries.name: Forcible Jailbreak
entries: Taking {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV} alive and delivering her to Varrin is difficult but possible. She won't go willingly and fights back if the characters try to force her. In that case, they'll be hard-pressed to knock her {@condition unconscious} and make their escape without alarming the guards and placing the prison on high alert. If a fight breaks out with closed doors between the battle and the nearest guards, on initiative count 0, make a DC 15 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check for the guards to see if they notice the commotion. If they succeed, roll initiative for the guards. They investigate on the following round.

entries.name: Trade for the Key
entries: If the characters acquire the prisoner files from the warden's office ({@area area R22|184|x}), {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV} demands to read them somewhere outside her cell. She takes 20 minutes to read through the documents and telepathically relay the information to her agents for later use. Following that, she reveals that the tattoo on her right hand is the key to the vault. She allows the characters to study it so they can replicate its image using magic such as {@spell disguise self} or {@spell minor illusion}, or even copy it with pen and ink. In any case, a character must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check to correctly re-create the tattoo, which requires 10 minutes of study or drawing. The characters can retry if they fail, at the cost of more time and more risk of discovery.

entries.name: Last Resort
entries: A gruesome but effective option is killing {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV} and taking her body back, or just her right hand. If the characters are working for the Golden Vault, they know the organization would not approve of this method. The characters receive no reward from the organization if they kill or mutilate {@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}.

entries.name: Conclusion
entries: 当人物成功交付钥匙（{@creature Prisoner 13|KftGV}的钥石纹身）时，瓦林的喜悦和欣慰击碎了他平时矜持的外表，他派他的特工去打开金库，揭开丢失的Axebreaker宝藏（他不允许人物在金库打开时在场）。虽然该部族被盗的大部分财富已经花光，但仍有一笔巨大的财富。由于他们的成功，每当他们中的一个人试图进行影响Axebreaker矮人的魅力检查时，角色们都有优势。瓦林兑现了他的诺言，并按照承诺将公平的份额分给了这些人物。奖励包括以下钱币和宝石（如果角色们协商了3%的费用，则使用括号中的金额）：更多被发现的风险。他们会在下一回合进行调查。

items: 12 (18) {@item Bloodstone||bloodstones} 价值50 gp的Axebreaker矮人。瓦林兑现了他的诺言，并按照承诺将公平的份额分给了这些人物。奖励包括以下钱币和宝石（如果角色们协商了3%的费用，则使用括号中的金额）：更多被发现的风险。他们会在下一回合进行调查。

entries: 角色还可以从以下清单中选择三件魔法物品，如果他们成功谈判，从瓦林那里获得更大的奖励，则可以选择四件。

items: {@item Cap of water breathing}
{@item Dust of disappearance}
{@item Gem of brightness}
{@item Mithral armor}
{@item Potion of Lightning Resistance||Potion of resistance (lightning)}
{@item Slippers of spider climbing}

entries.name: For the Golden Vault
entries: 如果这些人物是为金库工作的，他们必须把钥匙交给瓦林-阿克塞布瑞尔。一旦他们完成了任务，该组织就会奖励角色一个他们选择的稀有魔法物品（须经你批准）作为报酬。该物品将在第二天交付给人物。

data.name: Tockworth's Clockworks
entries: {@i An Adventure for 5th-Level Characters}

The clockwork automatons that guard the svirfneblin town of Little Lockford have attacked the very residents they were meant to keep safe, forcing a town-wide evacuation. At the heart of the matter is Security Overseer {@creature Tixie Tockworth|KftGV}, a tinkerer who has turned malicious.
在这次冒险中，角色们必须进入小洛克福德，找回一把安全钥匙，并使用它来激活一个关闭自动机的故障安全装置。

entries.title: The svirfneblin town of Little Lockford holds many wonders—and many hidden dangers

entries.name: Adventure Background
entries: The clockwork automatons that protect Little Lockford are the creations of a gnome tinkerer named {@creature Tixie Tockworth|KftGV}, who recently decided to become a mechanical being herself. She began with a series of procedures whereby she replaced parts of her body with machinery created in her workshop. At some point, Tockworth lost all compassion and empathy for her fellow townspeople. Her fellow tinkerers urged her to stop what she was doing, but she refused. When the militia tried to shut down her workshop, Tockworth unleashed her automatons on the citizens of Little Lockford, many of whom were killed. The survivors fled and regrouped outside the settlement in a nearby network of Underdark tunnels and caverns. The survivors then magically sealed the doors to Little Lockford to keep Tockworth's automatons from escaping.
在过去的几个星期里，托克沃斯费尽心思地将自己变成了一台机器，在此期间，小洛克福德的其他居民一直在寻找冒险者来帮助他们夺回他们的定居点。在车间里，托克沃斯向小洛克福德的市民释放了她的自动机，其中许多人被杀。幸存者们逃了出来，在定居点外的附近的地下通道和洞穴网络中重新集结。幸存者们随后用魔法封住了小洛克福德的大门，以防止托克沃斯的自动机逃跑。
小洛克福德的镇长布莱斯-布罗德福要求冒险家们潜入小镇，取回最后一次在托克沃斯手中看到的安全钥匙。当用来激活托克沃斯车间里的一个故障安全装置时，这把钥匙会永久地关闭自动装置，使它们变得无害。角色们如何处理托克沃斯，由他们自己决定...... 洛克弗德为防止托克沃斯的自动机逃跑而努力。

entries.name: Using the Golden Vault
entries: 如果你作为赞助人使用金库，那么就会以你认为合适的方式将一把金钥匙送到人物手中。当人物用这把钥匙打开他们的音乐盒时，盖子会弹开，一个舒缓的声音说："在孕期，丹奈尔博士几乎没有选择。"丹奈尔博士说，用水晶包裹它们可以中和它们。Rkenbluff教员和野外科学家，陪同大学的考古人员在该地区进行挖掘。

"Greetings, operatives. We have learned the svirfneblin town of Little Lockford needs your help. {@creature Tixie Tockworth|KftGV}, once entrusted with the town's security, has turned the town's clockwork automatons against the populace. This quest, should you choose to undertake it, requires you to infiltrate Little Lockford, retrieve a security key, and use it to power down the automatons. You are also empowered to stop {@creature Tixie Tockworth|KftGV} from doing further harm to the town. Start by meeting with the town's mayor, Braith Broadfoot. She's waiting for you in the caves outside the gates of Little Lockford. Good luck, operatives."
关上音乐盒，金钥匙就会消失。没有时间可以浪费；蛋随时都可能孵化。首先与丹内尔博士会面。祝你们好运，特工们。"他们是Rkenbluff的教员和野外科学家，陪同大学的考古人员在该地区进行挖掘。"博物馆，偷出蛋，在它释放出超自然的恐怖之前，把它还给Cassee Dannell博士，让它中和。

entries.name: Into the Underdark
entries: 小洛克福德位于地下世界，但通往该定居点的隧道交通便利，相对容易通行。在每个路口都可以找到由{@spell continual flame}法术照亮的石牌，指出通往定居点的道路。她在小洛克福德门外的山洞里等着你。祝你好运，特工们。"
如果你想让前往小洛克福德的旅程更加有趣，你可以在人物穿过黑暗的隧道时插入一两个随机的遭遇。要确定角色遇到的是什么，请在地下城遭遇表上滚动。

entries.caption: Underdark Encounters
rows: 两个{@creature Grell||grells}从上面掉下来的人物。
The characters hear the clicks and clacks of three {@creature Hook Horror||hook horrors} several minutes before these predators appear and attack.
一个{@creature galeb duhr}显露出来，并试图用Terran语与人物交谈。这个生物很无聊，渴望与人交谈，哪怕只是问问天气情况。
一个{@creature black pudding}从墙上的一个洞里渗出，并进行攻击。
角色们发现了一个微小的发条装置，是由一个svirfneblin矿工留下的。这个装置会产生一个微型火焰，可以用来点燃蜡烛、火把或营火。使用这个装置需要一个行动。
人物进入一个小山洞，里面有一个适合地精使用的石座。这个看起来像是由石笋雕刻而成的宝座，是一个{@creature mimic}，会攻击任何坐在上面的人。
一个名叫Nyx Riddlestone的{@creature Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin)||deep gnome}正在寻找前往Little Lockford的冒险家。尼克斯会说普通话、地精语、泰兰德语和地下语言。她礼貌地问候了这些人物，并表示愿意护送他们去见Broadfoot市长，不会拖延。

entries.name: Meeting the Mayor
entries: Mayor Braith Broadfoot (neutral good, deep gnome {@creature commoner}) speaks Common in addition to Gnomish, Terran, and Undercommon. She and her fellow gnome exiles are gathered in a cavern not too far from the front gates of the Little Lockford. If the characters say they've come to help, the mayor eagerly gives them an overview of the situation:
"我无法告诉你，你能来帮助我们，我们有多高兴！"。我们已经封住了小洛克福德的大门，以遏制夺走这么多无辜生命的威胁。
"几周前，我们的安全监督员托克沃斯，命令她的发条自动机攻击她的同胞。我不知道还能做什么，就下令疏散。但小洛克福德是我们的家，我决心夺回它。
"托克沃斯建造了一个故障安全装置，在发生故障时关闭自动机。这个装置在她的工作室里，由地板上的一个魔法符号保护着，这个符号会扰乱任何踏足它的生物的思维。要激活故障保护装置，你需要一把安全钥匙，托克沃斯把它放在她车间的一个保险柜里。我们需要你找回安全钥匙，用它来关闭发条自动装置。你如何处理托克沃思的问题取决于你。"
Broadfoot镇长提供了一张手绘的小镇地图（给你的玩家一份地图5.1）。匆忙中，这位市长把地图上的医务室（{@area area L4|1b5|x}）和监狱（{@area area L5|1b8|x}）的位置翻了过来。

Mayor Broadfoot also tells the characters about some useful items hidden under her desk in the town hall ({@area area L2|1ab|x}). The characters are free to claim the items for themselves. If asked why the items were left behind, Mayor Broadfoot admits she forgot about them in her rush to evacuate Little Lockford. The items are as follows:

items: Four {@item Potion of Healing||potions of healing}
一包{@item dust of disappearance}的
Two {@item Alchemist's Fire (flask)|PHB|flasks of alchemist's fire}

entries.title: Map 5.1: Players' Map

entries.name: Planning the Heist

entries.title: {@creature Tixie Tockworth|KftGV}

entries: 有了Broadfoot市长的地图，这些人物可以开始计划他们的抢劫。如果他们在Broadfoot市长和她的顾问的陪同下这样做，这些深层地精会分享以下有用的信息。

items.name: Features
items.entry: 侏儒们可以在"{@area General Features|19d|x} "部分分享信息。在计划抢劫时，"{@area Bridges|19e|x} "和"{@area Slagline|1a3|x} "部分尤其重要。

items.name: Tockworth's Automatons
items.entry: If the characters request more information about Tockworth's automatons, use the information in the "{@area Security Forces|1a4|x}" section to describe them.

items.name: Tixie Tockworth
items.entry: 当托克沃斯开始对自己进行神奇的手术，用机器零件替换她身体的一部分时，麻烦就开始了。她的工匠伙伴们敦促她停止这些程序，但她拒绝了。市长命令民兵关闭托克沃斯的工场，但民兵们无法通过工场外的防护罩。在民兵被回绝后，托克沃斯指示她的自动机攻击小洛克福德的其他所有人。

items.name: Warehouse Contraption
items.entry: Warehouse 6, in the Cavemouth district, contains a magical drilling machine big enough to hold two characters (see {@area area L11|1df|x} for details). The svirfneblin have no clue what the characters might use it for, but it could come in handy.

entries.name: Rewards
entries: 如果这些人物找回了安全钥匙并关闭了托克沃斯的自动装置，布罗德福市长就会承诺给予这些人物以下的宝藏。

items: 价值5,000金币的红宝石戒指
{@item Boots of striding and springing}
{@item Driftglobe}
{@item Stone of good luck}

entries: 如果角色们认为一件或多件魔法物品可以帮助他们完成任务，Broadfoot市长同意给他们一件魔法物品作为定金--尽管如果角色们放弃了任务，她希望他们能够归还物品。

entries.name: Shown the Door
entries: 当人物准备进入小洛克福德时，他们被Yombad Cragknuckle中士（中性好{@creature Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin)||deep gnome}）带到了镇上的防御入口，他是幸存的民兵中地位最高的。他面色凝重，走起路来有点跛，胳膊上缠着厚厚的绷带，这都是他在疏散过程中受伤的结果。
克拉克努克中士会说地精语、泰伦语和地下语，但不会说普通话。如果被问及任务的建议，中士会提供以下信息和指导。

items.name: Friendly Advice
items.entry: 中士敦促人物快速而安静地穿过小镇，尽力避开托克沃斯的自动装置。

items.name: Avoid Cavemouth
items.entry: 警长建议这些人物避开洞口区，因为那里可能有怪物。(通常情况下，怪物会被发条自动装置所控制，但它们很可能会从它们的藏身处冒险跑到街上。格里克斯是一个特别讨厌的东西）。

items.name: Healing Aids
items.entry: The sergeant recalls that {@item Potion of Healing||potions of healing} and {@item Healer's Kit|PHB|healer's kits} can be found in the city infirmary in Turbine Heights.

entries: 此外，如果人物向克拉克努克中士展示布罗德福市长提供的小洛克福地图，中士就会指出地图上的医务室（{@area area L4|1b5|x}）和监狱（{@area area L5|1b8|x}）的位置翻来覆去。

entries.name: Little Lockford Overview
entries: 由于其战略位置和靠近宝贵的资源，小洛克福德一直是攻击的目标。因此，深山地精们对该镇进行了加固，下面会有更详细的描述。

entries.name: General Features
entries: 该镇位于一个被岩浆染成红色的巨大洞穴中，岩浆流经分隔各区的通道。总的来说，该镇维护得很好，街道和建筑由灰色石砖组成。其他值得注意的特征在下面的章节中进行了总结。

entries.name: Bridges
entries: Bridges made of wood and metal span the magma lake at various points, connecting the town's various districts to one another. Consoles in the power station ({@area area L6|1bb|x}) and the security center ({@area area L12|1e7|x}) enable these bridges to be raised or lowered, much like a modern-day drawbridge that spans a waterway.
为了控制镇上的交通流量，托克沃斯抬高了以下桥梁：老洛克福德-卡夫茅斯桥、卡夫茅斯-斯莫尔镇桥、斯莫尔镇-涡轮高地两座桥中的一座，以及从老洛克福德和涡轮高地通往眺望台的两座桥。

entries.name: Buildings
entries: 小洛克福德的大部分建筑都是单层的石头结构（约12英尺高），石门高5英尺，宽3英尺。建筑物内部往往没有灯光（这对深藏不露的地精来说并不关心，他们有{@sense darkvision}），而且它们包含了适合地精的家具。
小洛克福德包含许多冒险中没有描述的建筑。如果人物调查了这些建筑中的一个，就在Little Lockford的建筑表上滚动，以确定它是哪种建筑。每座建筑的居住者在逃离小洛克福德之前都带走了所有有价值的东西，没有留下任何有价值的东西让角色们去寻找。

entries.caption: Buildings of Little Lockford
rows: 住所，肮脏的（地精的宿舍），{@dice 4d6}地精的宿舍
住宅，简陋的（地精的宿舍），{@dice 2d6}地精的宿舍。
住宅，富裕的（地精的宿舍），{@dice 1d6}地精的宿舍。
空楼（门上挂着出售的标志）。

entries.name: District Elevations
entries: 虽然大多数地区位于岩浆湖上方150英尺处，但有两个地区没有。俯瞰区，建在岩洞中心的岩层中，位于岩浆之上170英尺。洞口在岩浆之上120英尺。

entries.name: Exterior Lighting
entries: The roof and walls of Little Lockford are bathed in a fiery hue, thanks to the magma that fills the lake and heats the town. The town's power station ({@area area L6|1bb|x}) generates electricity that powers streetlamps in every district, although the streetlamps have gone out in Cavemouth. These lights can be switched on or off from control consoles in the power station and the security center ({@area area L12|1e7|x}).

entries.name: Magma
entries: 任何落入小洛克福德岩浆湖的生物都有可能被立即杀死，除非该生物对火灾伤害有免疫力。任何在一个回合中第一次进入岩浆的生物或在那里开始回合的生物都会受到55({@dice 10d10})的火焰伤害。

entries.name: Slagline
entries: 悬挂在岩浆湖上方的是一个类似旋转木马的悬空钢桶链，称为 "渣线"。这些桶的间距为15英尺。其中大约有一半装着来自矿场的矿石和未切割的宝石；其余的是空的，大到足以装下五个小型生物或两个中型生物。
炉渣线是自动化的，因此炉渣桶在镇上逆时针移动。(通常情况下，来自Cavemouth区的矿石和宝石被接收到Smoldertown区的铸造厂进行熔炼和提炼。加工后的材料再经过涡轮高地运到老洛克福德，在那里由商人和公会工匠出售）。矿渣线交替运行1分钟，然后停顿1分钟，以便有时间装载和卸载矿桶。每当矿渣线停止时，悬挂在岩浆上的水桶就会晃动，轻微摇晃--不过还不至于让里面的东西溢出。
生物可以在四个装载站（两个在Cavemouth，一个在Smoldertown，一个在Old Lockford）中的一个安全地爬进桶里，然后乘坐矿渣线从一个区到另一个区。每当矿渣线停止时，悬浮在岩浆上的桶就会轻微地晃动和摇摆--不过还不至于让它们的东西溢出。

entries.name: Security Forces
entries: 托克沃斯创造了两种主要类型的自动机来保护小洛克福德。

items.name: Clockwork Defenders
items.entry: 小洛克福德有二十个{@creature Clockwork Defender|KftGV|clockwork defenders}(见冒险故事结尾处的它们的描述和状态块)，不包括在小镇撤离时被摧毁的，也不包括{@area area L6|1bb|x}中受损的。

items.name: Clockwork Observers
items.entry: Little Lockford has eight {@creature Clockwork Observer|KftGV|clockwork observers} (see their description and stat block at the end of the adventure). The observers are tasked with monitoring the streets to ensure nothing has penetrated the city's defenses. If an observer detects intruders, it contacts Tockworth telepathically, letting her know where the intruders are. Tockworth then orders the observer to use its next action to emit a piercing shriek, which is loud enough to summon {@dice 1d4} {@creature Clockwork Defender|KftGV|clockwork defenders} (see their description and stat block at the end of the adventure). These reinforcements arrive 2 rounds later. If the number of clockwork defenders summoned is greater than the number left in Little Lockford, adjust the number of reinforcements accordingly.

entries: Other Constructs under Tockworth's control include two suits of {@creature animated armor} (see {@area area L9a|1cf|x}) and a {@creature shield guardian} that lost its master and its control amulet. The shield guardian stands guard outside Tockworth's workshop ({@area area L9|1cb|x}).

entries.name: Wandering Monsters
entries: Each time one or more visible characters exit a building or enter a new district, roll a {@dice d6}. On a roll of 1 or 2 (or just 1 if the characters are trying to be stealthy), they attract the attention of one or more wandering monsters determined by rolling another {@dice d6} and consulting the Wandering Monsters table. See "{@area Security Forces|1a4|x}" above for more information about how many clockwork defenders and clockwork observers are present in Little Lockford.
在Cavemouth区，遇到的怪物都是从矿区爬出来的。角色们在其他地方遇到了托克沃斯的自动机。在小洛克福德，有很多发条防御者和发条观察者，这些援军在2轮后到达。如果召唤出的发条守卫者的数量大于留在小洛克福德的数量，则相应调整增援的数量。

entries.caption: Wandering Monsters
rows: 2{@creature Darkmantle||darkmantles}以下召唤的1{@creature grick}兽人守卫者大于留在小洛克福德的数量，相应调整增援数量。

entries.name: Little Lockford Locations
entries: 在地图5.2上标出了以下地点。

entries.name: Old Lockford (Areas L1–L2)
entries: 老洛克福德是该镇最古老的部分。这里的鹅卵石经过几个世纪的磨砺，已经变得光滑，路灯的样式也比小洛克福德其他地方的路灯更加华丽。街道上躺着一些死去的深层地精；大多数人穿着民兵的武器和盔甲。

entries.name: L1: Entrance and Gatehouse
entries: 当人物准备进入小镇时，读或转述以下内容。
Cragknuckle中士把你带到小洛克福德令人印象深刻的大门外匆匆竖起的堡垒。堡垒由看起来很疲惫的镇民兵保卫，当中士一瘸一拐地走过他们时，他们向中士致敬。
在大门口站岗的是两个身穿黑袍的沉闷地精。在克拉克努克的示意下，这两个地精各自施了一个咒语，使大门在你面前摇晃着打开。当大门打开时，一股热浪冲过壁垒，露出了一个沐浴在地狱之光中、不时被闪电照亮的阴森小镇。
外门关闭时自动上锁。两个值班的地精法师准备了{@spell knock}的法术，他们用这些法术来规避大门复杂的锁闭机制。需要两个{@spell knock}法术才能打开大门。
Cragknuckle中士没有走远。用糯米语，他祝愿人物好运，指示他们敲七次门，以示他们准备离开，并向他们保证他会在这里等他们。(如果人物不说他的语言，中士就用指节敲击外门七次，解释他们必须做什么来示意大门被打开）。
人物一进入城镇，大门就在他们身后锁上了。Cragknuckle中士言出必行，他指示法师，如果他听到另一边有人敲了七次大门，就打开大门。）

entries.name: Gatehouse
entries: 大门内矗立着一座简陋的门楼。{@adventure Map 5.2|KftGV|5|Map 5.2: DM's map}包括一张显示门房内部的插页地图，人物可以把它作为一个休息或重组的地方。门房里有睡觉的地方和一个军械库，在疏散时被清理掉了。）

entries.name: L2: Town Hall

entries: 三个身穿镇上民兵盔甲的地精的尸体摆在市政厅前的台阶上，市政厅的门大开着。
市政厅有一个宽敞的会议厅，可供大型集会使用，后面有三个小办公室。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: From Mayor Broadfoot's office, characters can retrieve four {@item Potion of Healing||potions of healing}, two {@item Alchemist's Fire (flask)|PHB|flasks of alchemist's fire}, and one use of {@item dust of disappearance} in a small packet. These items are kept in an unlocked footlocker under the mayor's desk. On the desk is a {@item Calligrapher's Supplies|PHB|calligraphy set}.

entries.name: Halfway Isle (Area L3)
entries: 半途岛曾经是一个巨大的石笋，直到地精把它的顶部剪掉，形成一个高原，他们在上面建造了深海兄弟的修道院（L3区）。桥梁将半途岛与邻近的老洛克福德区和涡轮高地连接起来。

entries.name: L3. Abbey of the Deep Brother

entries: 道路旁边矗立着一座蹲着的石头建筑，上面有一个石头圆顶。建筑物的入口是一扇双扇门，雕刻得像交错的手，门口正中是一把带短柄的金镐。
{@adventure Map 5.2|KftGV|5|Map 5.2: DM's map}包括一张显示该建筑内部的插图。
检查金镐并成功通过DC13智力({@skill Religion})检查的人物会认出它是深海兄弟的象征，Callarduran Smoothhands，一个被svirfneblin（尤其是矿工和石雕师）崇拜的神。

entries.name: Abbey Interior
entries: 一座4英尺高的卡拉杜兰的雕像，他的脸和身影隐藏在有罩的长袍下，就站在入口处的凹槽里。雕像的右手伸出来，每根粗短的手指上都有石雕的戒指。

修道院中最大的房间，正对着入口，作为一个礼拜场所。低矮的长椅面对着圆顶室的中央，在这里说的每一句话--哪怕是一句悄悄话--都能在整个空间内听到。在这个房间的黑暗角落里潜伏着两名囚犯，他们在撤离小洛克福德时从监狱（{@area area L5|1b8|x}）中逃脱了看守的监管。这两个囚犯--一个叫Slonk的{@creature goblin boss}和一个叫Yuzzik的{@creature bugbear}--手腕上有手铐，没有携带武器。斯隆克是一伙地精强盗的首领，他们在小洛克福德附近的隧道中掠夺旅行者。尤兹克是斯隆克唯一幸存的保镖。两人都不择手段，为了生存几乎无所不用其极，除了背叛对方之外。
修道院的其他房间包括svirfneblin修士的睡眠区，修道院院长的私人房间，以及一个小房间。对这些地方进行搜查，没有发现任何有价值的东西。(一个叫斯隆克的（1%）和一个叫尤兹克的（2%），手腕上有手铐，没有携带武器。斯隆克是一伙地精强盗的首领，他们在小洛克福德附近的隧道中掠夺旅行者。尤兹克是斯隆克唯一幸存的保镖。两人都不择手段，为了生存几乎无所不用其极，除了背叛对方之外。

entries.name: Abbot Kavoda
entries: The abbot {@creature Kavoda|KftGV} tried to flee Little Lockford with his fellow monks, but he didn't get far before one of Tockworth's automatons chased him back to the abbey. Minutes after {@creature Kavoda|KftGV} returned to the abbey, Slonk and Yuzzik showed up. {@creature Kavoda|KftGV} avoided them by casting {@spell meld into stone}. He has been using {@spell meld into stone} spells to hide ever since. As the characters explore the abbey, {@creature Kavoda|KftGV} hears one of them and emerges from a nearby wall when he thinks it's safe to do so.

{@creature Kavoda|KftGV} is a chaotic good {@creature Deep Gnome (Svirfneblin)||deep gnome} who speaks Common, Gnomish, Terran, and Undercommon. His Innate Spellcasting trait includes the ability to cast {@spell meld into stone} three times per day. He wears a gray robe instead of armor (AC 12) and carries a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell magic weapon} and a {@item Potion of Hill Giant Strength||potion of giant strength (hill)}.

{@creature Kavoda|KftGV} doesn't want to stay in Little Lockford any longer. Desperate and hungry, he begs the characters to escort him safely to Little Lockford's outer gates ({@area area L1|1a8|x}), offering his magic items if they accept the quest. He insists they deliver him to the gates by the most direct route without delay, and he protests loudly if they dawdle or deviate from this course of action. If he is separated from the characters or wounded, {@creature Kavoda|KftGV} runs back to the abbey, crying "Callarduran, protect me!" all the way.

entries.name: Turbine Heights (Areas L4–L6)
entries: 涡轮高地是民兵成员和他们的家人居住的地方。这个区还包括一个发电站和一个医务室。"回到修道院，一路喊着 "卡拉杜兰，保护我！"。"在小洛克福德附近的隧道里掠夺旅行者的地精强盗。尤兹克是斯隆克唯一幸存的保镖。两人都不择手段，为了生存几乎无所不用其极，除了背叛对方之外。
当人物第一次到达透平山庄时，请阅读以下文字：Ving bodyguard。两人都不择手段，为了生存几乎无所不用其极，除了背叛对方之外。
这个区的街道充满了蒸汽。透过雾霾，你可以看到明亮的路灯和废弃的建筑。每隔15秒，就有一道电弧从该区中央的金属塔上射向其他区的类似塔。

The electrically charged metal tower is attached to the roof of the power station ({@area area L6|1bb|x}). Due to a backup at the station, steam has overflowed into the streets of Turbine Heights. Consequently, the district is {@book lightly obscured|PHB|8|Vision and Light}, as if by fog. A {@spell gust of wind} spell rids a street of steam for 1 minute.

entries.name: L4. Infirmary

entries: 在这栋单层建筑的入口处，悬挂着一个描绘拐杖的石牌。牌子下面的双门是虚掩着的，露出外面的走廊。
双层门外是一条长长的黑暗走廊，走廊一侧有三个小检查室，另一侧有三个小储藏室（见下文 "宝藏"）。在走廊的远端，另一扇双扇门的后面，是一间手术室。彻底搜查医务室的人物可以找到地精用的拐杖和轮椅，以及绷带和其他普通的医疗用品。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 掠夺储藏室的角色可以找到六个{@item Healer's Kit|PHB|healer's kits}和六个{@item Potion of Healing||potions of healing}.可以找到地精大小的拐杖和轮椅，以及绷带和其他普通的医疗用品。

entries.name: L5: Jail

entries: 这座坚固的两层石制建筑有一扇沉重的铁门，悬挂着。在建筑前面，四个穿着盔甲的死地精躺在一个像狗一样的自动机的碎片中。

The dead gnomes lying in the street are prison guards who were killed by Tockworth's automatons. The guards managed to destroy one of the clockwork defenders that attacked them, but the prisoners they were escorting slipped away (and ended up in {@area area L3|1af|x}). Characters who search the corpses find a small ring of keys. These keys unlock all the cells in the jail.

entries.name: Building Interior
entries: {@adventure Map 5.2|KftGV|5|Map 5.2: DM's map}包括显示这个两层建筑的两层的插图。底层有一个厨房和食堂，供狱卒使用，还有一个为狱长保留的办公室。一个螺旋形的楼梯连接到上层，那里有牢房。这些钥匙可以打开监狱里所有的牢房。

entries.name: L6: Power Station

entries: 一座三十英尺高的金属塔从这座块状的单层石头建筑的屋顶延伸出来。这座塔发出噼里啪啦的电流声，并喷出蒸汽云。每隔15秒，它就会放出一道闪电弧，跳到另一个区的塔上，也就是监狱里的牢房。
电站产生的电力为桥梁、矿渣线（见冒险故事前面的"{@area General Features|19d|x}"）和散布在镇上的各种车间提供动力。电力是通过电弧塔传输的，比如从发电站屋顶升起的那个。

entries.name: Building Interior
entries: {@adventure Map 5.2|KftGV|5|Map 5.2: DM's map}包括一张显示发电站内部的插图，你可以这样描述。
发电站的内部是一个大房间，充满了波涛汹涌的蒸汽云。四个嚎叫的涡轮机占据了大部分的空间。铁制台阶通向房间西侧一个六英尺高的铁制阳台。阳台的北端有一个铁梯子，可以爬到屋顶的活板门。阳台还支撑着一个金属控制台。

entries.name: Damaged Turbine
entries: A power station worker was cornered by a clockwork defender at the north end of the balcony and shoved the automaton off the balcony into the northwest turbine. One of the clockwork defender's hind legs became stuck in the turbine, causing the turbine to malfunction. Characters within 10 feet of the northwest turbine can see the damaged {@creature clockwork defender|KftGV}, which has 24 hit points remaining. This defender is {@condition restrained} and unable to free itself, but it can attack creatures that come within reach of it.

Once the clockwork defender is defeated, a character can use an action to try to dislodge it from the turbine, doing so with a successful DC 17 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check. Removing the clockwork defender's mangled leg from the turbine's machinery causes the power station to stop spewing steam, with the steam throughout Turbine Heights dissipating {@dice 1d10} minutes later.

entries.name: Control Console
entries: The metal console overlooking the turbines is inscribed with a map of the town. Next to this map are several switches: one for every bridge and district, one for the Slagline (see "{@area General Features|19d|x}"), and one for the power station. All are described below:

items.name: Bridge Switches
items.entry: There's one switch for each of Little Lockford's nine bridges. A bridge can be raised by turning its switch to the left or lowered by turning its switch to the right.

items.name: District Switches
items.entry: 小Lockford的六个区（Cavemouth, Halfway Isle, Old Lockford, the Overlook, Smoldertown, and Turbine Heights）各有一个开关。一个区的路灯可以通过将该区的开关转到左边来关闭，或者通过将其开关转到右边来开启，阳台上还支撑着一个金属控制台。

items.name: Slagline Switch
items.entry: 炉渣线有一个开关。把它转到左边，可以关闭斗链。把它转到右边，就会打开斗链。阳台上还支持一个金属控制台。

items.name: Station Shutdown Switch
items.entry: 把这个开关转到左边，可以关闭发电站的涡轮机，导致全镇的路灯关闭，关闭矿渣线，并阻止镇上的桥梁升高或降低。把它转到右边，就能重新通电。

entries.name: Smoldertown (Areas L7–L9)
entries: 当人物第一次进入这个地区时，请描述如下。
热金属的刺鼻臭味笼罩着这个地区。这里的建筑没有任何装饰，几乎每一个表面都被几十年的污垢和烟尘所凝结。还有几具地精的尸体面朝下躺在砂砾中。
拥有众多工场和铁匠铺的斯莫尔德镇，是小洛克福德的工业中心。托克沃斯的工场（{@area area L9|1cb|x}）就在这里，但托克沃斯本人正在Motherlode酒馆（L8区）休息。

entries.name: L7: Foundry

entries: 充满煤烟的铸造厂矗立在这个地区的边缘，俯瞰着远处的岩浆湖。它巨大的推拉门敞开着，露出黑暗的熔炉和沉默的机器。一个凸起的装货码头允许人们进入渣线的吊桶，这些吊桶将未精炼的矿石送到铸造厂。
{@adventure Map 5.2|KftGV|5|Map 5.2: DM's map}包括一张显示铸造厂内部的插页地图，它是一个巨大的开放空间。该建筑没有天花板，允许热量和烟气排出。矿渣线桶里的矿石可以通过滑道倒入铸造厂的五个大炉子中的任何一个。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Characters who loot the foundry find three sets of {@item smith's tools|PHB} and two sets of {@item tinker's tools|PHB}.

entries.name: L8: Motherlode Tavern

entries: 在这栋阴暗的石头建筑的入口处，悬挂着一个油漆木牌，上面描绘着从一个酒壶中倒出的宝石。一个小小的魔法效果使这些宝石闪烁着诱人的光芒。
{@adventure Map 5.2|KftGV|5|Map 5.2: DM's map}包括一张显示酒馆内部的插页地图，其中包括一个酒窖和一个酒窖。

entries.name: Cellar
entries: 地窖里有几箱不值钱的用品，几桶当地酿造的蘑菇啤酒，叫做Rubbleclub Classic（以其酿造者svirfneblin Glyphy Rubbleclub命名），还有几桶橡木威士忌，叫做Oofenklanger's Finest（以最初蒸馏的家族命名）。

entries.name: Taproom
entries: The taproom contains seating areas, including a row of stools next to a low bar made of carved basalt. Hanging above the bar are two soot-stained lanterns with {@spell continual flame} spells cast inside them. Half-drunk flagons of flat mushroom beer rest on the bar and on the tables, abandoned by patrons in their haste to evacuate Little Lockford.

entries.name: Tixie Tockworth
entries: Unless she was defeated elsewhere, {@creature Tixie Tockworth|KftGV} (see her description and stat block at the end of the adventure) sits on the barstool farthest from the entrance, cradling an empty flagon while mumbling to herself.

入侵者的出现使托克沃思感到困惑、不安和恼怒。如果她被这里的人物撞见，或者{@spell alarm}的咒语在{@area area L9b|1d3|x}的保险箱上触发，她会施放{@spell dimension door}，并通过咒语的魔法门进入L9b区域。当她离开时，她说："休息时间结束了，波茨！" (人物无从知晓，但Poots是Tockworth在童年时发明的一个想象中的朋友的名字。这个失散多年的想象中的朋友最近又出现了，以回应托克沃斯日益增长的孤独感）。
这个没有窗户的两层楼结构有一个单门，藏在一楼的一个角落附近。站在门前的是一个八英尺高、由碎石、生锈的金属和绿铜制成的双足建筑。它沉重的铁手套紧握成拳，构成其头部的不祥的头盔缓慢地左右转动。 托克沃斯在童年时发明的一个想象中的朋友的名字。这个失散多年的想象中的朋友最近又出现了，以回应托克沃斯日益增长的孤独感）。

entries.name: Shield Guardian
entries: The construct blocking passage into Tockworth's workshop is a {@creature shield guardian} that lacks the Spell Storing trait. Its creator and control amulet were destroyed long ago. Tockworth found a way to reanimate the shield guardian without having to create a new amulet, rendering the shield guardian autonomous. The shield guardian has been loyal to Tockworth ever since. It defends itself if attacked and attacks anyone who tries to slip past it. It is too big to fit through the workshop's front door.

entries.name: Workshop Interior
entries: {@adventure Map 5.2|KftGV|5|Map 5.2: DM's map}包括显示托克沃斯工作室两层楼的内页地图，在{@area L9a|1cf|x}和{@area L9b|1d3|x}区域有描述。它太大了，无法穿过工场的前门。从一边慢慢转到另一边。 托克沃思在童年时发明的一个想象中的朋友的名字。这个失散多年的想象中的朋友最近又出现了，以回应托克沃斯日益增长的孤独感）。

entries.title: Animated suits of armor do much of the assembly work in Tockworth's workshop

entries.name: L9a: Workshop, Lower Floor

entries: 一楼是一个大的工作区，包含一个熔炼器、装满钟表零件的鼓和一系列令人眼花缭乱的工具。一面墙上挂着一个铁梯子，梯子的尽头是天花板上的一个活板门。这个想象中的朋友最近又出现了，以回应托克沃斯日益增加的孤独感。）
刻在地板上的是一个复杂的几何图案，在灯光下跳动。在这个设计的中间，嵌入地板的是一个一英尺见方的金属盒，上面有一个钥匙孔。

This workshop is where Tockworth creates her clockwork automatons. Two suits of {@creature animated armor} named Rack and Pinion serve as her assistants and perform most of the hands-on work. These Constructs attack intruders on sight.
The workshop contains a smelter used to fabricate parts and tools. There are enough tools here to assemble one set of {@item smith's tools|PHB} and one set of {@item tinker's tools|PHB}.
天花板上的活板门通向L9b区。

entries.name: Geometric Design
entries: 一个{@spell detect magic}的法术在刻在地板上的复杂几何符号周围显示出一个禁咒魔法的光环。当托克沃斯以外的生物在一个回合中第一次进入符号上方的空间或在那里开始回合时，该生物会成为一个持续时间为1分钟的{@spell crown of madness}法术的目标（保存DC 15）。

entries.name: Fail-Safe Device
entries: If Tockworth's security key is inserted into the metal box embedded in the floor and turned counterclockwise, Little Lockford's clockwork defenders and clockwork observers are rendered {@condition unconscious} indefinitely. Turning the key clockwise deactivates the magic of the geometric design on the floor and ends any ongoing effects of its magic. The security key is kept in Tockworth's safe (in area L9b).
工作室的上层由一个稀疏的房间组成，里面摆放着一张简单的小床和布满图表的工作桌。一个边长五英尺的铁制保险箱靠墙而立，其厚实的金属门上装有密码锁和一个把手，可以发挥其魔法效果。安全钥匙被保存在托克沃斯的保险箱里（在L9b区）。 该钥匙的持续时间为1分钟。

entries.name: Safe
entries: 保险箱不能被移动，一个{@spell detect magic}的法术在它周围显示出一个堕落魔法的光环.fe(在L9b区域)。该光环的持续时间为1分钟。

装备有盗贼工具的角色可以花1分钟时间尝试打开保险箱的门，只要成功地进行DC20的灵巧检查就可以做到。或者，一个角色可以花1分钟的时间把耳朵贴在保险箱的门上，试图巧妙地打开它的密码锁，在成功通过DC 16的灵巧（{@skill Sleight of Hand}）或智慧（{@skill Perception}）检查后打开门。当在5英尺范围内说出适当的命令词（"Poots"），保险箱的门也会打开。一个{@spell knock}的咒语或类似的魔法也能打开保险箱。

entries.name: Tixie Tockworth
entries: If the safe door is opened by any means other than speaking the proper command word, a mental {@spell alarm} spell alerts {@creature Tixie Tockworth|KftGV} (see her description and stat block at the end of the adventure). Unless she was defeated in {@area area L8|1c6|x}, Tockworth uses a {@spell dimension door} spell to appear in the middle of the room and attacks any burglars she sees.
If Tockworth is reduced to 40 hit points or fewer, she uses her next action to cast {@spell dimension door} again, then steps through the doorway into {@area area L12|1e7|x}.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: The safe contains an onyx-studded jewelry box worth 250 gp. The box is unlocked and holds the following items:

items: 锆石戒指 (60 gp)
三个{@item Amethyst||amethysts}(每个100gp)
在{@area area L9a|1cf|x}的故障安全装置的安全钥匙（该钥匙长8英寸，由黄铜制成，并装饰有钟表设计）。

entries.name: Cavemouth (Areas L10–L11)
entries: 当人物第一次进入Cavemouth时，阅读以下文字。
采矿设备被遗弃在这个阴暗的地区的小巷和石笋般的街道上。
The Cavemouth district is where most of Little Lockford's miners live and work. Two roads lead to the mines, which are not shown on {@adventure map 5.2|KftGV|5|Map 5.2: DM's map}.
通往Cavemouth的桥梁已被抬高，整个地区的路灯已被关闭。人物可以通过{@area area L6|1bb|x}或{@area area L12|1e7|x}的控制台降低桥梁并打开路灯。

entries.name: Mines
entries: The mine entrances, once protected by Tockworth's automatons, are now unguarded. The mines are beyond the scope of the adventure. If the characters insist on exploring them, they eventually attract the attention of a wandering {@creature cloaker} that tries to frighten them away with haunting moans.

entries.name: L10: Miners' Guildhall

entries: 在这栋巨大的、镶有宝石的建筑的敞开的门口上方，悬挂着一个石牌，描绘着一把镐和一把锤子。
矿工公会大厅有高级公会成员的办公室，坚固的金属储物柜，矿工可以存放他们的装备，还有功能性的淋浴器。这座建筑以前的大部分住户都匆匆忙忙地搬走了，留下了散落在各处的杂物设备。

entries.name: Guildmaster Deepdelve
entries: A thorough search of the building reveals the corpse of a robed deep gnome named Schnella Deepdelve, the master of the town's miners' guild. Schnella refused to leave and died fending off Tockworth's clockwork defenders. Her restless soul lurks in this building, manifesting as a troublesome {@creature specter} known as a {@creature poltergeist} (see the "Variant: Poltergeist" sidebar in the "Specter" entry of the {@book Monster Manual|MM}).

Characters who disturb the body or spend more than 1 minute in the guildhall anger the poltergeist, which hurls picks and iron spikes at them until they leave or until the poltergeist is destroyed. The poltergeist is {@condition invisible} and can't speak.

entries.name: L11: Warehouse 6

entries: Bright light seeps through cracks around the sliding metal doors of this otherwise nondescript warehouse.
如果人物滑开了门，请阅读。
仓库的内部是一个开放的空间，大约20英尺宽，30英尺长。仓库中间停放着一辆奇怪的带踏板的金属车。嵌在车体上的石英宝石向各个方向发光。安装在这个装置前面的是一个大的、锥形的钻头。在这个装置的后面是一个封闭的、三英尺见方的钢铁舱门。车辆旁边的地板上躺着两个穿着盔甲的地精尸体和一滩油。

The dead gnomes are two {@creature Mimic||mimics} that attack anyone who touches or otherwise disturbs them. The mimics are working with a {@creature Gray Ooze||psychic gray ooze} (see the "Variant: Psychic Gray Ooze" sidebar in the "Oozes" entry of the {@book Monster Manual|MM})—the "puddle of oil" mentioned above. The gray ooze and the mimics recently crept into the warehouse and are waiting for food to come to them.

entries.name: Contraption
entries: 仓库里的车辆是一台大型的、神奇的钻孔机，是小洛克福德的矿工们用来挖掘新隧道的。这辆车具有{@item apparatus of Kwalish}的属性，但有这些变化：rehouse和正在等待食物来到他们身边。在这个装置的后面是一个封闭的、三英尺见方的钢铁舱门。车辆旁边的地板上躺着两个穿着盔甲的地精尸体和一滩油。

items.name: Treads
items.entry: 它没有腿和尾巴，而是有踏板，使它的行走速度达到30英尺。Uare钢铁舱门。车辆旁边的地板上躺着两个穿着盔甲的地精尸体和一滩油。

items.name: Burrowing Speed
items.entry: 它没有游泳的速度，而是有10英尺的钻探速度。使用它的钻头，它可以钻过坚固的岩石，在身后留下一条10英尺宽、10英尺高的隧道。

items.name: Lever 1
items.entry: 将控制杆1移到向上的位置，就可以启动钻头。将同一控制杆移到向下的位置，则关闭电钻。

items.name: Lever 9
items.entry: 将杠杆9移到向上的位置，使该装置以其行走速度向后移动。将同一杆子移到向下的位置，则停止其向后运动。

entries.name: Ignus Flint
entries: An inventor named Ignus Flint (lawful neutral, deep gnome {@creature mage} who speaks Common, Gnomish, Terran, and Undercommon) built the contraption and recently locked himself inside it with enough food and water to keep himself alive for 1 week. A metal hatch at the back of the vehicle is the only entrance, and Ignus used a {@item spell scroll} of {@spell arcane lock} to seal it. A character can use an action to try to pull open the magically sealed hatch, doing so with a successful DC 25 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. If the characters knock on the contraption, they hear Ignus's muffled voice shout, "Go away!" in Gnomish. Ignus attacks anyone who breaks into his contraption but surrenders if reduced to 10 hit points or fewer.

Ignus and Tockworth are rivals, and Ignus long suspected Tockworth's experiments would prove troublesome for Little Lockford. His public warnings about Tockworth went ignored, however. A character can use an action to try to convince Ignus to help them, first by impressing on him the importance of freeing Little Lockford from Tockworth's control and then by succeeding on a DC 14 Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check. Once coaxed into helping the characters, Ignus pilots his contraption anywhere they need him to go. The vehicle has enough space inside for Ignus plus one other passenger. If a character asks Ignus to allow the party to drive the contraption, he adamantly refuses to part with his prized invention.

entries.name: Questioning Ignus
