Their true names are known to an outlaw called {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}, who is being transported to Mechanus on an interplanar train called the Concordant Express. This quest, should you choose to undertake it, requires you board the train, locate {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}, and acquire the true names from them. Expect to be contacted shortly by a quadrone named Glitch, a former train operative who now works for us. Good luck, operatives."
关上音乐盒，金钥匙就会消失。没有时间可以浪费；蛋随时都可能孵化。首先与丹内尔博士会面。祝你们好运，特工们。"他们是Rkenbluff的教员和野外科学家，陪同大学的考古人员在该地区进行挖掘。"博物馆，偷出蛋，在它释放出超自然的恐怖之前，把它还给Cassee Dannell博士，让它中和。

entries.name: Glitch the Quadrone
entries: Not long after agreeing to undertake the adventure, the characters encounter a friendly {@creature quadrone} named Glitch. (When and where this happens is up to you.) The quadrone used to oversee hospitality on the Concordant Express. For this reason, it was imbued with the ability to speak Celestial, Common, and Infernal in addition to Modron.
来自两个五角星上级的矛盾指令造成了一个故障，促使这个困惑的四角星辞职。格里奇已经成为一个自由思考的生命，没有意愿重新融入莫德隆的等级制度中。
渴望帮助这些人物，格力奇用普通话与他们交谈。

"Ah, hello! Yes, good, finally—friends looking to catch {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}—{@creature the Stranger|KftGV} who has already been caught. Here, take this map. It shows the train cars. Here are your tickets and a pen to write down names. Not ordinary names—secret names! I am Glitch, by the way."

Glitch hands the characters an old blueprint of the Concordant Express (see {@area map 11.1|412|x}), one train ticket per character, and an ink pen. The tickets are made from paper-thin sheets of brass and grant passage to Mechanus aboard the Concordant Express. Each ticket is stamped with a boarding time, and the characters have 24 hours until the train departs.
当人物准备好时，Glitch会把他们带到火车上（见下面的"{@area Catching the Train|416|x}"），并在这期间与他们呆在一起。格里奇还分享了以下信息。

items.name: Configuration
items.entry: Like most trains, the Concordant Express includes an Engine Car at the front and a Caboose at the back. The number of other train cars and their configuration can change, so Glitch can't say much more about the size of the train or the order in which the cars will be arranged. The configuration of the cars might be different than what's shown on the blueprint. (In fact, it is. See the "{@area Train Configuration|413|x}" section for details.)

items.name: Fuel
items.entry: 火车的燃料是由宝物提供的，宝物被保存在发动机车厢内。

items.name: Location of the Stranger
items.entry: {@creature The Stranger|KftGV} is likely being held in the Jail Car, which has a skylight.

items.name: Patrols
items.entry: 莫德隆人在列车外部巡逻。

items.name: Teleportation Ward
items.entry: 生物不能传送到火车里或从火车里出来。

entries.name: The Concordant Express
entries: 协和快车是一个穿越多元宇宙的发条机车。摩德隆人以数学的精度建造了这辆火车，他们也以同样的方式操作它。火车的指挥者是它的智者引擎车，它将乘客和货物按计划送到预定目的地。
对于火车来说，没有什么地形是太崎岖的。就像组成麦格纳斯的陆地一样，协和快车的车轮是一个交错的齿轮网络。一系列的机械臂迅速地将悬浮的铁轨放置在火车前面，而车箱下面的类似机械臂则收集尾部的铁轨，并将它们送到引擎车。这个系统使列车能够穿越荒凉的环境，并根据需要调整路线。

entries.title: Map 11.1: Players' Map

entries.name: Train Configuration
entries: 列车有三节强制车厢和三节自选车厢，如下所述。

entries.name: Mandatory Cars
entries: 在这次冒险中，协和快车有以下汽车各一辆。

items: Caboose({@area area E1|423|x})是最后面的车。
The Engine Car ({@area area E9|448|x}) is the frontmost car.
The train has one Jail Car ({@area area E8|441|x}), which is adjacent to the Engine Car (not the Caboose, as shown on map 11.1).

entries.name: Optional Cars
entries: {@area Map 11.2|422|x}包括六辆额外汽车的地图。算盘车（{@area area E2|427|x}）、水族馆车（{@area area E3|42a|x}）、货运车（{@area area E4|42d|x}）、Planartarium车（{@area area E5|42f|x}）、客运车（{@area area E6|432|x}）和神庙车（{@area area E7|43e|x}）。
从这些车厢中任选三辆，以任何适合你的配置将它们添加到火车上，前提是必须的车厢保持原位。(你可以在每次冒险时选择一组不同的可选车厢）。
你可以在火车上增加三个以上的可选车厢，但有可能会增加抢劫的长度和难度。相反，你可以选择较少的车厢，以获得更短、更容易的抢劫。

entries.name: Catching the Train
entries: Embedded in Glitch's body is an {@item amulet of the planes} that turns to dust (along with the rest of the quadrone) if Glitch is reduced to 0 hit points. Glitch uses this built-in amulet to cast {@spell plane shift}, delivering itself and the characters to a field in {@book the Outlands|DMG|2|The Outlands and Sigil} (see the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|DMG} for more information about this plane of existence). There they must wait for the train to arrive.
当火车接近人物的位置时，阅读以下文字。
你在一片草地上打发时间，等待火车的到来。几英里外，一个巨大的岩石尖顶升入天空，其顶峰消失在云中。
格里奇变得焦躁不安，不耐烦。突然，远处响起的喇叭声吸引了格力奇的注意力，也吸引了你的注意力，因为地平线上出现了一道烟柱。"好，"格力奇说。"它来了，很准时！"
一辆火车头穿过天空向你飞驰而来，在它面前铺设了神奇的轨道。当它接近时，你可以看到发条肢体正在拆卸火车后面的铁轨，并将它们向前传递，以便火车头能够在自己面前铺设新的铁轨。
当火车下降到地面时，它的号角再次响起。它从你身边转过来，逐渐停下来，直到它的车箱在不远处，指向你的方向。
"拿到票了吗？"格力奇问道。"很好。现在去吧。把你的票给驾驶室里的莫德隆看。这就是我离开你们的地方。再见了，朋友们！"
格里奇在这时退出冒险，用它的{@item amulet of the planes}回到它来的地方。

entries.name: Boarding the Train
entries: 车厢({@area area E1|423|x})可以作为一个火车站。里面有一个亭子，里面有一个内置打票器的{@creature duodrone}服务员。所有的乘客都必须在这个打票机上打好票，然后才允许他们去探索火车的其他部分。

If one or more characters refuse to get their tickets punched, the duodrone whistles (no action required), causing four {@creature Tridrone||tridrones} to emerge from hidden compartments in the walls and act as described in area E1. If the characters then comply to avoid an altercation, the tridrones return to their compartments.

entries.name: Choo, Choo!
entries: 一旦人物的票打好了，火车也准备好了，就读下面的文字。
机器发出呜呜声和咔嚓声，火车颤抖着向前爬行，逐渐加快了速度。另一声喇叭响起，预示着协和号快车再次启程。

entries.name: General Features
entries: Concordant Express具有以下特点。

items.name: Ceilings
items.entry: 除非文本中另有说明，否则汽车天花板为15英尺高。

items.name: Doors
items.entry: 每辆车的两端都有一个滑动的金属门。监狱车的门是锁着的（详见{@area area E8|441|x}）；其他的门都没有上锁。

items.name: Flight
items.entry: 火车的飞行速度为60英尺，不能悬停。

items.name: Lighting
items.entry: 所有的汽车都被嵌在天花板上的神奇球体照得明亮。

items.name: Modrons
items.entry: 在Concordant Express上服务的所有莫德隆人都不说莫德隆以外的语言，除非文本另有规定。

items.name: Teleportation Ward
items.entry: 生物不能传送进入或离开火车，也不能传送到它周围120英尺内的任何空间。任何这样做的尝试都是徒劳的。

entries.name: Moving on the Train
entries: To reach {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}, the characters must make their way from the Caboose ({@area area E1|423|x}) to the Jail Car ({@area area E8|441|x}).

entries.name: Crossing between Cars
entries: 生物可以通过踏过位于车厢外部平台之间的耦合器，安全地从一个车厢移动到另一个车厢。

entries.name: Falling off the Train
entries: If an effect would result in a creature falling off the train, the creature must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw. On a success, the creature instead falls {@condition prone} in the nearest unoccupied space on the train. On a failure, the creature is sucked into the train's undercarriage, taking 33 ({@dice 6d10}) bludgeoning damage and landing {@condition prone} in an unoccupied space at either end of the nearest train car.
如果一个角色从车厢上掉下来，火车的轨道回收臂就会把这个角色抓起来，并把他们放到监狱车厢的一个空牢房里（{@area area E8|441|x}）。

entries.name: Guard Patrols
entries: Hostile modrons patrol the rooftops of the cars, attacking anyone they see who isn't supposed to be there. Whenever one or more characters reach the midpoint of a rooftop on any car other than the Jail Car, roll a {@dice d6} and use the Guard Patrols table to determine if an encounter occurs. Assume the patrol begins the encounter on the rooftop of an adjoining car. All the modrons have {@sense truesight}, and characters on the rooftop have nowhere to hide.
No random encounters occur on the roof of the Jail Car until after the squad of pentadrones stationed there is defeated (see {@area area E8|441|x} for details).

entries.caption: Guard Patrols
rows: Three {@creature Tridrone||tridrones} and one {@creature quadrone} leader
Four {@creature Quadrone||quadrones} and one {@creature pentadrone} leader

entries.name: Strong Winds
entries: 在火车行驶过程中，爬上火车外侧或在其15英尺范围内飞行的生物会受到强风的影响，其效果如下。

items.name: Difficult Terrain
items.entry: The wind-whipped exterior of the train is {@book difficult terrain|PHB|8|Difficult Terrain}.

items.name: Ranged Attacks
items.entry: 范围内的武器攻击是以劣势进行的。

entries.name: Planar Effects
entries: 协和快车通过只有火车上的智能引擎车才能找到的无形门户，在已知的存在平面上移动。火车的下一站是麦加努斯，但它会在途中经过其他几个外层位面。虽然火车可以保护乘客不受穿越的有害位面的影响，但火车上的生物并不完全不受位面的影响。
平面效应表包含了对列车当前路线上各种存在平面的影响。除非另有说明，每个效果都会持续到火车离开该平面。有些效果只适用于火车以外的生物。
只要你愿意，火车就会进入一个新的平面。掷骰子或从桌上的选项中选择，以决定火车在哪个平面上，以及它的伴随效果。一旦火车离开了一个平面，在剩下的冒险过程中它就不会再回到那个平面了。

entries.caption: Planar Effects
rows: Acheron. The train flies over a vast battlefield where legions of devils clash with hordes of demons. Whenever one creature aboard the train deals damage to another creature aboard the train, both take 4 ({@dice 1d8}) psychic damage.
极乐世界。列车上的所有生物都感到内心的平静。火车上的任何生物都不能进行攻击或施放造成伤害的法术。
天堂山。火车上的善良生物获得一个{@spell bless}的法术收益，持续到火车离开天神山。

The Nine Hells. On one of the blisteringly cold layers of the Nine Hells (either Cania or Stygia), the train passes through a frigid gorge filled with whirlwinds of ice needles. Any creature outside the train takes 5 ({@dice 2d4}) cold damage plus 5 ({@dice 2d4}) piercing damage at the start of each of its turns. Modrons that normally patrol the outside of the train lock themselves in compartments for safety until the train leaves the plane.
Pandemonium. Howling darkness surrounds the train. Creatures outside the train are {@condition deafened}. Outside the train, bright light becomes dim light, and dim light becomes darkness.
Ysgard。来自瓦尔哈拉的沉默、幽灵般的战士在幽灵般的战车上绕着火车飞行，战车由幽灵般的骏马牵引。火车上的任何生物都会被降低到0点的命中率，而下降到1点命中率。

entries.name: Train Cars
entries: 各种火车车厢在地图11.2中显示。前面的"{@area Train Configuration|413|x} "部分解释了如何选择和安排车厢。

entries.name: E1: Caboose
entries: 当火车开动时，人物被认为是在这节车厢里。当火车开始提速并升到空中时，一个不存在的声音说："下一站。麦金努斯！"用普通话、莫德隆语、天人语、地狱语、深渊语和原始语。

entries.name: Modrons in the Caboose
entries: 给人物打票的{@creature duodrone}服务员在火车上还有一个功能：在火车行驶中进行小修。当火车开动时，二重奏从附近的储物柜中穿上装备（见下文 "储物柜"）。然后它出发去执行任务，一边吹着口哨一边向下一节车厢行进。

Hidden in the walls of the Caboose are four {@creature Tridrone||tridrones} that emerge from their compartments to attack passengers who refuse to get their tickets punched or who perform an unlawful act, such as threatening the duodrone or plundering the locker.

entries.name: Locker
entries: 柜子里有一顶蓝色的工程师帽和一套由工具带和一双标有号码的肮脏工作服组成的船员制服。

entries.name: Rear Platform
entries: 车厢最尾部的平台上有一个栏杆，可以防止生物跌跌撞撞地越过边缘，进入令人眼花缭乱的机械臂中，收回拖曳的铁轨。一个焊接在车厢上的青铜梯子提供了通往车顶的通道。

entries.name: E2: Abacus Car

entries: 十个球形模子靠墙排开，对面是一个讲台，讲台后面是一块写满数学公式的黑板。讲台旁边站着一个戴着巫师帽的方块模子。它用一根黄铜棒敲击讲台，以引起你的注意。"你好！"它用普通话说。"我是数学巫师，微积分的船长，阿巴希的将军，单位的统一者！欢迎来到我的数字圣殿。欢迎来到我的数字圣殿，在这里任何问题都可以得到解决。我恳求你，旅行者，什么数字之谜困扰着你？"
驻扎在这里的11个莫德隆人充当了乘客的数学计算器。"数学之谜困扰着你？"
The self-proclaimed Math Wizard is a friendly {@creature duodrone}. The Math Wizard speaks both Common and Modron.

The ten {@creature Monodrone||monodrones} speak Modron only and are indifferent toward passengers. Each one holds a stack of ten placards numbered 0 through 9. When a creature inside the Abacus Car asks a mathematical question to which the answer is a number, the Math Wizard taps the podium with its wand and says, "Calculate!" In response, the monodrones select from their placards, shuffle around, and hold up their numerals to display the answer. The Math Wizard cheers "Huzzah!" after every successful calculation.
单体人尽最大努力准确计算，但有时他们必须估计。此外，如果这十个单体被问到一个答案超过9,999,999,999的问题，或者解法是不可计数的，它们就会在存在恐惧中尖叫着转圈，然后平静地回到它们的位置上，成功计算。

entries.name: Chalkboard
entries: 黑板上写满了方程式，相当令人费解地解释了为什么莫德隆大游行每289年才发生一次。对于莫德隆人以外的任何人来说，大多数方程式都是一派胡言。

A character who studies the equations for at least 10 minutes can make a DC 25 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) check at the end of that time. If the check fails, the character takes 3 ({@dice 1d6}) psychic damage and suffers a mild headache for the next hour. If the check succeeds, the character discovers a profound equation nestled among the others. Like a key, this equation unlocks something in the character's brain, with the effect determined by rolling on the Mysterious Equation table. A character who experiences this revelation gains no further benefit from studying the chalkboard equations. If any of the equations are erased, the modrons in the car turn hostile and attack, and no one can benefit from studying the equations.

entries.caption: Mysterious Equation
rows: 你获得了{@book inspiration|PHB|4|inspiration}.他的启示没有从研究黑板上的方程式中获得进一步的好处。如果任何一个方程式被抹去，车上的莫德隆人就会变成敌意和攻击，而且没有人可以从研究方程式中获益。
你获得对你选择的一种工具的熟练度。
你获得以下技能的熟练度：{@skill Deception}、{@skill History}、{@skill Insight}、{@skill Investigation}、{@skill Medicine}、或{@skill Performance}。
你学习一种你选择的新语言。
你的智力分数永久增加2（最高为20）。

entries.name: E3: Aquarium Car

entries: 这辆车里装的是清水，车门打开时没有位移。汽车的内部空间是一个大的水族馆，有一个珊瑚礁和藻类覆盖的废墟。小鱼在废墟中飞快地游动，并围着一个雪花石膏雕像转圈，雕像上有一个攥着酒壶的天使的样子。附近的鱼一看到你就散开了。
这辆车完全被淹没了，魔术让水在任何一扇门被打开时都不会被移走。不能在水下呼吸的生物必须在水族馆里憋气。当生物离开水面时，魔法会立即使它们变干。
通过移除靠近汽车端口壁底部的一个拳头大小的塞子，可以慢慢排出水族箱中的水。作为一个行动，一个在塞子附近的角色可以尝试把它拔出来，只要成功地进行DC17力量检查即可。一旦塞子被拔出，水族箱的水位会以每分钟1英尺的速度下降。需要15分钟才能将所有的水从车里排出去。车上的鱼在没有水的情况下无法生存超过几分钟。

entries.name: Angelic Statue
entries: 雪花膏雕像是一个{@condition petrified}{@creature deva}与{@item decanter of endless water}。如果鱼缸里的鱼受到任何伤害，魔王会立即恢复成肉体，并责罚负责任的人。如果鱼缸的塞子被拔掉了，魔王会把它换掉。如果有任何水从车里被抽走，魔王会用酒壶来补充。如果有鱼死亡，魔王使用{@spell raise dead}法术，每天让一条鱼复活，持续10天。一旦一切就绪，魔王就从火车上飞下来，施展{@spell plane shift}法术，带着酒壶返回天山。

entries.name: E4: Cargo Car

entries: 一辆破旧的战争机器停在这辆宽敞的汽车的一端。酸液从安装在车辆前部的软管状武器中滴落，在火车车厢的地板上留下一个烧焦的洞。

这台战争机器来自九层地狱的第一层阿弗纳斯的荒地。这辆车并没有投入使用，但它的软管式喷雾器却在运行。站在喷嘴5英尺范围内的生物可以采取一个行动，使武器在30英尺范围内喷射酸性胆汁。锥体中的每个生物都必须做一个DC12的灵巧蓄力动作，蓄力失败会受到40({@dice 9d8})的酸性伤害，蓄力成功会受到一半的伤害。被这种伤害降低到0命中率的生物会被溶解，留下它携带或穿着的任何物品。一旦使用，喷雾器就不能再使用了。

A creature that interacts with the war machine spooks six {@condition invisible} {@creature Imp||imps} lurking in its bent chassis. The imps fly out and attack the source of their fright while yelling, "I can't go back to jail!" in Infernal. If the infernal war machine's acid sprayer hasn't already been used, one of the imps uses it.
一个坐在驾驶座上的人物注意到一个发光的{@item Potion of Fire Resistance||potion of resistance (fire)}卡在一个肮脏的手套箱里，同时还有六张未付的无间道停车罚单。

entries.name: E5: Planartarium Car

entries: 地板上发光的符号排列在这个圆顶汽车的周边。在车的中间是一个悬挂在台子上的机械模型，上面有更多发光的符号。该模型类似于一个大轮子，顶部有一个高高的尖顶。一个小小的铜环漂浮在尖顶的上方。
一个莫德隆的光谱蓝色图像在台子前显现出来。它有一个盒子的形状，戴着一副超大的眼镜。虚幻的莫德隆调整了它的眼镜，高兴地用普通话向你问好。
"你好，欢迎来到Planartarium。你可以通过向这辆车捐款来了解更多关于存在的平面。所有收益都有利于建立整个多元宇宙的秩序。" 在消失之前，莫德隆向靠近台子的地板上伸出的一根短管做了个手势。
地板上的16个发光符号代表了每一个外部星球，而房间中央的高台则有四个元素内部星球的符号。台子上方的轮状模型代表外域和它的16个门镇。尖顶上的小环代表西格尔。
一个神奇的金色光点表示了火车的位置。由于火车的旅行通常仅限于内层世界、外层世界和外域，所以可以看到这个圆点漂浮在其中一个符号或代表外域的模型轮上面。如果火车在这个车厢里没有代表的其他位置，就看不到任何的摩特。

entries.name: Donation Tube
entries: 靠近台子的短管从地面升起，有一个足够大的槽，可以插入硬币、宝石和其他小型贵重物品。这些贵重物品会在{@area area E9|448|x}内被传送到推车上。
每当有生物将价值至少10戈比的财宝丢进管子里，虚幻的莫德隆就会重新出现。它向捐赠者表示感谢，并询问他们想了解哪一层面的存在。
科斯莫可以就(%%1)中描述的任何{@book plane of existence|DMG|2}进行简短的演讲。如果有人物问及火车路线上的飞机，科斯莫也会暗指值得注意的平面效应。例如，如果被问及九层地狱，幽灵二重奏可能会说："请放心，协和快车是经过强化的，可以抵御极热和极冷。" 科斯莫每次捐赠都会讲授一个平面，并在每次讲授后消失。
如果一个角色将不值钱的东西插入捐赠槽，或以其他方式试图用假货等骗过它，管子就会吐出毒气，迅速填满隔间。这种气体复制了一个{@spell stinking cloud}的法术效果，持续1分钟或直到它被驱散。

entries.name: E6: Passenger Car

entries: 在这辆客车的过道上，一个身穿米色大衣的思想解放者跪在一具尸体旁。三个好奇的围观者--一个坎比恩人、一个乌鸦和一个头发是火焰的青铜矮人--从附近的车厢里探出头来。"谁也不许动！"心灵传播者警告说。"这整辆车都成了犯罪现场。"

This car contains three cozy passenger cabins and two privies (one at each end of the car). Quintus Malvesh, an aasimar cartographer, lies dead in the aisle (in the square marked X on {@area map 11.2|422|x}), and a detective is already on the case.

entries.name: Illithid Detective
entries: The detective is a lawful neutral {@creature mind flayer} named {@creature Ignatius Inkblot|KftGV}. Seeing the characters, Ignatius lights a pipe with a match it holds with one of its face tentacles. The pipe exudes a green vapor that smells of absinthe. Since the characters weren't on the car when the murder occurred, Ignatius doesn't regard them as suspects and is friendly toward them. Ignatius can speak Common but loathes doing so; the mind flayer prefers to converse telepathically. Its tone is strident, and it uses stereotypical detective phrases such as "The game is afoot!" and "The devil is in the details!"

Ignatius tries to enlist the characters in its investigation. If they agree to help, the mind flayer asks them to look for clues and question suspects. (In the meantime, the mind flayer quietly casts {@spell detect thoughts}, focusing on every creature in the Passenger Car.) Ignatius asks that no one leave the car until the mystery is solved. If the characters leave anyway, Ignatius solves the case without their help.

entries.name: What Ignatius Knows
entries: 伊格内修斯已经确定，昆图斯是在从客运车的两个厕所之一走到他的小屋时被杀的。阿西玛人的尸体躺在中间车厢的门外，昆图斯和另一位乘客共用这个车厢。在昆图斯死亡时，伊格内修斯正在使用另一个厕所，并听到阿西玛尔在倒地前的喘息声。伊格内修斯迅速赶到现场，但凶手却不见踪影。

entries.title: {@creature Ignatius Inkblot|KftGV}, the great mind flayer detective, examines a corpse aboard the Concordant Express

entries.name: Murder Suspects
entries: 客车上的嫌疑人如下。
{@b Abernathy Vernus}(合法的邪恶{@creature cambion})是一个友好的、讨好人的家伙，他声称赢得了协和快车的免费旅游。他坚持要别人叫他弗恩。没有其他乘客占用他的船舱（在{@area map 11.2|422|x}上标有 "a "的那间），弗恩与一个{@creature monodrone}名叫希格斯沃思的男仆共享。

{@b Ethlynn Stalaczic} (neutral, drow {@creature mage}) is a friendly, somewhat gullible dragonologist on a planar quest to find a "time dragon" (which may or may not be a real thing). Until a few moments ago, Ethlynn and Quintus were cabin mates. Ethlynn currently shares her cabin (the one marked "b" on {@area map 11.2|422|x}) with a {@creature monodrone} valet called Bot.

{@b Meldar} (lawful neutral {@creature azer}) is indifferent toward others, speaks nothing but Ignan, and provides curt answers to questions put to them. The azer is returning to the City of Brass after attending a smiths' convention in Bytopia. Meldar shares a cabin (the one marked "c" on {@area map 11.2|422|x}) with {@creature Ignatius Inkblot|KftGV} and a monodrone valet known as Orb.
独角兽从未离开过火车。一天前在Bytopia，当Meldar登上火车时，Ignatius已经在车上了。其他嫌疑人在人物上车前不久在Excelsior（外域的一个门镇）附近上了火车。

entries.name: Murder Victim
entries: 角色可以检查昆图斯或对尸体施法。通过这样做可以了解到以下信息。

items.name: Examining the Corpse
items.entry: A character who examines Quintus and succeeds on a DC 11 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana}) or Wisdom ({@skill Medicine}) check determines that the aasimar was killed by three bolts of magical force identical to those created by a {@spell magic missile} spell. Given where the body fell, the direction Quintus was walking when he died, and where the wounds on the body are located, a character can deduce, with a successful DC 16 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check, that the killer likely didn't come from Meldar's cabin.

items.name: Raising the Dead
items.entry: 一个准备好{@spell raise dead}法术的角色可以用它来恢复昆特牌的生命。(在{@area areas E3 |42a|x}和{@area E8|441|x}的魔鬼也可以提供这项服务，如果问得好。) 昆图斯是混沌中立的，使用{@creature noble}状态块，尽管他没有盔甲，也没有携带武器。活着的时候，阿西玛尔比死了的时候更不合作，原因在下面的"{@area Motive|439|x} "部分解释。他没有提供任何可能的理由来解释为什么有人想杀他。

items.name: Speaking with the Dead
items.entry: 如果对尸体施以{@spell speak with dead}法术，阿西玛尔的灵魂会诚实地回答问题。昆图斯没有看到杀他的人，但他知道一个原因，那就是这辆车上的其他乘客（除了伊格内修斯）都可能希望他死。这些原因在{@area Murder Suspects table|436|x}中得到了总结。

entries.name: Searching the Cabins
entries: 角色们可以在客舱中寻找线索，并询问每个客舱中的模范男仆。

items.name: Cabin A
items.entry: This cabin holds Vern's battered suitcase, which contains two {@item Traveler's Clothes|PHB|traveler's outfits}, three odd-looking compasses, and a set of {@item tinker's tools|PHB}. If asked about the compasses, Vern says he builds and repairs them to pass the time on long trips.

items.name: Cabin B
items.entry: Ethlynn与被害人同住在这个小屋，知道Quintus是一名制图师。Ethlynn确认Quintus离开他们的小屋是为了使用火车车厢一端的厕所。搜查车厢的人物发现了昆图斯的挎包，里面有两个备用的{@item Traveler's Clothes|PHB|traveler's outfits}，一套{@item cartographer's tools|PHB}和一个{@item Map or Scroll Case|PHB|map case}看起来像古代藏宝图的东西。一张类似的地图，是在昆图斯参观厕所时被伊瑟琳偷走的，塞在她的蜘蛛丝手提包里。(Ethlynn坚持说Quintus把地图给了她，但他从未这样做过。然而，他确实告诉她，地图上有通往时间龙巢穴的路，但它并没有。） 一个花了1分钟检查昆图斯的任何一张地图的人物，只要成功地进行DC16智力（{@skill Investigation}）检查，就可以对地图的准确性提出严重怀疑。

items.name: Cabin C
items.entry: Meldar and Ignatius share this cabin, which contains nothing incriminating. Its occupants travel light.

items.name: Questioning the Modrons
items.entry: 协和快车上的Monodrone男仆有内置的语言翻译器，而不是语音盒；因此，他们可以理解任何口语，但不能说话。如果被问及谋杀案（他们对此一无所知），Bot和Orb耸耸肩。如果被问及谋杀案，Higglesworth只是指着自己。

entries.name: Solving the Mystery
entries: 独角兽希格斯沃斯用一个{@item wand of magic missiles}杀死了昆图斯，这个东西藏在独角兽球形身体里的一个秘密隔间里。独角兽不会接受检查，并攻击任何试图搜查或拆卸它的人。它无懈可击的代客程序使它无法使乘客入罪或指责他们有任何不当行为。
希格斯沃思并不是自愿犯罪的。坎宾-弗恩用他的工匠工具和魔法知识重新编程，用弗恩从Excelsior的一个巫师学徒那里偷来的魔杖谋杀了昆图斯的单体男仆。然后，弗恩用莫德隆的身体来隐藏凶器，并指示希格斯沃思不要容忍侵入性的检查。

entries.name: Murder Weapon
entries: A character can use an action to search Higglesworth for a secret compartment, finding it with a successful DC 13 Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) check, but this can be done only while the monodrone is {@condition incapacitated}. The same is true for opening the compartment, which requires another action, thieves' tools or tinker's tools, and a successful DC 11 Dexterity check. Opening the compartment causes the wand to tumble out.
If Higglesworth is reduced to 0 hit points, its body disintegrates, but the {@item wand of magic missiles} hidden inside it remains.
魔杖的一个电荷已经用完了--就是杀死昆图斯的那个电荷。

entries.name: Motive
entries: 弗恩是一个骗子，他制作并向那些想通过简单的方法找到他们心中所想的东西的受骗者出售 "魔法罗盘"。昆图斯也是一个骗子，他制作并出售假的藏宝图。弗恩和昆图斯都认为伊瑟琳是一个可能的目标，但昆图斯利用她寻找时间龙巢穴的梦想，首先找到了她。弗恩决定消灭竞争对手，同时把责任推给一个不能为自己辩护的故障模子。

entries.name: J'Accuse
entries: If the characters accuse Ethlynn or Meldar of murdering Quintus, Ignatius telepathically warns the characters that their investigation has gone "off the rails." He then recommends they "look for clues within clues" and "try to understand the motive behind the killing." Gifted with the ability to cast {@spell detect thoughts} at will, Ignatius has already identified Vern as the individual responsible for Quintus's death, but Ignatius wants the characters to see the truth for themselves—not simply take a mind flayer's word for it.

entries.name: Case Closed
entries: The mystery concludes with Ignatius confining Vern to his cabin until the authorities in Mechanus remove the cambion from the train. If the characters don't have the means to raise Quintus from the dead, Ignatius suggests they speak to the deva guarding the Jail Car and convince the angel to revive the dead aasimar. The characters are free to keep the {@item wand of magic missiles}, since Ignatius doesn't need it to make a case against Vern.
伊格内修斯不会就Quintus的假地图被盗一事向Ethlynn施压，但人物可以这样做。Ethlynn可以被骗去归还地图并为盗窃行为道歉。至于昆图斯，除非用魔法来胁迫他，否则这个阿西玛人不会承认任何错误行为。

entries.caption: Murder Suspects
rows: 坎比恩似乎很不高兴，甚至可能是嫉妒，因为Ethlynn和Quintus相处得这么好。坎培恩似乎想和伊瑟琳多呆一会儿，这就需要摆脱昆图斯了。
伊瑟琳-斯塔拉齐奇（Ethlynn Stalaczic
Ethlynn正盯着Quintus的地图。杀死昆图斯可以让她在没有人知道的情况下偷走地图。
昆图斯称梅尔达为 "头脑发热"，当时他认为艾泽尔离他很近，听不到他的话。杀死昆图斯可能是对这种侮辱的报复。(由于梅尔达只懂一种语言--伊格纳语，而且侮辱不是用这种语言说的，所以这个动机很快就消失了）。

entries.name: E7: Temple Car

entries: 彩色玻璃窗装饰着这辆车的墙壁，而它的地板上则装饰着精致的图案地毯。几根柱子支撑着一个拱形的马赛克天花板。跪在祭坛前的是一位身着阳光长袍的宁静的牧师。
牧师实际上是一个{@creature gray slaad}，利用其改变形状的能力来欺骗这些角色。这只老虎是被派到这里来杀他们的，很简单。它杀死了真正的牧师，偷走了他的长袍，并把他的尸体和神圣的符号扔下了火车。

The slaad works for an evil, multiverse-spanning organization called the Syndicate of Terror, Extortion, Assassination, and Larceny (STEAL), which has been spying on the characters for some time and wants their mission aboard the Concordant Express to fail. (This is doubly true if the characters are working for STEAL's rival, the Golden Vault.) If you're weaving multiple adventures from this anthology into your campaign, one or more villains from earlier adventures might have secret ties to this evil organization. Likely candidates (assuming they're still alive) include Quentin Togglepocket from "{@adventure The Stygian Gambit|KftGV|2}," Guildmaster Dusk from "{@adventure Masterpiece Imbroglio|KftGV|6}," and {@creature Nixylanna Vidorant|KftGV} from "{@adventure Vidorant's Vault|KftGV|8}." If you're using the rivals described in this book's {@area introduction|00c|x}, their patron might be a STEAL operative.

One of STEAL's operatives, having recently acquired the gray slaad's control gem, used the gem to command the slaad to slip aboard the Concordant Express and kill the characters on sight. The slaad loathes being surrounded by modrons on the train and fights to the death.

entries.name: Scrying Sensor
entries: The slaad's master watches the battle unfold through an invisible scrying sensor like the one created by a {@spell scrying} spell. If the characters defeat the slaad, a magically altered voice issues from the invisible sensor and says in Common, "So much for that. Next time you won't be so lucky!" If the characters are working for the Golden Vault, the voice adds, "The Golden Vault won't be able to protect you from our wrath." The scrying sensor then disappears.

entries.name: E8: Jail Car
entries: This soundproof car is two stories tall (30 feet high) and encased in thick iron. Four {@creature Pentadrone||pentadrones} guard the rooftop. These guards are positioned near the corners of the roof, allowing them to spot trouble coming from the sides of the car.
车子的外门锁得很紧，车顶的10英尺见方的天窗也是如此。作为一个行动，一个拥有盗贼工具的角色可以尝试打开其中一扇门或天窗，只要成功地进行DC17灵巧检查即可。天窗也可以被打碎；它是由厚玻璃制成的，有AC13，27点命中率，对毒药和精神伤害有免疫力。相反，这些门太坚固了，除了{@spell knock}法术或类似的魔法外，其他东西都无法强行打开。
当人物进入汽车时，阅读或转述以下内容。
两个铁制阳台从这节火车车厢的侧墙上伸出来。铁制的楼梯间将这些阳台与下层相连。在这两层的墙壁上都有用铁铆钉制成的牢门，每个牢门上都有一个大的齿轮形钥匙孔。苍白的光线透过门周围薄如纸的缝隙，但却照不到钥匙孔。
一个有着青色皮肤和尖头盔的粗壮天使靠在一个阳台的栏杆上，腰间挂着一把光芒四射的镶边长矛，背后折着火红的翅膀。

entries.name: Omid the Deva
entries: The angel guarding the Jail Car is Omid, a {@creature deva} with fiery instead of feathery wings. Omid has orders to deliver {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} safely to Mechanus, where judgment awaits.
魔王的发光法器让人联想到一把大钥匙。锏的头部与汽车的八个单元门上的齿轮状钥匙孔整齐地排列在一起。作为一个行动，一个角色可以使用魔杖钥匙来打开这些门中的任何一个，而这些门是无法用其他方式打开的。
奥米德仍在监狱车内，无法被引诱出来。当魔王遇到这些人物时，请阅读以下内容。
天使展开翅膀，释放出一堆发光的余烬，并说："闯入者，请说你的事，并如实回答。"
这些人物不需要诉诸暴力来获得魔王的梅斯钥匙。这里有一些替代的方法。

items.name: Clever Deception
items.entry: The characters can pose as emissaries of a jurisdiction with greater claim to {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}'s custody. Convincing Omid to release {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} requires a successful DC 17 group Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check. If the characters used a forgery kit to create documentation to support their claim, the group check is made with advantage.

items.name: Convincing Argument
items.entry: Since Omid knows little about {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}, a character can convince the deva that the outlaw has been wrongly accused and should be released. Making the argument might take a minute or two, after which the character must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check to secure {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}'s release.

items.name: Friendly Game
items.entry: A character who has a gaming set can challenge the deva to a friendly game. Omid loves games and is too proud (and bored) not to accept. If the character wins the game, Omid allows the party to speak with {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} (but not set them free). Determine the game's outcome by having the deva's challenger make a DC 19 Intelligence check. Proficiency with the gaming set allows the character to add their proficiency bonus to their roll. If the check is successful, the character wins. On a failed check, the character can opt to cheat in the late stages of the game and make a DC 19 Charisma ({@skill Deception}) check. A successful check overrides the earlier failure. If the character loses gracefully and didn't cheat, the deva (a gracious winner) still allows the party to speak with {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}.

entries.name: Cells

entries.title: {@creature The Stranger|KftGV}

entries: The door to each cell opens into a 10-foot-square extradimensional space brightly lit by magic. The cells and their contents are as follows:

items.name: Cell 1
items.entry: This cell contains a hostile {@creature nycaloth} known as Dardo (not its true name). If someone opens the door to its cell, Dardo tries to exit the cell on its next turn, attacking anyone who stands in its way. The nycaloth then tries to leave the train. {@creature The Stranger|KftGV} (see below) happens to know Dardo's true name: a simple math equation. The characters can use this knowledge to keep the nycaloth from attacking them, or to force it to work for them.

items.name: Cell 2
items.entry: 这个单元格是空的。

items.name: Cell 3
items.entry: A bench against the far wall has a {@item +2 rod of the pact keeper} resting on it. The cell is otherwise empty.

items.name: Cell 4
items.entry: This cell contains a friendly {@creature erinyes} who recently helped an efreeti named Vrakir get his hands on the {@item Book of Vile Darkness (Variant)|KftGV|Book of Vile Darkness}. Speaking with this prisoner might kick off "{@adventure Fire and Darkness|KftGV|13}," another adventure in this book. {@creature The Stranger|KftGV} (see below) doesn't know this erinyes's true name.

items.name: Cell 5
items.entry: 这个单元格是空的。

items.name: Cell 6
items.entry: 这个单元格是空的。

items.name: Cell 7
items.entry: 一个{@creature monodrone}看门人不小心把自己锁在这个牢房里。

items.name: Cell 8
items.entry: This cell contains {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} (see below).

entries.name: The Stranger
entries: This individual looks like a human with a flat-brimmed leather hat and a tattered traveler's cloak. {@creature The Stranger|KftGV}'s face is permanently obscured behind a shifting blur like that of a deep desert haze. {@creature The Stranger|KftGV} is chaotic neutral and uses the {@creature archmage} stat block, though they abhor combat. {@creature The Stranger|KftGV} wears an invisible {@item ring of mind shielding} that thwarts magical attempts to read their thoughts. {@creature The Stranger|KftGV} also wears {@item dimensional shackles} but is eager to be rid of them. One touch from Omid's mace-key causes the shackles to fall off, freeing {@creature the Stranger|KftGV}.

{@creature The Stranger|KftGV} is initially indifferent to the characters but becomes friendly if presented with the prospect of escape, at which point {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} replies in a gravelly voice:
"让我猜猜看。你想要一个名字。也许不止一个。有笔吗？"
{@creature The Stranger|KftGV} promises to recite the true names the characters seek in exchange for freedom but warns them of the heavy toll such knowledge carries.

If the characters are after the true names of Karnyros, Errtok, and Hexalanthe, {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} reveals the following once free of the {@item dimensional shackles} and outside the cell:

items: 卡尼罗斯的真名是一连串的咕噜咕噜的咆哮和龇牙咧嘴的声音，随后是像气球爆裂一样的声音。
厄尔托克的真名是阿尔-洛特-戈图卡。
Hexalanthe的真名是一种低调的、有节奏的吟唱，伴随着一系列的手势、舞蹈动作和鼓声。

entries: If the characters are after the true name of some other creature, perhaps a fiendish nemesis or tenuous planar ally, {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} might know that creature's true name as well and can reveal it to the characters. Even if {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} doesn't know a particular true name, they can give characters the true names of one or more Fiends who have the power to help the characters in some other way.
If you have trouble coming up with ideas for new true names, roll on the {@area Random True Names table|44f|x} at the end of this adventure when you need one.

entries.name: E9: Engine Car

entries: 一个巨大的炉子在这个嘈杂的汽车内部占据了主导地位。两个球形的模子将硬币铲进熊熊燃烧的火堆，而一个彪悍的、九英尺高的自动机则守卫着附近一个装满财宝的燃料车。"再快点！"一个低沉的、没有实体的声音响起。
有智慧的引擎车是低沉、轰鸣的声音的来源。这辆车会说普通话和莫德隆语。当它在移动而不说话时，引擎车通过一连串无休止的短促而有力的呼吸，与它的机制的每一次有节奏的搅动同步进行。当几十只机械臂在火车前铺设铁轨时，它的车底就会发出咔咔声。

Inside the car, two {@creature Monodrone||monodrones} stoke the fire in the furnace by shoveling loot into it from a nearby cart (see "{@area Treasure|44b|x}" below). A {@creature shield guardian} stands next to the cart, guarding the treasure from thieves. Thanks to its Spell Storing trait, the guardian can cast {@spell sleep} (4th-level version) once.

entries.title: A monodrone shovels treasure into the locomotive's engine

entries.name: Furnace
entries: 任何没有穿戴或携带的物品，如果放在炽热的炉子里，就会被瞬间焚烧。即使是魔法物品也会屈服于炽热熔炉，尽管火焰的威力还不足以伤害到神器。

If the furnace isn't replenished every hour with at least 100 gp worth of treasure, the Engine Car sputters and the train comes to a halt, causing a guard patrol (see "{@area Guard Patrols|41f|x}" earlier in the adventure) to investigate.

A creature that enters the furnace for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there takes 55 ({@dice 10d10}) fire damage. A creature reduced to 0 hit points by this damage dies and is reduced to a pile of ash.

The furnace door can be latched from the outside. A creature trapped inside the furnace can use an action to try to force open the door, doing so with a successful DC 20 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check.

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 宝物车里有3,500 gp, 6,000 sp, 和1,200 cp。散落在硬币中的有以下物品。

items: 五个{@item Amethyst||amethysts}(每个100gp)
镶金的弑心者头骨 (150 gp)
{@item Horn of Valhalla, Silver||Horn of Valhalla (silver)}
衣服的{@item Mithral Chain Mail||mithral armor (chainmail)}
{@item Potion of Greater Healing||Potion of healing (greater)}
Silvered {@item +3 greatsword} that once belonged to a githyanki knight

entries.name: Conclusion
entries: After imparting the true names, the freed Stranger tips their hat and leaps from the train. Once out of range of the train's teleportation ward, {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} casts {@spell plane shift} and disappears. The characters can leave the Concordant Express in a similar fashion, or they can remain on the train until it arrives in Mechanus and secure safe passage home from there. Whether or not they helped solve the murder in the Passenger Car ({@area area E7|43e|x}), characters who disembark in Mechanus see {@creature Ignatius Inkblot|KftGV}, the mind flayer detective, escorting the cambion Abernathy Vernus off the train and into the waiting arms of a group of modrons.

entries.name: For the Golden Vault
entries: 如果人物是为金库工作的，该组织就会在人物记录后的第二天派小组的联系人去取回真名。这名特工向人物提供了他们所选择的稀有魔法物品（须经你批准）作为报酬，并在第二天送到人物手中。印度杀手侦探，护送坎贝尔-阿伯纳西-弗努斯离开火车，进入一群莫德隆人的怀抱。

entries.name: Other Rewards
entries: If the characters helped solve the murder mystery aboard the Concordant Express, the mind flayer detective {@creature Ignatius Inkblot|KftGV} uses its {@spell plane shift} spell to deliver a wrapped parcel to the characters several days later. The parcel contains a token of the illithid's esteem: a masterfully crafted magnifying glass worth 1,000 gp.
角色还可以利用他们学到的任何真名来获得进一步的奖励，如下所述。

items.name: Home Ownership
items.entry: 知道一个生物的真名可能会使人物有权获得该生物的财产，如一块土地、巢穴或据点。

items.name: Slayer's Weapon
items.entry: A master smith might be able to work the true name of a creature into an {@item arrow of slaying} or other target-specific magic item.

entries.name: Further Adventures
entries: 在这次抢劫中，人物可能会结交一些星球上的敌人。随后的冒险可以包括以下内容。

{@b STEAL}. The rival organization STEAL (see {@area area E7|43e|x}) might figure prominently in future adventures. At higher levels, run-ins with STEAL operatives or raids on STEAL vaults might place the characters in conflict with the syndicate's leaders, including arcanaloths and ultroloths with true names only {@creature the Stranger|KftGV} knows.

items.name: Trials and Tribulations
items.entry: 这些角色可能会因为帮助星际逃犯而被迫站在麦格努斯的法庭上，或者因为杀害天使而向强大的天人交待。

items.name: True Name Terror
items.entry: 得知强大恶魔的真名的角色会被这些恶魔标记为死亡，它们会派强大的下属来杀死这些角色。

entries.caption: Random True Names
rows: 一首不知名的奥兰摇篮曲的第三行
四个鸡蛋在煎锅里翻滚的声音
从书中撕下三页的声音
短哨声，随后是两声长哨声
三个特定的质数串在一起
红色和蓝色灯光的闪烁顺序
一位去世已久的英雄的最后一句话
"锈迹斑斑的刀锋的铃木郎-阿祖恩"
被刺穿心脏的人的喘息声
三颗橡树果实在牙齿间嘎吱作响的声音

data.name: Party at Paliset Hall
entries: {@i An Adventure for 10th-Level Characters}

Every year during the winter solstice, {@creature Zorhanna Adulare|KftGV} holds a grand gala in Paliset Hall, her palatial retreat in the Feywild. The characters are hired to infiltrate the gala and steal Zorhanna's {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}, a magical diamond with peculiar properties. As the evening unfolds, they learn that nothing is quite what it seems.

entries.title: A gala at Paliset Hall attracts not only guests from the Material Plane but also guests from the Feywild

entries.name: Adventure Background
entries: Lady {@creature Zorhanna Adulare|KftGV} is an elf and a retired adventurer. On one of her many adventures, she stole a diamond {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} (a magic item described at the {@area end of the adventure|4bd|x}) from a trio of night hags known as the Crestfall Coven. Zorhanna later mounted the diamond into a glittering platinum necklace, which she often wears during special occasions. Trapped within the iridescent facets of the {@item shard solitaire|KftGV} is an unstable extradimensional rift that gives the diamond its remarkable powers.
每年冬至期间，佐汉娜和她的丈夫，一个名叫埃利法斯的狼人工匠，都会回到他们在Feywild的家Paliset Hall，举办一场奢华的晚会。许多来自物质世界和仙界的客人参加了这个愉快的聚会。今年，佐汉娜计划再次炫耀她的{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}项链，却不知道各种势力正在密谋从她那里偷走它。

entries.name: Far Realm Invader
entries: Some time ago, a malevolent entity from the Far Realm found a way into the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} through the extradimensional rift contained inside it. Since then, this bodiless entity has been trapped in the stone—but it won't be for much longer. The entity's presence is weakening the stone, and when the diamond finally cracks, the effects could be catastrophic.

A few days ago, unaware of the danger, Zorhanna donned the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} necklace to see how it looked with a new gown she planned to wear at the gala. Zorhanna's close contact with the necklace allowed the Far Realm entity to trap her inside the diamond. The entity then replaced Zorhanna with a simulacrum using one of the {@item shard solitaire|KftGV}'s magical properties. {@creature Zorhanna's simulacrum|KftGV} now wanders Paliset Hall, preparing for the arrival of the gala's guests, while the real Zorhanna remains trapped inside the {@item shard solitaire|KftGV}.

entries.name: Stealing the Shard Solitaire
entries: 在埃利法斯对模拟人的行为产生怀疑之后，人物就被卷入了这个故事，他派了一个叫Fifel的友好的萨提尔去寻求帮助。费费尔给了这些人物参加晚会的邀请函，并读了一封来自埃利法斯的信，敦促他们从佐汉娜那里偷出{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}项链，并把它带到远离帕里塞特大厅的地方。

An added complication occurs toward the end of the adventure, as the hags of the Crestfall Coven crash the gala and attempt to reclaim that which was stolen from them. The hags know nothing about the Far Realm entity or {@creature Zorhanna's simulacrum|KftGV}, but they have their own clever plan to steal the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}—a plan the characters can turn to their advantage, if all else fails.

entries.name: Using the Golden Vault
entries: 如果你作为赞助人使用金库，则以你认为合适的方式将金钥匙送到人物手中。当人物用这把钥匙打开音乐盒时，盒盖会弹开，并有一个舒缓的声音说："你是谁？

"Greetings, operatives. A magical diamond called a shard solitaire is known to contain an unstable extradimensional rift. Its owner, {@creature Zorhanna Adulare|KftGV}, is a retired adventurer. Her husband, Eliphas, used to work for the Golden Vault. He suspects that an evil force has somehow entered the stone and is using it to control Zorhanna. He has asked the Golden Vault to steal the stone from Paliset Hall, where he and Zorhanna host their annual gala celebrating the winter solstice.
"这个任务，如果你选择承担，需要你在不伤害佐汉娜、埃利法斯或他们的客人的情况下获得碎片接龙。很快就会有一个叫菲菲尔的信使来找你，他有你参加晚会的邀请函和去Paliset大厅的路线，那里在Feywild。祝你好运，特工们。"
关上音乐盒，金钥匙就会消失。没有时间可以浪费；蛋随时都可能孵化。首先与丹内尔博士会面。祝你们好运，特工们。"他们是Rkenbluff的教员和野外科学家，陪同大学的考古人员在该地区进行挖掘。"博物馆，偷出蛋，在它释放出超自然的恐怖之前，把它还给Cassee Dannell博士，让它中和。

entries.name: Meeting Fifel
entries: The adventure begins in earnest when the characters meet Fifel, a {@creature satyr} who works for {@creature Eliphas Adulare|KftGV}. Where Fifel appears is up to you. You can use the following boxed text to describe what he looks like:
费费尔是一个瘦小的萨提尔，深色的卷发挽成一个小髻，金色的眼睛闪着兴奋的光芒。他穿着一件栗色的外衣，外衣上挂着各种腰带和鼓鼓囊囊的皮袋。卷起的羊皮纸管从他的背包里伸出来，他的口袋在走路时叮叮当当响个不停。"敬礼！"他笨拙地敬了个礼说。
菲菲尔带着一个{@item Heward's handy haversack}，他在里面存放各种文件。这个萨提尔有点散漫，但埃利法斯相信他能跑腿和传递重要信息。
费费尔从他的背包里拿出一把邀请函，递给每个角色一张。每张邀请函都装在一个淡蓝色的信封里，摸起来很凉，闻起来像冬天的清晨。邀请函的内容如下。
Zorhanna和{@creature Eliphas Adulare|KftGV}请求您在Paliset大厅陪伴我们，庆祝冬至的到来。不早于冬至前三天来到怀恩尼斯湖，然后在日落时分从那里渡过去，前往费沃德。帕利塞特大厅的众多辉煌在另一边等着你! 希望你穿上正式的服装，但不是必须的。
一个{@spell detect magic}的咒语会在每张邀请函的背面显示一个看不见的水印，用来验证其真实性。希望你穿上正式的服装，但不是必须的。
一旦邀请函分发完毕，费费尔就用牙齿咬开一个卷轴管，然后将卷轴管倒过来，用力摇晃，直到一张卷起的羊皮纸掉出来。他拿起羊皮纸，展开，用普通话阅读上面的内容。

"I, {@creature Eliphas Adulare|KftGV}, have sent my esteemed messenger, Fifel Amberhoof, to lead you to the shores of Loch Wynnis, so that you may cross into the Feywild with great haste. The winter solstice is nearly upon us, and I fear evil forces are as well.

"我的妻子，大法师Zorhanna，最近不在状态。我相信有什么东西或什么人正在通过一颗魔钻控制她，这是她多年前在一次冒险中获得的。Zorhanna把它装进了一条项链，她在特殊场合佩戴。几天前，她从我们的保险库中取出项链，并在试衣服时戴上它。从那时起，她对家里的工作人员一反常态的残忍。当我与她对峙时，她断然拒绝了我，攥着项链，用一种我从未听过的可怕的语言说了些什么。她所有的温情都消失了。当我看向她的眼睛时，我看到一个冷酷的、充满唾弃的女人在回瞪着我。
"我想让你去偷项链，Zorhanna现在拒绝摘下它。我自己不能安全地做到这一点。费费尔会给你邀请参加我们在帕里塞特大厅举行的冬至晚会。在你想办法取下项链的时候，会有其他客人来分散佐汉娜的注意力。当我与她对峙时，她断然拒绝了我，攥着项链，用一种我从未听过的可怕的语言说了些什么。她所有的温情都消失了。当我看向她的眼睛时，我看到一个冷酷的、充满唾弃的女人在回瞪着我。
"一旦我们摆脱了项链，费菲尔就会给你送来奖励。"她用一种可怕的语言说了些什么，我以前从未听她说过。她所有的温情都消失了。当我看向她的眼睛时，我看到一个冷酷的、充满唾弃的女人在回瞪着我。
Fifel可以告诉人物，Eliphas提供以下物品作为他们帮助的报酬。

items: {@item Bag of Tricks, Rust||Rust-colored bag of tricks}
{@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Serpentine Owl||Figurine of wondrous power (serpentine owl)}
{@item Gauntlets of ogre power} 或 {@item quiver of Ehlonna} (人物选择)

entries: 这些魔法物品在帕利塞特大厅的艺术馆中展出（{@area area P6|486|x}）。
如果角色们接受条件并同意偷取项链，费费尔就会把他们带到怀尼斯湖，这是一个湖边的小村庄，那里有一个作为物质世界和精灵世界之间的通道的精灵通道（详见"{@area Loch Wynnis|45f|x} "章节）。菲菲尔解释说，这个精灵通道一年中只有七天是有效的：冬至前三天，冬至当天，以及冬至后三天。

entries.name: Planning the Heist
entries: 当他们在费费尔的陪伴下前往怀尼斯湖时，人物可以向萨提尔询问有关{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}、Adulares、冬至晚会和Paliset Hall.ys的信息：冬至前三天、冬至当天和冬至后三天。

entries.name: Shard Solitaire Lore
entries: Fifel knows the following information about the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}:

items.name: Origin Story
items.entry: Fifel thinks the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} formed when someone dropped a {@item Heward's handy haversack} full of jewels into a {@item bag of holding}, creating an explosive portal to the Astral Plane. One of the jewels absorbed some of the portal's volatile energy to become the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}. (See "{@area Secrets of the Shard Solitaire|4bd|x}" at the end of the adventure for what really happened.)

items.name: Previous Owners
items.entry: When she was an adventurer many years ago, Zorhanna stole the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} from a trio of night hags known as the Crestfall Coven. She never encountered the hags again, to the best of Fifel's knowledge.

items.name: Safeguard
items.entry: Zorhanna付钱给一个珠宝大师，让他制作一条铂金项链，并把{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}附在上面。如果从Zorhanna的脖子上取下它，项链会自动传送到Paliset大厅的一个秘密保险库。金库位于二楼Zorhanna的寝室的某处。 (Fifel对金库的位置有误。) 如果项链从金库中取出，它就不会被传送，所以偷它需要从那个地方取出。

entries.name: The Adulares
entries: Fifel知道以下关于Zorhanna和{@creature Eliphas Adulare|KftGV}：金库的位置。） 如果项链被从金库中取出，它就不会被传送，所以偷它需要从那个地方拿走。

items.name: Zorhanna's Past
items.entry: 在她安定下来并与埃利法斯结婚之前，佐汉娜有一个漫长而成功的冒险生涯。在Zorhanna的一次冒险中，她结识了一位大法官，多年后，大法官建造了Paliset大厅，并将其遗赠给Zorhanna。有传言说，这位大法官是冰霜王子。

items.name: Eliphas's Past
items.entry: 埃利帕斯是一位绅士，也是一位修补者。(多年来，他为金库提供服务，金库是一个致力于保护历史遗物和防止强大物品落入邪恶之手的组织。埃利帕斯设计了神奇的音乐盒，金库用它来与它的外勤人员沟通。

entries.name: Winter Solstice Gala
entries: 费费尔知道以下关于佐尔纳和埃利法斯在金库举办的冬至晚会的信息：金库用来与它的外勤人员沟通。

items.name: Guests
items.entry: 阿杜拉人邀请了来自精灵世界和物质世界的客人。翡冷翠的客人不需要使用怀尼斯湖的翡冷翠渡口；相反，独角兽拉着的马车会把他们送到宫殿里。

items.name: Weapons and Armor
items.entry: 客人可以携带武器，并穿戴盔甲作为时尚配件。

entries.name: Map of Paliset Hall
entries: 如果人物向他询问有关帕利塞特庄园布局的问题，费费尔就会画出一张庄园的粗略地图并交给他们（见地图12.1）。

entries.title: Map 12.1: Players' Map

entries.name: Loch Wynnis
entries: 怀尼斯湖（Loch Wynnis）既是一个深湖的名字，也是它旁边的小村庄的名字。这场冒险假定人物在冬至那天日落前不久到达温尼斯湖，正好赶上参加帕里塞特厅的晚会。
依偎在高原上的是一个古朴的小村庄，它的小木屋和商店田园般地坐落在厚厚的、被雪覆盖的常青森林和一个有冰岸的黑暗湖泊之间。村庄与水面相接处有一个码头。
在一年中的大部分时间里，怀恩湖的小村庄有关闭的店面，有太多的空酒馆桌子，以及不到二十个永久居民。随着隆冬的到来，镇上的人口急剧膨胀，季节性的商人和游客都渴望一睹怀尼斯湖的神奇之处：湖中的精灵渡口开放。渡口在冬至当天的日落时分、冬至前三天和冬至后三天短暂开放。

entries.name: People of Loch Wynnis
entries: 怀尼斯湖的居民知道发生在费城帕里塞特大厅的冬至庆典，尽管这些居民中很少有人被邀请参加。大多数人都满足于呆在物质世界中，向过往的游客出售商品和服务。村民们都知道阿杜拉人和他们的仆人，菲菲尔都知道他们的名字。菲菲尔鼓励角色们在日落前前往湖边之前，先简单地参观一下这个小村庄。渡口在冬至当天的日落时分、冬至前三天和冬至后三天短暂开放。

entries.name: Other Gala Attendees
entries: 当人物经过村庄时，他们可能会遇到其他的晚会邀请者，他们焦急地等待着日暮时分出现的飞渡者。你可以使用 "晚会客人 "表来生成随机的NPC，让角色遇到。这些NPC不穿盔甲，也不携带武器，但每个参加晚会的人都有一张邀请函，就像Fifel给冒险家的邀请函一样。菲菲尔鼓励角色们在日落前前往湖边之前，先简单地参观一下这个小村庄。渡口在冬至当天的日落时分、冬至前三天和冬至后三天短暂开放。

entries.caption: Gala Guests
rows: 卡登-兰尼斯是一个20多岁的孤独的人类（%0）。他希望能在仙境中找到真爱。菲菲尔鼓励角色们在日落前前往湖边之前，先简单地参观一下这个小村庄。渡口在冬至当天的日落时分、冬至前三天和冬至后三天短暂开放。
Verano Honeywell is a halfling {@creature spy} employed by a big-city broadsheet to attend the gala and write a story about the goings-on in Paliset Hall.
莱科里斯，{@creature dryad}，在六年前退休前一直是帕利塞特大厅的工作人员主管。她每年都会来参加晚会，看望她的老朋友们，她对帕利塞特厅的特点和工作人员极为了解。

Berengar is a {@creature werebear} and {@creature Eliphas Adulare|KftGV}'s longtime friend. Eliphas is the only other person at the gala who knows Berengar is a werebear. Berengar likewise knows that Eliphas is a werebear.

Nix, a gnome {@creature mage}, was Zorhanna's apprentice for several years. Nix has agreed to look after Paliset Hall once the gala ends and the Adulares return to the Material Plane. Nix plans to stay until the next winter solstice.

Eggsy, a gnome {@creature bandit}, plans to pick some pockets at the gala. He attends under a false name ("Dworp Q. Guzzler, Esq., Gnome Adventurer") and has altered his appearance using a disguise kit. His disguise includes a curly wig, a more pronounced chin, copper-wired spectacles, and a fake beard. His invitation is a well-crafted forgery, including a fake invisible watermark on the back. Exposing it as a forgery requires a successful DC 17 Intelligence ({@skill Arcana} or {@skill Investigation}) check.
Yalara is an elf {@creature commoner} and singer whose music troupe was invited to perform at the gala. The other two members of her troupe were unable to make it to Loch Wynnis in time.

Mettle, an unarmed tiefling {@creature scout} with horn-rimmed spectacles, pretends to be a noble named Adira and secretly works for the hags of the Crestfall Coven (see "{@area The Crestfall Coven|4b4|x}" later in the adventure). Upon arriving in the Feywild, Mettle slips a copper ring onto the third finger of her left hand. Affixed to the ring is a hag eye, a varnished eyeball that enables the hags to see what's happening at the gala (see the "Hag Covens" sidebar in the {@book Monster Manual|MM} for details about this item).

entries.name: Locations in Loch Wynnis
entries: The following locations are points of interest for characters who explore the hamlet of Loch Wynnis.

entries.name: Auberge Aurore
entries: {@i Tavern and Inn}

Wintertime visitors who don't have friends or family in the village stay in the Auberge Aurore while awaiting the solstice. When the characters arrive, the three-towered inn has two rooms available, each containing two beds. A bed costs 2 gp per night; a hot supper costs 1 sp.

The Auberge Aurore is owned and operated by Rei Paceran (neutral, elf {@creature veteran}), who is also the village's sheriff. Stern and unflappable, Rei has no patience for any misconduct under her watch. Rei is wary of the Feywild and has no interest in going there.

entries.name: Khorr's Kloths
entries: {@i Tailor and Dress Shop}
这家小型但充满活力的时尚精品店是由混乱的好{@creature bugbear}霍尔经营的。诞生于霍尔对无法找到适合自己身材的衣服的挫折感，霍尔的商店从此获得了声誉，为各种形状和身材的人类提供非传统的和引人注目的服装。
如果人物需要为晚会提供服装，霍尔很乐意提供服务。Khorr提供的一套精致的服装需要20金币。个人也可以到虫族那里接受裁缝服务，费用为5戈比。

entries.name: Loch Wynnis Docks
entries: {@i Wharf}
在这些木制码头上拴着几艘划艇。喜欢钓鱼的游客和居民可以免费使用它们。船只周围已经形成了一层薄薄的冰，但冰层很容易破裂。

Most of the docks are 10 feet long, but one particularly old and creaky dock is 50 feet long. This dock extends into the lake and allows easy access to Loch Wynnis's fey crossing (see "{@area Sundown Crossing|469|x}" below).

entries.name: Fifel Takes His Leave
entries: 埃利法斯给菲菲尔下了严格的命令，在有关{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}项链的事情解决之前，不要回到帕里塞特大厅（为了萨蒂尔的安全）。当角色们准备前往湖边时，菲菲尔说了以下的话。
"我的朋友们，我在此告辞。根据我的好主人的命令，我将留在奥罗尔旅馆，等待你们回来。"
菲菲尔在跳向酒馆前向这些人物快速敬了个礼。

entries.name: Sundown Crossing
entries: 晚会嘉宾在日落前不久在码头集结。当太阳落山时，阅读或解读以下文字。
当最后一丝太阳沉入地平线以下时，一道银色的光芒从水的深处散发出来，遥远的音乐和笑声在空气中飘荡。
两匹像马一样大的狼在码头的尽头凭空出现。它们有雪白的皮毛，眼睛像冰川的冰一样冰冷和蓝色。当它们慢慢走下码头时，其中一只用普通话说："尊敬的客人，帕利塞特大厅的女士和领主热切地等待您的光临。一旦您的邀请得到确认，请走到码头的尽头，跳入水中。"
另一只狼向任何第一次来的客人保证："虽然怀尼斯湖的大门是开放的，但你会发现水既不冷也不湿。""tion已经验证，请走到码头的尽头，跳进水中。"
这两只{@creature Winter Wolf||winter wolves}检查每个客人的邀请函，但被精心制作的伪造品所欺骗。每只狼每天可以对自己施放一次{@spell see invisibility}，使它能够看到客人请柬上看不见的水印，也能发现{@condition invisible}破坏聚会的人。

The wolves attack anyone caught trying to enter the Feywild without a validated invitation. When the last guest has crossed, the wolves return to Paliset Hall. If one or both wolves are killed, their failure to return is noticed by four more winter wolves on the Feywild side of the crossing (see {@area area P1|473|x}). These wolves recheck all invitations and attack anyone whose invitation fails a second inspection.

entries.name: Using the Fey Crossing
entries: 任何在渡口开放时从码头尽头踏入湖中的人都会出现在帕里塞特大厅的院子里({@area area P1|473|x})，他们的脚是完全干燥的。太阳落山后10分钟关闭，尽管它可以从另一侧重新开放，如P1区所述。Lves重新检查所有的邀请函，并攻击那些邀请函未能通过第二次检查的人。

entries.name: Paliset Hall
entries: Paliset大厅是Zorhanna和{@creature Eliphas Adulare|KftGV}的冬季行宫。它坐落在一片宁静的草地上，位于白雪覆盖的山脉和雾气笼罩的常青树森林之间。冬天的清凉迎接着新来的客人，但没有刺骨的寒风。E重新检查所有的邀请函，并攻击任何邀请函未能通过第二次检查的人。
远界实体试图从{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}逃离，导致星外能量泄漏到帕里塞特大厅。这股不听话的能量在地下室安家落户，并导致整个庄园短暂出现建筑异常现象（见下文 "一般特征"）。邀请函未能通过第二次检查。

entries.name: General Features
entries: 帕利塞特大厅在整个过程中具有以下特点：公寓检查。

items.name: Architectural Anomalies
items.entry: Unstable energy leaking from the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} is affecting Paliset Hall, causing areas to warp in appearance momentarily. Whenever one or more characters enter a new area of the manor, roll a {@dice d6}. If you roll an odd number, the characters notice iridescent cracks crawling up the walls, followed by a sudden shift in the architecture: a square window becomes circular, a wood panel turns to stone, and the like. Immediately after, the cracks vanish, and the architecture returns to normal.

items.name: Ceilings and Walls
items.entry: 庄园的天花板和墙壁有20英尺高，由触感冰冷的雪花石雕刻而成。建筑的变化：方形窗户变成圆形，木板变成石头，诸如此类。紧接着，裂缝消失了，建筑又恢复了正常。

items.name: Decorations
items.entry: 冬天的装饰品在皇宫的许多地方都有装饰。水晶雪花挂在窗户上，虚幻的冰柱从天花板上垂下，冰霜分形遍布墙壁，神奇地保存着的冰雕栖息在同样保存着的冰基座上。有些冰雕实际上是被分配到某一区域的冰梅菲特（如该区域的描述中所指出的）。

items.name: Doors
items.entry: 除非另有说明，否则庄园的门都是开着的，没有上锁。被分配到某一区域的菲特（在该区域的描述中指出）。

items.name: Lighting
items.entry: 庄园的房间光线明亮，墙上均匀地分布着{@spell continual flame}的咒语。

items.name: Music
items.entry: 幻觉魔法在舞厅里创造了欢快的音乐，整个宫殿的大部分地方都能听到，除了地下室。

entries.name: Zorhanna Adulare
entries: 真正的Zorhanna被困在{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}里面，在那里她受到了和她一起被困在里面的远界实体的攻击。利用{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}的力量，远界实体创造了一个Zorhanna的模拟物。

entries.name: Zorhanna's Simulacrum
entries: {@creature Zorhanna Adulare|KftGV}'s simulacrum appears identical to Zorhanna: a tall elf with purple skin and long, pale hair. The simulacrum wears a silvery gown embroidered with crystalline ferns and carnelian holly berries. It proudly shows off the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} it's wearing to guests. Any character who observes the simulacrum for 1 minute can discern its cold indifference with a successful DC 10 Wisdom ({@skill Insight}) check.
Abilities such as {@sense truesight} and magic that detects illusions reveal the true nature of the simulacrum: an elf made entirely of magical snow.
{@creature Zorhanna's Simulacrum|KftGV|simulacrum}使用{@creature archmage}的状态块，并有这些变化。

items: 仿真器是一个中立的邪恶构造。
它在假装成佐尔纳的时候会说普通话、德拉贡语、精灵语、地精语或希尔凡语，在生气或沮丧的时候则会说深沉的语言。

It can't regain expended spell slots or use the properties of the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} necklace. (The {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} is currently attuned to the Far Realm entity trapped inside.)
如果模拟物的命中率下降到0，它就会变成雪并融化，而{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}的项链会传送到Zorhanna的金库塔({@area area P12|498|x})中的保险箱。

entries.name: Simulacrum's Location
entries: To determine the location of {@creature Zorhanna's simulacrum|KftGV} when the characters first arrive at Paliset Hall, or anytime the characters lose track of it and need to find it, roll a {@dice d4} and consult the Simulacrum's Location table, or choose an option you like.

entries.caption: Simulacrum's Location
rows: 在会客室放松({@area area P5|483|x})
宴会厅内觥筹交错({@area area P7|48a|x})
Observing from the balcony ({@area area P9|490|x})

entries.name: Stealing the Necklace
entries: As an action, a character can try to steal the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} necklace with a successful DC 20 Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand}) check, or a character can use a {@spell suggestion} spell or similar magic to try to make the simulacrum relinquish the necklace. (Even though the simulacrum is a Construct, it can be {@condition charmed}.) The simulacrum becomes hostile toward anyone who tries to take the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}. The simulacrum doesn't care about collateral damage to Paliset Hall, its staff, or its guests.

The instant the necklace becomes separated from the simulacrum, the necklace teleports to the hidden vault in {@area area P12|498|x}. Eliphas knows where this vault is located, but only Zorhanna and her simulacrum know the proper way to open it.

entries.name: Paliset Hall Locations
entries: 以下地点以地图12.2为关键。朗姆酒不在乎对帕里塞特大厅、其工作人员或其客人的附带损害。

entries.name: P1: Fountain and Patio
entries: 下面的描述假设人物从怀恩尼斯湖通过费城渡口到达这里。
你站在鹅卵石天井上的虚幻水泉中。五颜六色的光球在空中晃动，与微弱的地平线上眨眼的星星一起跳舞。天井通向一座宏伟的两层楼的宫殿，其墙壁像新落的雪一样白。黑暗的屋顶闪耀着极光的色彩。水晶雪花装饰着窗户，音乐从宫殿敞开的门缝中飘出。
四只冬狼挡在你和帕里塞特大厅之间。在欢迎客人参加晚会后，这些狼坚持在允许任何人进入宫殿之前再检查一次邀请函。a. 水晶雪花装饰着窗户，音乐从宫殿敞开的门口飘过。

entries.title: A gnome adventurer acquires the shard solitaire necklace and a key belonging to Paliset Hall's head of staff

entries: The four {@creature Winter Wolf||winter wolves} are soon joined by the two {@creature Winter Wolf||winter wolves} from Loch Wynnis. Each wolf can cast {@spell see invisibility} on itself once per day, enabling it to see the invisible watermarks on the guests' invitations as well as detect {@condition invisible} party-crashers. The wolves are forbidden from entering Paliset Hall without a command from Zorhanna or Eliphas. If someone tries to slip past the wolves, they alert the ice mephits in {@area area P2|477|x}, which attack the offender.

entries.name: Fey Crossing
entries: The fountain contains the fey crossing connected to Loch Wynnis. In addition to the few times when the fey crossing opens on its own, anyone can open the fey crossing from this side by reciting the rhyme, "Neither gleaming sword nor magic tome can soothe the soul like hearth and home." This rhyme is known to Zorhanna, Eliphas, the winter wolves, and Paliset Hall's staff. The fey crossing remains open for 10 minutes after the rhyme is recited.
Anyone who steps into the fountain while the fey crossing is open immediately appears, completely dry, on Loch Wynnis's longest dock at the end farthest from the shore.

entries.name: Feywild Guests
entries: The gala attracts not only folk from the Material Plane but guests from the Feywild as well. These guests (all of whom are dressed in fantastic, winter-themed outfits) arrive in coaches drawn by {@creature Unicorn||unicorns} and driven by {@creature Satyr||satyrs}. Characters who linger on the patio might see one or more of these coaches arrive and deposit their guests.

The front doors of the palace are made of stained glass with silvery fractal patterns. Garlands of frost wind around two spiral alabaster staircases in the grand foyer, and flakes of magical snow fall from the icicle-covered ceiling, disappearing as they touch the floor. Guests mill about, idly chatting.

entries.name: Guests
entries: At any given time during the gala, {@dice 1d6} {@creature Noble||nobles} loiter in the foyer. You can add a named guest to the foyer by rolling once on the {@area Gala Guests table|462|x}.

entries.name: Ice Mephits
entries: 六个{@creature Ice Mephit||ice mephits}被伪装成沿房间周边的冰块装饰物。梅菲特会攻击任何在此区域发起战斗的人。只有佐汉娜、她的模拟人和埃利法斯可以命令这些墨菲特停止攻击并返回自己的岗位。

entries.name: Staircases
entries: 房间北部角落的螺旋形楼梯通向上层和阳台（{@area area P9|490|x}）。

entries.name: P3: Coat Check
entries: Guests can entrust their coats to the manor's head of staff, a gray-haired, upbeat {@creature satyr} named Oren. He carefully hangs the coats on hooks that line the west and east walls of this area between the foyer and the ballroom.
奥伦是个外交家，善于讨好而不谄媚。当面临动荡时，他尽力保持平静的面孔。

entries.name: Finding Zorhanna and Eliphas
entries: Oren不知道Zorhanna在哪里，但询问Eliphas的人物被告知如下。
"阿杜拉尔勋爵身体不适，已经退到楼上的客房休息了一会儿。但是，不要松懈！我希望他不久就会与我们会合。我希望他不久就会与我们会合。"
奥伦感觉到阿杜拉尔勋爵和夫人之间的麻烦，但他不会去打听他们的事情，而且他温和地劝阻其他工作人员不要这么做。他带着地窖储藏室的钥匙（{@area area P18|4a9|x}），但不记得里面存放过什么重要的东西。

entries.name: P4: Ballroom

entries: 一首欢快的华尔兹吸引着你进入这个宫殿式的舞厅。在跳舞的人群上方旋转着一盏闪闪发光的吊灯，似乎是由银和冰霜等量制作而成的。拱形天花板上悬挂着冰柱，在灯光下像珠宝一样闪闪发光。
一个20英尺高的阳台（{@area area P9|490|x}）可以俯瞰宴会厅的地板。

entries.name: Guests
entries: 在晚会期间的任何时候，{@dice 2d6 × 2}{@creature Noble||nobles}在这里跳舞。你可以通过在{@area Gala Guests table|462|x}上滚动一次来增加一位指定的客人到舞厅。

entries.name: Ice Mephits
entries: 六个{@creature Ice Mephit||ice mephits}被伪装成沿房间周边的冰块装饰物。梅菲特会攻击任何在此区域发起战斗的人。只有佐汉娜、她的模拟人和埃利法斯可以命令这些墨菲特停止攻击并返回自己的岗位。
灰色的贵妃椅和蓝宝石色的沙发围绕着这个会客室排列，里面住着为数不多的客人。一棵高大的松树上挂满了彩条和镀金的小饰品，威风凛凛地站在一个角落里。

entries.name: Guests
entries: 在晚会期间的任何时候，{@dice 1d8}{@creature Noble||nobles}在这个房间里休息。你可以通过在{@area Gala Guests table|462|x}上滚动一次来增加一个指定的客人到会客厅。

entries.title: Left to Right: Rust-Colored Bag of Tricks, Serpentine Owl, Gauntlets of Ogre Power, Quiver of Ehlonna

entries: 在这个宏伟的房间里悬挂着描绘四季的鲜艳绘画和挂毯。沿着墙壁展示的是雕像、水晶花瓶和其他艺术物品。

entries.name: Secret Door
entries: 在房间的东北角有一扇暗门，上面挂着一幅画。这幅画描绘了两个在雪地上玩耍的铁弗林儿童，画的框架是用灰色的木头雕刻成的雪花。按下画框中下方的雪花，秘密门就会用隐藏的铰链向外摆动，露出通往储藏室的楼梯（{@area area P18|4a9|x}）。检查这幅画或在墙上寻找秘密门的人物，在DC17智慧({@skill Perception})检查中成功，会注意到雪花按钮上频繁触碰的光泽。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Four items on display are magical:

items: {@item Bag of Tricks, Rust||Rust-colored bag of tricks}
{@item Figurine of Wondrous Power, Serpentine Owl||Figurine of wondrous power (serpentine owl)}
{@item Gauntlets of ogre power}
{@item Quiver of Ehlonna}

entries: 这里也展示了一些非魔法宝物，包括三幅丝质挂毯（每幅250金币），八幅著名艺术家的画作（每幅750金币），一个用石榴石做眼睛的玛瑙山羊雕像（250金币），以及一个美丽的蓝色蛋白石雕像，描绘了一个被称为冰霜王子的大法官（5000金币）。

entries.name: P7: Banquet Hall

entries: 两张长长的红木桌子上堆满了糖渍李子、颓废的姜饼和釉面肉。两个精灵在它们附近飞舞，鼓励客人品尝食物。）

这两个{@creature Sprite||sprites}人名叫西西和瓦尔。任何与他们交谈并成功通过DC10智慧({@skill Insight})检查的人物都会注意到他们都很不安。他们感觉到佐汉娜有些不对劲，但两个精灵都不敢说出来，因为害怕招致阿杜拉人的愤怒或萨提尔的主管奥伦的严厉训话。一个角色可以通过DC13魅力({@skill Persuasion})检查成功说服任何一个精灵分享他们的担忧，但是如果Zorhanna在精灵的视线范围内，这个检查是不利的。

entries.name: Guests
entries: 在晚会期间的任何时候，{@dice 1d6 + 2}{@creature Noble||nobles}在这里享受食物和茶点。你可以通过对{@area Gala Guests table|462|x}.r精灵滚动一次来增加一个指定的客人，通过DC13魅力({@area Gala Guests table|462|x})检查成功来分享他们的关注，但如果Zorhanna在精灵的视线范围内，这个检查是不利的。

entries.name: P8: Kitchen

entries: 草药的香味和锅碗瓢盆的声响充斥着这个繁忙的厨房。在萨提亚和小精灵厨师中，站着一个更高大的身影，皮肤苍白，打结，像树皮一样。她那双玻璃般的黑眼珠以刺耳的视线打量着厨房里的工作人员。

Two {@creature Satyr||satyrs} and three {@creature Pixie||pixies} busy themselves with cooking tasks. The dour {@creature dryad} head chef, Anisetta, lords over the kitchen and barks out orders. Anisetta also carries a key for the storage closets in the cellar ({@area area P18|4a9|x}) but doesn't recall anything important being stored in them.
如果阿尼塞塔在厨房里抓到任何不是工作人员的人，她会用精灵语尖锐地要求他们离开。如果这不起作用，她就走出厨房去找工作人员的头儿奥伦（{@area see area P3|47c|x}），并要求他处理这种情况，他试图以外交方式来处理。

entries.name: Staircase
entries: 一个楼梯通向储藏室（P18区）。这条楼梯是为仆人保留的，但如果一个角色在DC18魅力（{@skill Deception}或{@skill Persuasion}）检查中获得成功，就可以说服阿尼塞塔让他们进入这里。

entries.name: P9: Balcony

entries: 这个阳台可以俯瞰舞厅，由雪花石栏杆围成，栏杆上有金箔的驯鹿。
从阳台到舞厅地板有20英尺的落差。
客人。在晚会期间的任何时候，{@dice 1d6}{@creature Noble||nobles}的人都会在这里交际。你可以通过在{@area Gala Guests table|462|x}上滚动一次来增加一个指定的客人到宴会厅。
在这个宽敞的、装饰豪华的寝室里，墙壁上悬挂着镀金框架的画作。

entries.name: Magic Painting
entries: 其中一幅画描绘了一个由深色编织的树枝和翠绿色树叶组成的驯鹿状生物。如果有生物在画的5英尺范围内移动，图像就会动画化，木制的驯鹿状生物欢快地介绍自己是奥克，佐汉娜和埃利法斯的私人助理。

奥克解释说，他的工作是跟踪阿杜拉尔勋爵和夫人的日程安排，提醒他们可能忘记的任何世俗任务。奥克通常不与陌生人分享信息，但佐汉娜和埃利法斯最近一直忽略了这幅画，而奥克很想与人交谈。任何向Oak询问有关Zorhanna、Eliphas或{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}项链的问题的人物都可以进行DC12魅力（{@skill Persuasion}）检查。如果检定成功，奥克会提供一个除了 "嗯，我真的不能谈这个 "之外的答案。其答案如下：埃利法斯。

items.name: Eliphas
items.entry: "Eliphas has been staying in the guest room on the opposite side of Paliset Hall. If you see him, please remind him he has an appointment with that emissary from Prismeer in two days."

items.name: Zorhanna
items.entry: "Zorhanna不睡觉，但她过去在完成她的恍惚之后会向我报到。最近，她甚至不愿意打招呼。我不知道我说了什么得罪了她。"呃，除了 "嗯，我真的不能谈这个"。其答案如下：埃利法斯。

items.name: Shard Solitaire Necklace
items.entry: "那个老东西？Zorhanna几周前从游泳池里拿出来试衣服，此后就没再拿出来过。哦，亲爱的，我说过游泳池吗？你知道吗？忘了我说的话吧。"

entries: 魔画是一个小型物体，AC值为11，命中率为4，对中毒或精神伤害免疫。降低它的命中率至0或将它从房间中移出，会使它失去魔力。如果一个角色威胁要毁掉奥克，这幅画就会显示Zorhanna的金库 "藏在浴室外的塔池里"，然后向P11区域点头。

entries.name: P11: Main Bathroom

entries: 这个房间的一面墙上有一个瓷制的浴缸，里面还有两张桌子，上面堆放着干净的毛巾、香皂条和瓶子。在房间的后面，挡住了一个爬向炮台的短楼梯，是一个10英尺高的驯鹿大理石雕像。

这座雕像是一个{@creature stone golem}，守护着通往P12区的道路。Zorhanna、她的模拟人或伪装成Zorhanna的人可以命令石像让开。否则，如果它受到伤害或有人试图从它身边溜进P12区，巨魔就会攻击。在战斗中，巨魔在第一个回合使用慢速。在随后的回合中，它用它的蹄子和鹿角进行猛烈攻击。如果它的命中率降至0，巨魔会化为尘埃，然后重新形成，并在数小时后回到它的岗位上（1%）。在它被摧毁三次后，它不会再重新形成。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: 搜索房间的角色会在离浴缸最远的桌子上发现一个{@item Potion of Superior Healing||potion of healing (superior)}和四瓶芳香的沐浴油（每瓶25GP）。如果它的命中率降至0，巨魔会化为尘埃，然后重新形成，并在数小时后回到它的岗位上（1%）。在它被摧毁三次后，它不会再重新形成。

entries.name: P12: Vault Tower

entries: 一个长方形的水池位于这个八角形的塔楼中间，它有瓷砖墙和瓷砖地板。炮塔的拱形天花板上有一幅绘画壁画，画的是一个非常美丽的妖怪，看起来就像冬天的化身。池子里的水非常清澈，露出池底的瓷砖拼接。在水池的马赛克中央有三个同心的镀金环。池子里没有明显的排水口。
天花板上的彩绘壁画描绘的是冰霜王子，是佐汉娜认识的一位拱卫者.的。在水池的马赛克中央有三个同心的镀金环。池子里没有明显的排水口。

entries.name: Pool
entries: 这个池子有10英尺长，5英尺宽，5英尺深，里面装满了冰冷的水。当Zorhanna以外的生物在一个回合中第一次进入水中或在那里开始它的回合时，它必须做一个DC17的宪法救赎，在救赎失败时受到14({@dice 4d6})的寒冷伤害，或在成功时受到一半的伤害。
每天不超过一次，当Zorhanna浸泡在池子里时，她可以用它来联系冰霜王子，问他最多三个问题。他可以选择不回答问题或提供一个真实的答案，但他不能撒谎。然后，他可以问Zorhanna三个问题，每个问题都必须如实回答或根本不回答。

entries.name: Rune Tile
entries: 在楼梯对面的墙壁上刻有精灵族的 "冬 "字符文。检查那面墙并成功通过DC20智慧({@skill Perception})检查的人物可以发现这个符文，也可以用{@spell detect magic}的法术找到。按下符文的瓦片可以打开水池底部的隐藏管道，并在1分钟内将其完全抽干。池子在10分钟内保持空虚，之后会自动重新填满冰冷的水，如实回答或完全不回答。

entries.name: Vault
entries: 池底的三个同心的镀金环是一个隐藏的保险箱的锁定机制。每个环都是平的，镶嵌在一个浅浅的凹槽里，这样就可以旋转了。一旦池中的水被抽干，代表字母A到Z的微小精灵符文就会神奇地出现在每个环的表面，字母以相等的间隔围绕着环出现。打开保险箱需要将三个戒指在它们的凹槽中转动，直到它们的符文排成 "OAK "这个词。只有Zorhanna和她的模拟人知道字母的正确组合（尽管 "OAK "是直接指{@area area P10|492|x}中的魔法画），让我们在1分钟内。池子在10分钟内保持空虚，之后会自动重新填满冰冷的水，如实回答或完全不回答。
保险箱没有小偷可以利用的机制，但可以用{@spell knock}的咒语或类似的魔法来打开它。直到他们的符文排成 "OAK "这个词。只有Zorhanna和她的模拟人知道字母的正确组合（尽管 "OAK "是直接指{@spell knock}中的魔法画），让我们在1分钟内。池子在10分钟内保持空虚，之后会自动重新填满冰冷的水，如实回答或完全不回答。

When the rings are properly aligned or the safe is opened by other means, the circular area inside the innermost ring disappears, allowing access to a hidden compartment measuring 1 foot on each side. If the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} necklace was taken from {@creature Zorhanna's simulacrum|KftGV}, it rests in the compartment (the stone is still attuned to the Far Realm entity trapped inside it). Otherwise, the compartment is empty.
在水池重新装满水的前几秒钟，保险箱重新密封，符文也从金环上消失了。池子在10分钟内保持空虚，之后会自动重新填满冰冷的水，如实回答或完全不回答。

entries.name: P13: Vanity

entries: 在这个狭窄的房间里，优雅的衣服和上衣挂在沿墙的架子上。靠远处墙壁的一个白色木制梳妆台的上方安装了一面圆镜。
The garments stored here are exquisite. The dresser's drawers contain enough materials (wigs, cosmetics, and whatnot) to assemble one {@item disguise kit|PHB}.

entries.name: P14: Guest Bedroom
entries: 这个房间的门是关闭的，没有上锁。
这间卧室很宽敞，布置得很好。一个穿着富丽堂皇的蓝色大衣的男人坐在一张狭窄的床边。他修剪过的白胡子在根部变黑，慈祥的皱纹勾勒出他的眉毛和眼睛。
"想逃离人群吗？"他带着薄薄的微笑问道。"我明白。欢迎你和我一起躲在这里，只要你喜欢。"
{@creature Eliphas Adulare|KftGV|Eliphas}是一个中立的好人，人类{@creature werebear}，可以采用北极熊的形式。他的智力值为18，并有以下额外的行动选项。

entries.name: Spellcasting (Humanoid or Hybrid Form Only)
entries: Eliphas施展以下法术之一，使用智力作为施法能力（保存DC 15）。
随意。{@spell light}, {@spell minor illusion}, {@spell prestidigitation}
2次/天，每次：{@spell detect magic}, {@spell fog cloud}
1/day each: {@spell phantasmal force}, {@spell shatter}
如果这些人物透露了他们的身份和来意，当埃利帕斯感谢他们听从他的召唤时，他的肩上似乎卸下了巨大的重量。"我知道费菲尔不会让我失望！"他补充说。
埃利法斯知道以下信息。

items.name: Zorhanna's Simulacrum
items.entry: "我现在确信，我的妻子已经被一个模拟人取代了--一个拥有她的知识和施法能力的相似人。我隐约记得佐汉娜提到过，{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}有能力创造这样一个东西。"

items.name: Secret Vault
items.entry: "Zorhanna通常将她的{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}项链保存在Paliset大厅的浴室炮台的一池冷水下隐藏的保险库中，该保险库由一个石雕守护着。只有Zorhanna可以安全地绕过石像，而且只有Zorhanna知道金库的三个字母的密码"。(Eliphas可以带领人物安全到达{@area area P11|495|x}，如果他们要求查看浴室炮塔，他将帮助他们击败守卫它的石像。)

items.name: Weird Anomalies
items.entry: "Something strange is happening. I've seen walls, windows, and doors transform before my eyes, then suddenly everything is normal again. This only started a few hours ago, and it scares me. I just don't know what to do!"

entries: 如果人物告诉埃利帕斯他们也看到了奇怪的异常现象，埃利帕斯开始怀疑Zorhanna是否造成了异常现象，因为她被困在Paliset大厅的某个地方并试图接触他们。如果有角色认为异常现象是由{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}或其他被困在里面的东西造成的，埃利帕斯敦促这些角色去搜索帕利塞特大厅，直到他们发现真相。）

entries.name: P15: Guest Bathroom
entries: 在这个浴室的一面墙上有一个瓷盆。挂在盥洗室上方的镜子已经裂开了。如果有人问起，埃利帕斯会羞涩地解释说，他在一次剃须事故中弄坏了镜子。埃利帕斯在镜子里催促人物去搜索帕利塞特大厅，直到他们发现真相。）

entries.name: P16: Private Study
entries: An {@spell arcane lock} spell has been cast on the door to this room. Zorhanna, her simulacrum, and Eliphas treat the door as though it were unlocked.

As an action, a character can try to open the magically locked door using thieves' tools, doing so with a successful DC 22 Dexterity check, or try to force it open, doing so with a successful DC 22 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. A {@spell knock} spell or similar magic also opens the door.
这个房间的墙上挂着高高的书架，上面塞满了皮制的书籍。一张优雅的木质书桌位于一扇彩色玻璃窗下。桌子上有一本厚厚的书，封面是毛茸茸的白色，还有一个装在镀金支架上的水晶球。
书架上的书跨越了许多主题，大多与自然、平面，特别是与Feywild有关。

entries.name: Treasure
entries: Any character who spends 1 hour examining the books on the shelves can, at the end of that hour, make a DC 20 Intelligence ({@skill Investigation}) check. If the check is successful, the character finds a rare book worth 250 gp to a collector. Only four such books can be found here.

桌子上的毛皮书是Zorhanna的{@item spellbook|PHB}，它包含了以下法术。{@spell arcane lock}, {@spell banishment}, {@spell cone of cold}, {@spell counterspell}, {@spell detect magic}, {@spell detect thoughts}, {@spell fire shield}, {@spell fly}, {@spell globe of invulnerability}, {@spell ice storm}, {@spell identify}, {@spell knock}, {@spell legend lore}, {@spell lightning bolt}, {@spell mage armor}, {@spell magic missile}、{@spell mind blank}、{@spell mirror image}、{@spell misty step}、{@spell plane shift}、{@spell polymorph}、{@spell remove curse}、{@spell scrying}、{@spell sending}、{@spell stoneskin}、{@spell teleport}、{@spell time stop}、{@spell true seeing}、和{@spell wall of force}。
The crystal ball on the desk is nonmagical but worth 1,000 gp. It can be used as a focus for the {@spell scrying} spell.

Inside one of the desk drawers is a set of {@item tinker's tools|PHB} and a partially dismantled (and nonfunctional) music box similar in design to the ones used by the Golden Vault. Inside another desk drawer is a set of {@item Calligrapher's Supplies|PHB|calligrapher's tools}, three blank invitations to the winter solstice gala, some envelopes, a wax seal, and a silk {@item pouch|PHB} containing 50 pp.

entries.name: P17: Powder and Fitting Room

entries: 这个房间里有一个木制梳妆台，上面有一面安装在墙上的圆镜。其他家具包括一张桌子、一把软垫椅和一个梳妆台。2%），包含50页。
梳妆台上有折叠的服装、直针、剪刀、假发和布卷尺。桌子上摆放着令人印象深刻的化妆品。

entries.name: P18: Cellar

entries: 木桶和板条箱在这个酒窖的墙壁上排列着，酒窖的两端有一个上升的楼梯。一面墙的中间有一对木门，侧面是一条狭窄的通道。其中一扇门的边缘有阴森、闪烁的光线。
The crates contain foodstuffs, and the casks contain wine. The staircases lead to {@area areas P6|486|x} and {@area P8,|48d|x} respectively.

entries.name: Storage Closets
entries: Both storage closets are locked. Oren (see {@area area P3|47c|x}) and Anisetta (see {@area area P8|48d|x}) carry keys to these closets. As an action, a character can use thieves' tools to try to open a locked door, doing so with a successful DC 11 Dexterity check, or try to force open the door, doing so with a successful DC 15 Strength ({@skill Athletics}) check. A {@spell knock} spell or similar magic also opens the door.
The easternmost closet is the one emitting light. When a character opens this closet for the first time, read or paraphrase the following text:
漂浮在太空中的是一个斑斓能量的脉动裂缝，就像现实结构中的一个锯齿状疤痕。光线暗淡了一秒钟，显示出裂缝深处微弱的阴影在晃动，然后再一次爆发。

entries.name: Rift
entries: 裂缝是通往{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}内部平面外空间的单向门户。进入裂缝空间的生物会立即消失，然后在{@area area P20 |4af|x}在{@area map 12.2|472|x}上标记为A或B的岩石上随机出现一个未被占用的空间。裂缝无法被驱散，但当{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}不再具有魔力时，它就会消失（见冒险中后面的"{@area The Solitaire Cracks|4b7|x}"）。

entries.title: Adventurers are trapped in the shard solitaire's extradimensional space with {@creature Zorhanna Adulare|KftGV}.

entries.name: P19: Servants' Quarters
entries: This hallway has numerous doors leading to simple bedrooms for servants. All the bedroom doors can be locked from the inside, but all are currently unlocked. No servants are here during the gala.

entries.name: P20: Inside the Solitaire Rift
entries: 每个进入{@area area P18 |4a9|x}裂缝的角色都会被安置在{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire's}维外空间，出现在{@area map 12.2|472|x}上标有A或B的岩石之上。尽可能地将队伍平均分配到这两个地方。为了设置场景，阅读或转述以下内容。
你出现在一块光滑的平顶岩石上，漂浮在充满雷鸣般吼声的魔法漩涡中间。附近还有其他岩石漂浮着。站在最大的那块岩石上的是身穿礼服的佐尔汉娜。你还感觉到一种可怕的存在--某种无形的、无法描述的东西--潜伏在你周围。
Zorhanna points at you and laughs. "The shapeless evil finally appears! Whatever you are, you can't fool me! Prepare to face the wrath of {@creature Zorhanna Adulare|KftGV}!"

{@creature Zorhanna Adulare|KftGV} stands in the middle of the largest floating rock (marked C on {@area map 12.2|472|x}). She is a chaotic good, elf {@creature archmage} who speaks Auran, Common, Draconic, Elvish, and Sylvan. She has expended all her 6th-level and higher spell slots trying to escape from the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire's} extradimensional space, to no avail.

Zorhanna's sense of reality has been warped by prolonged contact with the shapeless Far Realm entity that haunts the extradimensional space. She is convinced that the characters were conjured by this entity to harm her, so she attacks them. She casts {@spell cone of cold} or {@spell lightning bolt} every round on her turn for as long as she is able to do so. If one or more characters close to melee distance, she casts {@spell shocking grasp} and {@spell misty step} on her next turn, using the latter spell to teleport to another rock.

As an action, a character can make a DC 17 Charisma ({@skill Persuasion}) check while trying to convince Zorhanna that the party is not her enemy. If the check is successful, Zorhanna does nothing on her next turn except mutter to herself as she ponders what the character said. If the check fails, Zorhanna continues her attack. Once three such checks succeed, Zorhanna concludes that the characters are not her enemies and calls for an end to hostilities. She then screams into the void, "You almost had me! Nice try, whatever you are!"

The characters can also convince Zorhanna to stop attacking them by returning her spellbook to her. The spellbook (found in {@area area P16|4a4|x}) excites her because it contains the {@spell plane shift} spell—her ticket to freedom (see "{@area Escaping the Rift|4b3|x}" below).
Once Zorhanna is no longer hostile toward the characters, they can question her and learn the following information:

items.name: About the Shard Solitaire
items.entry: "几年前，我从三个试图利用其超维能量的女巫那里偷来了{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}，正如你所看到的，它是非常不稳定的。我想我可以保持钻石的安全，但我忍不住要不时地展示它。我让我的虚荣心占了上风。"传送到另一块石头上。o 无效。

items.name: The Entity
items.entry: "一些外来的、邪恶的东西蠕动着进入了{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire's}次元裂缝，并被困于此，就像我们一样。这个实体有思想，但没有身体或灵魂。我相信它来自一个叫 "远界 "的维度。它是纯粹的邪恶，不能让它逃跑。"k.o avail.

entries.name: Extradimensional Rift
entries: 漂浮在次元裂缝中的岩石顶部是平的，悬浮在空中的高度大致相同。一个生物可以从一块岩石跃到它最近的邻居，而不需要进行能力检查。
任何从岩石上掉下来的生物都会坠入裂缝。在该生物的下一个回合开始时，来自裂缝的能量对该生物造成22({@dice 4d10})的力量伤害，然后将该生物以及它所穿戴或携带的任何东西传送到一个较大岩石顶部的随机空位上。掷一个{@dice d6}来决定哪个岩石：1-2，岩石A；3-4，岩石B；或者5-6，岩石C。

entries.name: Far Realm Entity
entries: The Far Realm entity can't be seen, heard, targeted, attacked, or harmed. Its presence can merely be felt. At the end of each hour spent in the extradimensional space with this entity, a creature must succeed on a DC 17 Charisma saving throw or take 7 ({@dice 2d6}) psychic damage.

If the characters crave more combat or if you think they've had too easy a time so far, the entity manifests three {@creature Invisible Stalker||invisible stalkers} that are hostile toward the characters. When a stalker drops to 0 hit points, it lets out a terrible howl as it disperses. Creating these stalkers takes energy the entity needs to free itself from the extradimensional rift, so it won't create more than three of them.

entries.name: Escaping the Rift
entries: 一个生物不能简单地从{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire's}维外空间传送。需要一个{@spell plane shift}的法术或类似的魔法。

如果Zorhanna获得了她的法术书，她可以用它来准备{@spell plane shift}的法术，但只有在完成4小时的恍惚之后（相当于她的长时间休息）。如果人物在{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}裂缝之前与Zorhanna一起逃跑，她会承认{@item shard solitaire|KftGV}太危险了，不能放在Paliset大厅里，并尽其所能确保人物带着它离开。她还建议角色们把它放在一个{@item bag of holding}或其他一些含有超维存储空间的物品里，以防{@item shard solitaire|KftGV}爆炸。
如果Zorhanna和人物没有办法自己逃离次元空间，他们会在{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}裂缝时被释放（见下文"{@area The Solitaire Cracks|4b7|x}"）。在那之前，他们必须努力抵抗远界实体.plodes造成的精神伤害。

entries.name: The Crestfall Coven
entries: The hags of the Crestfall Coven have waited many years to steal back the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}. Until now, ill omens and vague auguries have stayed their hand, but the moment has finally come.

With the help of a tiefling {@creature scout} named Mettle (see the {@area Gala Guests table|462|x} earlier in the adventure), the hags have been able to spy on the gala. Disguised as three elf nobles from the Feywild, the three {@creature Night Hag||night hags} (whose names are Myrrel Malum, Esadora Crane, and Netheria Nightblossom) arrive at Paliset Hall in one of the Adulares's unicorn-drawn coaches. After exiting the coach, the hags present stolen invitations to the winter wolves standing guard outside, then waltz into Paliset Hall, cackling with delight at how well their plan is unfolding.

entries.name: Hunt for the Shard Solitaire
entries: If all three members of the Crestfall Coven are within 30 feet of each other, they gain the benefit of the Shared Spellcasting trait described in the "Hag Covens" sidebar in the {@book Monster Manual|MM}. One of the three hags uses this trait to cast {@spell locate object} to find the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}. If they find the {@item shard solitaire|KftGV} in another creature's possession, the hags attack whoever has it. If the {@item shard solitaire|KftGV} necklace teleported to Zorhanna's vault, the hags use Change Shape to assume Zorhanna's appearance and slip past the vault's stone golem guardian. One of the hags then casts {@spell contact other plane} (which has a 1-minute casting time) to learn the three-letter combination needed to open the vault.

If the characters are trapped inside the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} or otherwise unable to thwart the Crestfall Coven, the hags snatch the necklace from the vault and use their {@spell plane shift} spells to transport to Loch Wynnis, where they wait for Mettle.

entries.name: Confronting the Hags
entries: Characters in Paliset Hall might encounter the Crestfall Coven as the hags search for the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} necklace. The hags are willing to cut a deal with the characters, provided the coven gets to keep the {@item shard solitaire|KftGV}. Clever characters might help the hags break into Zorhanna's vault, then betray the hags and claim the {@item shard solitaire|KftGV} for themselves. Similarly, any character who took Mettle's {@item hag eye|MM} can trade it for the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}, since the hags don't want to suffer the consequences of their {@item hag eye|MM} being destroyed.
如果夜行者被降低到50点或更少的命中率，它就会使用{@spell plane shift}来逃亡。如果女巫团的两个成员被迫以这种方式逃离，第三个成员也会逃离。

entries.name: The Solitaire Cracks
entries: At some point before the end of the adventure, the Far Realm entity finally breaks free of the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}, causing it to crack like a walnut. Here are some suggestions for when this event might occur:

items: 角色带着{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}返回物质界后的{@dice 1d8}小时。
如果人物被困于{@area area P20|4af|x}的远界实体中，并且没有办法逃脱的话
在夜行者获得{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}之后，但在他们使用{@spell plane shift}的法术带着它逃跑之前。

entries: 拿着或戴着它的人都能听到{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}的破裂声。在那一瞬间，{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}变成了一颗有缺陷的、非魔法的钻石，价值500金币，所有包含在它里面的生物和超维能量都被立刻释放出来。如果Zorhanna还活着，她会在石头周围30英尺范围内的一个无人空间里出现，任何和她一起被困在石头里的角色也是如此。远界的实体无处可寻，它的存在也不再能被感觉到。
从石头中释放出的维外能量具有与{@item Staff of Power||staff of power's}报应打击属性相同的效果，以石头本身为中心。爆炸发生在被困在石头里的生物被释放之前的一瞬间，使他们免于受到影响。
如果人物将未裂开的石头放在魔法物品的次元空间中，如{@item bag of holding}或Fifel的{@item Heward's Handy Haversack||haversack}，爆炸被限制在该物品的次元空间中，对容器没有伤害；一瞬间，从石头中释放的生物出现在该容器30英尺内的无人空间，而不是在石头本身附近的次元空间中。

entries.name: Conclusion
entries: 在{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}的裂缝之后，假设他们能活下来，人物可以总结他们的胜利或失败。

entries.name: Midwinter Miracles
entries: If Zorhanna and Eliphas are reunited and the characters did their utmost to protect Paliset Hall and its guests, Eliphas sees that the characters receive their promised reward. If they already helped themselves to the magic items on display in the art gallery ({@area area P6|486|x}), Eliphas considers their reward paid in full.
如果一个或多个角色死亡，但Zorhanna活了下来，她会与强大的大法官Summer Queen作出安排，让这些角色复活，而且不收取任何费用，前提是这些角色没有犯下她所知道的任何卑鄙行为。如果Zorhanna死了，但Eliphas活了下来，他就会找一些人帮忙，让人物从死里复活。

entries.name: Back in Loch Wynnis
entries: 当人物回到怀尼斯湖时，菲菲尔向他们问好，并询问了他们对妖怪世界的访问。如果他们需要借用他的{@item Heward's handy haversack}来安全容纳和运输{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}，他就把它倒出来交给他们。

entries.name: For the Golden Vault
entries: If the characters are working for the Golden Vault, the organization rewards them only if Eliphas and Zorhanna both survived, no innocent lives were lost in Paliset Hall, and the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire} didn't end up in the clutches of the Crestfall Coven. A Golden Vault operative offers the characters a rare magic item of their choice (subject to your approval) as a reward, which is delivered the next day.

entries.name: It Came from the Far Realm
entries: 远界实体会发生什么，由你来决定。作为一个纯思想的东西，它可能会腐蚀周围的生物，把他们变成可怕的异教徒或狂热的远界崇拜者。反之，它可能会在某个足够强大的生物身上找到慰藉，作为它的新宿主。

entries.name: Secrets of the Shard Solitaire
entries: 很久以前，有人把一个装满珠宝的{@item bag of holding}掉进一个{@item portable hole}，创造了一个通往星界的爆炸性门户。袋子里的一颗5000金币的钻石吸收了传送门的一些不稳定能量，成为这次冒险中的{@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}。

The same Far Realm entity that wormed its way into the {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire's} extradimensional rift has also attuned to the stone. The entity can't do anything with the stone other than what it has already done to {@creature Zorhanna Adulare|KftGV} (as described in this adventure). When the entity escapes the rift, the stone cracks and becomes nonmagical.

Although the characters never get the chance to wield the power of Zorhanna's {@item Shard Solitaire (Diamond)|KftGV|shard solitaire}, other {@item Shard Solitaire|KftGV|such items} are scattered throughout the multiverse, waiting to be found.

data.name: Fire and Darkness
entries: {@i An Adventure for 11th-Level Characters}
几个世纪以来，一个名叫弗拉基尔的强大的伊夫里提人派遣他的军队对付无数的敌人，将无数的城市烧成灰烬。现在，这个暴君找到了一件无法想象的邪恶神器：{@item Book of Vile Darkness (Variant)|KftGV|Book of Vile Darkness}。
在这次抢劫中，英雄们必须潜入硫磺岩堡垒，这是弗拉基尔锁住{@item Book of Vile Darkness (Variant)|KftGV|Book of Vile Darkness}的监狱堡垒，并带着伊夫里提的奖品逃跑。他们的联络人是一个名叫Nebukath的弓箭手，他是监狱的管理人，暗地里觊觎这本书，并计划在他们取回这本书后立即背叛英雄们。

entries.title: An efreeti's fortress holds the Book of Vile Darkness. Good luck storming this castle

entries.name: Adventure Background
entries: Vrakir obtained the {@item Book of Vile Darkness (Variant)|KftGV|Book of Vile Darkness} by accident. The efreeti knew the red dragon Drendarylix laired only a few days' ride from Brimstone Hold, one of Vrakir's fortresses. Many adventurers over the years tried to slay the foul creature, which had attacked and looted nearby villages for decades.
